34 
51 QCPPainter::QCPPainter() :
52  QPainter(),
53  mModes(pmDefault),
54  mIsAntialiasing(false)
55 {
56  // don't setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefautPen) here, because painter isn't active yet and
57  // a call to begin() will follow
58 }
59 
66 QCPPainter::QCPPainter(QPaintDevice *device) :
67  QPainter(device),
68  mModes(pmDefault),
69  mIsAntialiasing(false)
70 {
71 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set it to get consistency across Qt versions.
72  if (isActive())
73  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
74 #endif
75 }
76 
77 QCPPainter::~QCPPainter()
78 {
79 }
80 
87 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QPen &pen)
88 {
89  QPainter::setPen(pen);
90  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
91  makeNonCosmetic();
92 }
93 
101 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QColor &color)
102 {
103  QPainter::setPen(color);
104  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
105  makeNonCosmetic();
106 }
107 
115 void QCPPainter::setPen(Qt::PenStyle penStyle)
116 {
117  QPainter::setPen(penStyle);
118  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
119  makeNonCosmetic();
120 }
121 
130 void QCPPainter::drawLine(const QLineF &line)
131 {
132  if (mIsAntialiasing || mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized))
133  QPainter::drawLine(line);
134  else
135  QPainter::drawLine(line.toLine());
136 }
137 
144 void QCPPainter::setAntialiasing(bool enabled)
145 {
146  setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing, enabled);
147  if (mIsAntialiasing != enabled)
148  {
149  mIsAntialiasing = enabled;
150  if (!mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized)) // antialiasing half-pixel shift only needed for rasterized outputs
151  {
152  if (mIsAntialiasing)
153  translate(0.5, 0.5);
154  else
155  translate(-0.5, -0.5);
156  }
157  }
158 }
159 
164 void QCPPainter::setModes(QCPPainter::PainterModes modes)
165 {
166  mModes = modes;
167 }
168 
180 bool QCPPainter::begin(QPaintDevice *device)
181 {
182  bool result = QPainter::begin(device);
183 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set it to get consistency across Qt versions.
184  if (result)
185  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
186 #endif
187  return result;
188 }
189 
195 void QCPPainter::setMode(QCPPainter::PainterMode mode, bool enabled)
196 {
197  if (!enabled && mModes.testFlag(mode))
198  mModes &= ~mode;
199  else if (enabled && !mModes.testFlag(mode))
200  mModes |= mode;
201 }
202 
211 void QCPPainter::save()
212 {
213  mAntialiasingStack.push(mIsAntialiasing);
214  QPainter::save();
215 }
216 
225 void QCPPainter::restore()
226 {
227  if (!mAntialiasingStack.isEmpty())
228  mIsAntialiasing = mAntialiasingStack.pop();
229  else
230  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Unbalanced save/restore";
231  QPainter::restore();
232 }
233 
238 void QCPPainter::makeNonCosmetic()
239 {
240  if (qFuzzyIsNull(pen().widthF()))
241  {
242  QPen p = pen();
243  p.setWidth(1);
244  QPainter::setPen(p);
245  }
246 }

343 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle() :
344  mSize(6),

348  mPenDefined(false)

414  mPenDefined(pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)

517 void QCPScatterStyle::setCustomPath(const QPainterPath &customPath)
518 {
519  setShape(ssCustom);
520  mCustomPath = customPath;
521 }
522 
532 void QCPScatterStyle::applyTo(QCPPainter *painter, const QPen &defaultPen) const
533 {
534  painter->setPen(mPenDefined ? mPen : defaultPen);
535  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
536 }
537 
546 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, QPointF pos) const
547 {
548  drawShape(painter, pos.x(), pos.y());
549 }
550 
554 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y) const
555 {
556  double w = mSize/2.0;
557  switch (mShape)
558  {
559  case ssNone: break;
560  case ssDot:
561  {
562  painter->drawLine(QPointF(x, y), QPointF(x+0.0001, y));
563  break;
564  }
565  case ssCross:
566  {
567  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w, y+w));
568  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w, x+w, y-w));
569  break;
570  }
571  case ssPlus:
572  {
573  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
574  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
575  break;
576  }
577  case ssCircle:
578  {
579  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
580  break;
581  }
582  case ssDisc:
583  {
584  QBrush b = painter->brush();
585  painter->setBrush(painter->pen().color());
586  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
587  painter->setBrush(b);
588  break;
589  }
590  case ssSquare:
591  {
592  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
593  break;
594  }
595  case ssDiamond:
596  {
597  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x, y-w));
598  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y-w, x+w, y));
599  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y, x, y+w));
600  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x-w, y));
601  break;
602  }
603  case ssStar:
604  {
605  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
606  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
607  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
608  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y-w*0.707));
609  break;
610  }
611  case ssTriangle:
612  {
613  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+0.755*w, x+w, y+0.755*w));
614  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y+0.755*w, x, y-0.977*w));
615  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y-0.977*w, x-w, y+0.755*w));
616  break;
617  }
618  case ssTriangleInverted:
619  {
620  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-0.755*w, x+w, y-0.755*w));
621  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y-0.755*w, x, y+0.977*w));
622  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+0.977*w, x-w, y-0.755*w));
623  break;
624  }
625  case ssCrossSquare:
626  {
627  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w*0.95, y+w*0.95));
628  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w*0.95, x+w*0.95, y-w));
629  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
630  break;
631  }
632  case ssPlusSquare:
633  {
634  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w*0.95, y));
635  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
636  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
637  break;
638  }
639  case ssCrossCircle:
640  {
641  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.670, y+w*0.670));
642  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.670, x+w*0.670, y-w*0.707));
643  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
644  break;
645  }
646  case ssPlusCircle:
647  {
648  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
649  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
650  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
651  break;
652  }
653  case ssPeace:
654  {
655  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-w, x, y+w));
656  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
657  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
658  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
659  break;
660  }
661  case ssPixmap:
662  {
663  painter->drawPixmap(x-mPixmap.width()*0.5, y-mPixmap.height()*0.5, mPixmap);
664  break;
665  }
666  case ssCustom:
667  {
668  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
669  painter->translate(x, y);
670  painter->scale(mSize/6.0, mSize/6.0);
671  painter->drawPath(mCustomPath);
672  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
673  break;
674  }
675  }
676 }
677

741 /* end documentation of inline functions */
742 
751 QCPLayer::QCPLayer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &layerName) :
752  QObject(parentPlot),
753  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
754  mName(layerName),
755  mIndex(-1) // will be set to a proper value by the QCustomPlot layer creation function
756 {
757  // Note: no need to make sure layerName is unique, because layer
758  // management is done with QCustomPlot functions.
759 }
760 
761 QCPLayer::~QCPLayer()
762 {
763  // If child layerables are still on this layer, detach them, so they don't try to reach back to this
764  // then invalid layer once they get deleted/moved themselves. This only happens when layers are deleted
765  // directly, like in the QCustomPlot destructor. (The regular layer removal procedure for the user is to
766  // call QCustomPlot::removeLayer, which moves all layerables off this layer before deleting it.)
767 
768  while (!mChildren.isEmpty())
769  mChildren.last()->setLayer(0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild()
770 
771  if (mParentPlot->currentLayer() == this)
772  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The parent plot's mCurrentLayer will be a dangling pointer. Should have been set to a valid layer or 0 beforehand.";
773 }
774 
785 void QCPLayer::addChild(QCPLayerable *layerable, bool prepend)
786 {
787  if (!mChildren.contains(layerable))
788  {
789  if (prepend)
790  mChildren.prepend(layerable);
791  else
792  mChildren.append(layerable);
793  } else
794  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is already child of this layer" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
795 }
796 
806 void QCPLayer::removeChild(QCPLayerable *layerable)
807 {
808  if (!mChildren.removeOne(layerable))
809  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is not child of this layer" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
810 }

846 
887 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
888 
907 QCPLayerable::QCPLayerable(QCustomPlot *plot, QString targetLayer, QCPLayerable *parentLayerable) :
908  QObject(plot),
909  mVisible(true),
910  mParentPlot(plot),
911  mParentLayerable(parentLayerable),
912  mLayer(0),
913  mAntialiased(true)
914 {
915  if (mParentPlot)
916  {
917  if (targetLayer.isEmpty())
918  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer());
919  else if (!setLayer(targetLayer))
920  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "setting QCPlayerable initial layer to" << targetLayer << "failed.";
921  }
922 }
923 
924 QCPLayerable::~QCPLayerable()
925 {
926  if (mLayer)
927  {
928  mLayer->removeChild(this);
929  mLayer = 0;
930  }
931 }
932 
938 void QCPLayerable::setVisible(bool on)
939 {
940  mVisible = on;
941 }
942 
949 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
950 {
951  return moveToLayer(layer, false);
952 }
953 
959 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(const QString &layerName)
960 {
961  if (!mParentPlot)
962  {
963  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
964  return false;
965  }
966  if (QCPLayer *layer = mParentPlot->layer(layerName))
967  {
968  return setLayer(layer);
969  } else
970  {
971  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "there is no layer with name" << layerName;
972  return false;
973  }
974 }
975 
982 void QCPLayerable::setAntialiased(bool enabled)
983 {
984  mAntialiased = enabled;
985 }
986 
1000 bool QCPLayerable::realVisibility() const
1001 {
1002  return mVisible && (!mParentLayerable || mParentLayerable.data()->realVisibility());
1003 }
1004 
1039 double QCPLayerable::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
1040 {
1041  Q_UNUSED(pos)
1042  Q_UNUSED(onlySelectable)
1043  Q_UNUSED(details)
1044  return -1.0;
1045 }
1046 
1064 void QCPLayerable::initializeParentPlot(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1065 {
1066  if (mParentPlot)
1067  {
1068  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with mParentPlot already initialized";
1069  return;
1070  }
1071 
1072  if (!parentPlot)
1073  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with parentPlot zero";
1074 
1075  mParentPlot = parentPlot;
1076  parentPlotInitialized(mParentPlot);
1077 }
1078 
1090 void QCPLayerable::setParentLayerable(QCPLayerable *parentLayerable)
1091 {
1092  mParentLayerable = parentLayerable;
1093 }
1094 
1103 bool QCPLayerable::moveToLayer(QCPLayer *layer, bool prepend)
1104 {
1105  if (layer && !mParentPlot)
1106  {
1107  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
1108  return false;
1109  }
1110  if (layer && layer->parentPlot() != mParentPlot)
1111  {
1112  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer" << layer->name() << "is not in same QCustomPlot as this layerable";
1113  return false;
1114  }
1115 
1116  if (mLayer)
1117  mLayer->removeChild(this);
1118  mLayer = layer;
1119  if (mLayer)
1120  mLayer->addChild(this, prepend);
1121  return true;
1122 }
1123 
1131 void QCPLayerable::applyAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter, bool localAntialiased, QCP::AntialiasedElement overrideElement) const
1132 {
1133  if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1134  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
1135  else if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->antialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1136  painter->setAntialiasing(true);
1137  else
1138  painter->setAntialiasing(localAntialiased);
1139 }
1140 
1157 void QCPLayerable::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1158 {
1159  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
1160 }
1161 
1173 QCP::Interaction QCPLayerable::selectionCategory() const
1174 {
1175  return QCP::iSelectOther;
1176 }
1177 
1187 QRect QCPLayerable::clipRect() const
1188 {
1189  if (mParentPlot)
1190  return mParentPlot->viewport();
1191  else
1192  return QRect();
1193 }

1227  Q_UNUSED(details)
1228  Q_UNUSED(selectionStateChanged)
1229 }

1246 }

1267 const double QCPRange::minRange = 1e-280;
1268 
1277 const double QCPRange::maxRange = 1e250;
1278 
1282 QCPRange::QCPRange() :
1283  lower(0),
1284  upper(0)
1285 {
1286 }
1287 
1291 QCPRange::QCPRange(double lower, double upper) :
1292  lower(lower),
1293  upper(upper)
1294 {
1295  normalize();
1296 }
1297 
1301 double QCPRange::size() const
1302 {
1303  return upper-lower;
1304 }
1305 
1309 double QCPRange::center() const
1310 {
1311  return (upper+lower)*0.5;
1312 }
1313 
1318 void QCPRange::normalize()
1319 {
1320  if (lower > upper)
1321  qSwap(lower, upper);
1322 }
1323 
1336 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLogScale() const
1337 {
1338  double rangeFac = 1e-3;
1339  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1340  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1341  // can't have range spanning negative and positive values in log plot, so change range to fix it
1342  //if (qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.lower+1, 1) && !qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.upper+1, 1))
1343  if (sanitizedRange.lower == 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper != 0.0)
1344  {
1345  // case lower is 0
1346  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac)
1347  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1348  else
1349  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac;
1350  } //else if (!qFuzzyCompare(lower+1, 1) && qFuzzyCompare(upper+1, 1))
1351  else if (sanitizedRange.lower != 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper == 0.0)
1352  {
1353  // case upper is 0
1354  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac)
1355  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1356  else
1357  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac;
1358  } else if (sanitizedRange.lower < 0 && sanitizedRange.upper > 0)
1359  {
1360  // find out whether negative or positive interval is wider to decide which sign domain will be chosen
1361  if (-sanitizedRange.lower > sanitizedRange.upper)
1362  {
1363  // negative is wider, do same as in case upper is 0
1364  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac)
1365  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1366  else
1367  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac;
1368  } else
1369  {
1370  // positive is wider, do same as in case lower is 0
1371  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac)
1372  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1373  else
1374  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac;
1375  }
1376  }
1377  // due to normalization, case lower>0 && upper<0 should never occur, because that implies upper<lower
1378  return sanitizedRange;
1379 }
1380 
1385 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLinScale() const
1386 {
1387  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1388  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1389  return sanitizedRange;
1390 }
1391 
1395 bool QCPRange::contains(double value) const
1396 {
1397  return value >= lower && value <= upper;
1398 }
1399 
1408 bool QCPRange::validRange(double lower, double upper)
1409 {
1410  /*
1411  return (lower > -maxRange &&
1412  upper < maxRange &&
1413  qAbs(lower-upper) > minRange &&
1414  (lower < -minRange || lower > minRange) &&
1415  (upper < -minRange || upper > minRange));
1416  */
1417  return (lower > -maxRange &&
1418  upper < maxRange &&
1419  qAbs(lower-upper) > minRange &&
1420  qAbs(lower-upper) < maxRange);
1421 }
1422 
1432 bool QCPRange::validRange(const QCPRange &range)
1433 {
1434  /*
1435  return (range.lower > -maxRange &&
1436  range.upper < maxRange &&
1437  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) > minRange &&
1438  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) < maxRange &&
1439  (range.lower < -minRange || range.lower > minRange) &&
1440  (range.upper < -minRange || range.upper > minRange));
1441  */
1442  return (range.lower > -maxRange &&
1443  range.upper < maxRange &&
1444  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) > minRange &&
1445  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) < maxRange);
1446 }
1447 
1448 
1557 
1597 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1598 
1605 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1606 
1610 QCPMarginGroup::QCPMarginGroup(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
1611  QObject(parentPlot),
1612  mParentPlot(parentPlot)
1613 {
1614  mChildren.insert(QCP::msLeft, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1615  mChildren.insert(QCP::msRight, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1616  mChildren.insert(QCP::msTop, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1617  mChildren.insert(QCP::msBottom, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1618 }
1619 
1620 QCPMarginGroup::~QCPMarginGroup()
1621 {
1622  clear();
1623 }
1624 
1629 bool QCPMarginGroup::isEmpty() const
1630 {
1631  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement*> > it(mChildren);
1632  while (it.hasNext())
1633  {
1634  it.next();
1635  if (!it.value().isEmpty())
1636  return false;
1637  }
1638  return true;
1639 }
1640 
1645 void QCPMarginGroup::clear()
1646 {
1647  // make all children remove themselves from this margin group:
1648  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement*> > it(mChildren);
1649  while (it.hasNext())
1650  {
1651  it.next();
1652  const QList<QCPLayoutElement*> elements = it.value();
1653  for (int i=elements.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
1654  elements.at(i)->setMarginGroup(it.key(), 0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild
1655  }
1656 }
1657 
1668 int QCPMarginGroup::commonMargin(QCP::MarginSide side) const
1669 {
1670  // query all automatic margins of the layout elements in this margin group side and find maximum:
1671  int result = 0;
1672  const QList<QCPLayoutElement*> elements = mChildren.value(side);
1673  for (int i=0; i<elements.size(); ++i)
1674  {
1675  if (!elements.at(i)->autoMargins().testFlag(side))
1676  continue;
1677  int m = qMax(elements.at(i)->calculateAutoMargin(side), QCP::getMarginValue(elements.at(i)->minimumMargins(), side));
1678  if (m > result)
1679  result = m;
1680  }
1681  return result;
1682 }
1683 
1690 void QCPMarginGroup::addChild(QCP::MarginSide side, QCPLayoutElement *element)
1691 {
1692  if (!mChildren[side].contains(element))
1693  mChildren[side].append(element);
1694  else
1695  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "element is already child of this margin group side" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1696 }
1697 
1704 void QCPMarginGroup::removeChild(QCP::MarginSide side, QCPLayoutElement *element)
1705 {
1706  if (!mChildren[side].removeOne(element))
1707  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "element is not child of this margin group side" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1708 }
1709 
1710 
1714 
1741 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1742 
1790 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1791 
1795 QCPLayoutElement::QCPLayoutElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
1796  QCPLayerable(parentPlot), // parenthood is changed as soon as layout element gets inserted into a layout (except for top level layout)
1797  mParentLayout(0),
1798  mMinimumSize(),
1799  mMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, QWIDGETSIZE_MAX),
1800  mRect(0, 0, 0, 0),
1801  mOuterRect(0, 0, 0, 0),
1802  mMargins(0, 0, 0, 0),
1803  mMinimumMargins(0, 0, 0, 0),
1804  mAutoMargins(QCP::msAll)
1805 {
1806 }
1807 
1808 QCPLayoutElement::~QCPLayoutElement()
1809 {
1810  setMarginGroup(QCP::msAll, 0); // unregister at margin groups, if there are any
1811  // unregister at layout:
1812  if (qobject_cast<QCPLayout*>(mParentLayout)) // the qobject_cast is just a safeguard in case the layout forgets to call clear() in its dtor and this dtor is called by QObject dtor
1813  mParentLayout->take(this);
1814 }
1815 
1827 void QCPLayoutElement::setOuterRect(const QRect &rect)
1828 {
1829  if (mOuterRect != rect)
1830  {
1831  mOuterRect = rect;
1832  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(), -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1833  }
1834 }
1835 
1847 void QCPLayoutElement::setMargins(const QMargins &margins)
1848 {
1849  if (mMargins != margins)
1850  {
1851  mMargins = margins;
1852  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(), -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1853  }
1854 }
1855 
1865 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumMargins(const QMargins &margins)
1866 {
1867  if (mMinimumMargins != margins)
1868  {
1869  mMinimumMargins = margins;
1870  }
1871 }
1872 
1883 void QCPLayoutElement::setAutoMargins(QCP::MarginSides sides)
1884 {
1885  mAutoMargins = sides;
1886 }
1887 
1897 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(const QSize &size)
1898 {
1899  if (mMinimumSize != size)
1900  {
1901  mMinimumSize = size;
1902  if (mParentLayout)
1903  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
1904  }
1905 }
1906 
1911 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(int width, int height)
1912 {
1913  setMinimumSize(QSize(width, height));
1914 }
1915 
1920 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(const QSize &size)
1921 {
1922  if (mMaximumSize != size)
1923  {
1924  mMaximumSize = size;
1925  if (mParentLayout)
1926  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
1927  }
1928 }
1929 
1934 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(int width, int height)
1935 {
1936  setMaximumSize(QSize(width, height));
1937 }
1938 
1950 void QCPLayoutElement::setMarginGroup(QCP::MarginSides sides, QCPMarginGroup *group)
1951 {
1952  QVector<QCP::MarginSide> sideVector;
1953  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msLeft)) sideVector.append(QCP::msLeft);
1954  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msRight)) sideVector.append(QCP::msRight);
1955  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msTop)) sideVector.append(QCP::msTop);
1956  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msBottom)) sideVector.append(QCP::msBottom);
1957 
1958  for (int i=0; i<sideVector.size(); ++i)
1959  {
1960  QCP::MarginSide side = sideVector.at(i);
1961  if (marginGroup(side) != group)
1962  {
1963  QCPMarginGroup *oldGroup = marginGroup(side);
1964  if (oldGroup) // unregister at old group
1965  oldGroup->removeChild(side, this);
1966 
1967  if (!group) // if setting to 0, remove hash entry. Else set hash entry to new group and register there
1968  {
1969  mMarginGroups.remove(side);
1970  } else // setting to a new group
1971  {
1972  mMarginGroups[side] = group;
1973  group->addChild(side, this);
1974  }
1975  }
1976  }
1977 }
1978 
1989 void QCPLayoutElement::update()
1990 {
1991  if (mAutoMargins != QCP::msNone)
1992  {
1993  // set the margins of this layout element according to automatic margin calculation, either directly or via a margin group:
1994  QMargins newMargins = mMargins;
1995  QVector<QCP::MarginSide> marginSides = QVector<QCP::MarginSide>() << QCP::msLeft << QCP::msRight << QCP::msTop << QCP::msBottom;
1996  for (int i=0; i<marginSides.size(); ++i)
1997  {
1998  QCP::MarginSide side = marginSides.at(i);
1999  if (mAutoMargins.testFlag(side)) // this side's margin shall be calculated automatically
2000  {
2001  if (mMarginGroups.contains(side))
2002  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, mMarginGroups[side]->commonMargin(side)); // this side is part of a margin group, so get the margin value from that group
2003  else
2004  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, calculateAutoMargin(side)); // this side is not part of a group, so calculate the value directly
2005  // apply minimum margin restrictions:
2006  if (QCP::getMarginValue(newMargins, side) < QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side))
2007  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2008  }
2009  }
2010  setMargins(newMargins);
2011  }
2012 }
2013 
2021 QSize QCPLayoutElement::minimumSizeHint() const
2022 {
2023  return mMinimumSize;
2024 }
2025 
2033 QSize QCPLayoutElement::maximumSizeHint() const
2034 {
2035  return mMaximumSize;
2036 }
2037 
2045 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayoutElement::elements(bool recursive) const
2046 {
2047  Q_UNUSED(recursive)
2048  return QList<QCPLayoutElement*>();
2049 }
2050 
2062 double QCPLayoutElement::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
2063 {
2064  Q_UNUSED(details)
2065 
2066  if (onlySelectable)
2067  return -1;
2068 
2069  if (QRectF(mOuterRect).contains(pos))
2070  {
2071  if (mParentPlot)
2072  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
2073  else
2074  {
2075  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "parent plot not defined";
2076  return -1;
2077  }
2078  } else
2079  return -1;
2080 }
2081 
2087 void QCPLayoutElement::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
2088 {
2089  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> els = elements(false);
2090  for (int i=0; i<els.size(); ++i)
2091  {
2092  if (!els.at(i)->parentPlot())
2093  els.at(i)->initializeParentPlot(parentPlot);
2094  }
2095 }
2096 
2106 int QCPLayoutElement::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
2107 {
2108  return qMax(QCP::getMarginValue(mMargins, side), QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2109 }
2110 
2114 
2138 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
2139 
2182 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
2183 
2188 QCPLayout::QCPLayout()
2189 {
2190 }
2191 
2200 void QCPLayout::update()
2201 {
2202  QCPLayoutElement::update(); // recalculates (auto-)margins
2203 
2204  // set child element rects according to layout:
2205  updateLayout();
2206 
2207  // propagate update call to child elements:
2208  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
2209  {
2210  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(i))
2211  el->update();
2212  }
2213 }
2214 
2215 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2216 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayout::elements(bool recursive) const
2217 {
2218  int c = elementCount();
2219  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
2220 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
2221  result.reserve(c);
2222 #endif
2223  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2224  result.append(elementAt(i));
2225  if (recursive)
2226  {
2227  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2228  {
2229  if (result.at(i))
2230  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
2231  }
2232  }
2233  return result;
2234 }
2235 
2243 void QCPLayout::simplify()
2244 {
2245 }
2246 
2256 bool QCPLayout::removeAt(int index)
2257 {
2258  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = takeAt(index))
2259  {
2260  delete el;
2261  return true;
2262  } else
2263  return false;
2264 }
2265 
2275 bool QCPLayout::remove(QCPLayoutElement *element)
2276 {
2277  if (take(element))
2278  {
2279  delete element;
2280  return true;
2281  } else
2282  return false;
2283 }
2284 
2290 void QCPLayout::clear()
2291 {
2292  for (int i=elementCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
2293  {
2294  if (elementAt(i))
2295  removeAt(i);
2296  }
2297  simplify();
2298 }
2299 
2308 void QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged() const
2309 {
2310  if (QWidget *w = qobject_cast<QWidget*>(parent()))
2311  w->updateGeometry();
2312  else if (QCPLayout *l = qobject_cast<QCPLayout*>(parent()))
2313  l->sizeConstraintsChanged();
2314 }
2315 
2328 void QCPLayout::updateLayout()
2329 {
2330 }
2331 
2332 
2345 void QCPLayout::adoptElement(QCPLayoutElement *el)
2346 {
2347  if (el)
2348  {
2349  el->mParentLayout = this;
2350  el->setParentLayerable(this);
2351  el->setParent(this);
2352  if (!el->parentPlot())
2353  el->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
2354  } else
2355  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2356 }
2357 
2368 void QCPLayout::releaseElement(QCPLayoutElement *el)
2369 {
2370  if (el)
2371  {
2372  el->mParentLayout = 0;
2373  el->setParentLayerable(0);
2374  el->setParent(mParentPlot);
2375  // Note: Don't initializeParentPlot(0) here, because layout element will stay in same parent plot
2376  } else
2377  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2378 }
2379 
2409 QVector<int> QCPLayout::getSectionSizes(QVector<int> maxSizes, QVector<int> minSizes, QVector<double> stretchFactors, int totalSize) const
2410 {
2411  if (maxSizes.size() != minSizes.size() || minSizes.size() != stretchFactors.size())
2412  {
2413  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed vector sizes aren't equal:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors;
2414  return QVector<int>();
2415  }
2416  if (stretchFactors.isEmpty())
2417  return QVector<int>();
2418  int sectionCount = stretchFactors.size();
2419  QVector<double> sectionSizes(sectionCount);
2420  // if provided total size is forced smaller than total minimum size, ignore minimum sizes (squeeze sections):
2421  int minSizeSum = 0;
2422  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2423  minSizeSum += minSizes.at(i);
2424  if (totalSize < minSizeSum)
2425  {
2426  // new stretch factors are minimum sizes and minimum sizes are set to zero:
2427  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2428  {
2429  stretchFactors[i] = minSizes.at(i);
2430  minSizes[i] = 0;
2431  }
2432  }
2433 
2434  QList<int> minimumLockedSections;
2435  QList<int> unfinishedSections;
2436  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2437  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2438  double freeSize = totalSize;
2439 
2440  int outerIterations = 0;
2441  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() && outerIterations < sectionCount*2) // the iteration check ist just a failsafe in case something really strange happens
2442  {
2443  ++outerIterations;
2444  int innerIterations = 0;
2445  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() && innerIterations < sectionCount*2) // the iteration check ist just a failsafe in case something really strange happens
2446  {
2447  ++innerIterations;
2448  // find section that hits its maximum next:
2449  int nextId = -1;
2450  double nextMax = 1e12;
2451  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2452  {
2453  int secId = unfinishedSections.at(i);
2454  double hitsMaxAt = (maxSizes.at(secId)-sectionSizes.at(secId))/stretchFactors.at(secId);
2455  if (hitsMaxAt < nextMax)
2456  {
2457  nextMax = hitsMaxAt;
2458  nextId = secId;
2459  }
2460  }
2461  // check if that maximum is actually within the bounds of the total size (i.e. can we stretch all remaining sections so far that the found section
2462  // actually hits its maximum, without exceeding the total size when we add up all sections)
2463  double stretchFactorSum = 0;
2464  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2465  stretchFactorSum += stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2466  double nextMaxLimit = freeSize/stretchFactorSum;
2467  if (nextMax < nextMaxLimit) // next maximum is actually hit, move forward to that point and fix the size of that section
2468  {
2469  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2470  {
2471  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] += nextMax*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2472  freeSize -= nextMax*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2473  }
2474  unfinishedSections.removeOne(nextId); // exclude the section that is now at maximum from further changes
2475  } else // next maximum isn't hit, just distribute rest of free space on remaining sections
2476  {
2477  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2478  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] += nextMaxLimit*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2479  unfinishedSections.clear();
2480  }
2481  }
2482  if (innerIterations == sectionCount*2)
2483  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Exceeded maximum expected inner iteration count, layouting aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors << totalSize;
2484 
2485  // now check whether the resulting section sizes violate minimum restrictions:
2486  bool foundMinimumViolation = false;
2487  for (int i=0; i<sectionSizes.size(); ++i)
2488  {
2489  if (minimumLockedSections.contains(i))
2490  continue;
2491  if (sectionSizes.at(i) < minSizes.at(i)) // section violates minimum
2492  {
2493  sectionSizes[i] = minSizes.at(i); // set it to minimum
2494  foundMinimumViolation = true; // make sure we repeat the whole optimization process
2495  minimumLockedSections.append(i);
2496  }
2497  }
2498  if (foundMinimumViolation)
2499  {
2500  freeSize = totalSize;
2501  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2502  {
2503  if (!minimumLockedSections.contains(i)) // only put sections that haven't hit their minimum back into the pool
2504  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2505  else
2506  freeSize -= sectionSizes.at(i); // remove size of minimum locked sections from available space in next round
2507  }
2508  // reset all section sizes to zero that are in unfinished sections (all others have been set to their minimum):
2509  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2510  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] = 0;
2511  }
2512  }
2513  if (outerIterations == sectionCount*2)
2514  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Exceeded maximum expected outer iteration count, layouting aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors << totalSize;
2515 
2516  QVector<int> result(sectionCount);
2517  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2518  result[i] = qRound(sectionSizes.at(i));
2519  return result;
2520 }
2521 
2522 
2526 
2546 QCPLayoutGrid::QCPLayoutGrid() :
2547  mColumnSpacing(5),
2548  mRowSpacing(5)
2549 {
2550 }
2551 
2552 QCPLayoutGrid::~QCPLayoutGrid()
2553 {
2554  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the specific layouts know how
2555  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do that).
2556  clear();
2557 }
2558 
2567 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::element(int row, int column) const
2568 {
2569  if (row >= 0 && row < mElements.size())
2570  {
2571  if (column >= 0 && column < mElements.first().size())
2572  {
2573  if (QCPLayoutElement *result = mElements.at(row).at(column))
2574  return result;
2575  else
2576  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Requested cell is empty. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2577  } else
2578  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2579  } else
2580  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2581  return 0;
2582 }
2583 
2589 int QCPLayoutGrid::rowCount() const
2590 {
2591  return mElements.size();
2592 }
2593 
2599 int QCPLayoutGrid::columnCount() const
2600 {
2601  if (mElements.size() > 0)
2602  return mElements.first().size();
2603  else
2604  return 0;
2605 }
2606 
2617 bool QCPLayoutGrid::addElement(int row, int column, QCPLayoutElement *element)
2618 {
2619  if (element)
2620  {
2621  if (!hasElement(row, column))
2622  {
2623  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
2624  element->layout()->take(element);
2625  expandTo(row+1, column+1);
2626  mElements[row][column] = element;
2627  adoptElement(element);
2628  return true;
2629  } else
2630  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "There is already an element in the specified row/column:" << row << column;
2631  } else
2632  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element to row/column:" << row << column;
2633  return false;
2634 }
2635 
2642 bool QCPLayoutGrid::hasElement(int row, int column)
2643 {
2644  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount() && column >= 0 && column < columnCount())
2645  return mElements.at(row).at(column);
2646  else
2647  return false;
2648 }
2649 
2661 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactor(int column, double factor)
2662 {
2663  if (column >= 0 && column < columnCount())
2664  {
2665  if (factor > 0)
2666  mColumnStretchFactors[column] = factor;
2667  else
2668  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2669  } else
2670  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column:" << column;
2671 }
2672 
2684 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors)
2685 {
2686  if (factors.size() == mColumnStretchFactors.size())
2687  {
2688  mColumnStretchFactors = factors;
2689  for (int i=0; i<mColumnStretchFactors.size(); ++i)
2690  {
2691  if (mColumnStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0)
2692  {
2693  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << mColumnStretchFactors.at(i);
2694  mColumnStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2695  }
2696  }
2697  } else
2698  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Column count not equal to passed stretch factor count:" << factors;
2699 }
2700 
2712 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactor(int row, double factor)
2713 {
2714  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount())
2715  {
2716  if (factor > 0)
2717  mRowStretchFactors[row] = factor;
2718  else
2719  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2720  } else
2721  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row:" << row;
2722 }
2723 
2735 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors)
2736 {
2737  if (factors.size() == mRowStretchFactors.size())
2738  {
2739  mRowStretchFactors = factors;
2740  for (int i=0; i<mRowStretchFactors.size(); ++i)
2741  {
2742  if (mRowStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0)
2743  {
2744  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << mRowStretchFactors.at(i);
2745  mRowStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2746  }
2747  }
2748  } else
2749  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Row count not equal to passed stretch factor count:" << factors;
2750 }
2751 
2757 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnSpacing(int pixels)
2758 {
2759  mColumnSpacing = pixels;
2760 }
2761 
2767 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowSpacing(int pixels)
2768 {
2769  mRowSpacing = pixels;
2770 }
2771 
2786 void QCPLayoutGrid::expandTo(int newRowCount, int newColumnCount)
2787 {
2788  // add rows as necessary:
2789  while (rowCount() < newRowCount)
2790  {
2791  mElements.append(QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
2792  mRowStretchFactors.append(1);
2793  }
2794  // go through rows and expand columns as necessary:
2795  int newColCount = qMax(columnCount(), newColumnCount);
2796  for (int i=0; i<rowCount(); ++i)
2797  {
2798  while (mElements.at(i).size() < newColCount)
2799  mElements[i].append(0);
2800  }
2801  while (mColumnStretchFactors.size() < newColCount)
2802  mColumnStretchFactors.append(1);
2803 }
2804 
2811 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertRow(int newIndex)
2812 {
2813  if (mElements.isEmpty() || mElements.first().isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
2814  {
2815  expandTo(1, 1);
2816  return;
2817  }
2818 
2819  if (newIndex < 0)
2820  newIndex = 0;
2821  if (newIndex > rowCount())
2822  newIndex = rowCount();
2823 
2824  mRowStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
2825  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> newRow;
2826  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2827  newRow.append((QCPLayoutElement*)0);
2828  mElements.insert(newIndex, newRow);
2829 }
2830 
2837 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertColumn(int newIndex)
2838 {
2839  if (mElements.isEmpty() || mElements.first().isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
2840  {
2841  expandTo(1, 1);
2842  return;
2843  }
2844 
2845  if (newIndex < 0)
2846  newIndex = 0;
2847  if (newIndex > columnCount())
2848  newIndex = columnCount();
2849 
2850  mColumnStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
2851  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2852  mElements[row].insert(newIndex, (QCPLayoutElement*)0);
2853 }
2854 
2855 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2856 void QCPLayoutGrid::updateLayout()
2857 {
2858  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights, maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
2859  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
2860  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
2861 
2862  int totalRowSpacing = (rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing;
2863  int totalColSpacing = (columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing;
2864  QVector<int> colWidths = getSectionSizes(maxColWidths, minColWidths, mColumnStretchFactors.toVector(), mRect.width()-totalColSpacing);
2865  QVector<int> rowHeights = getSectionSizes(maxRowHeights, minRowHeights, mRowStretchFactors.toVector(), mRect.height()-totalRowSpacing);
2866 
2867  // go through cells and set rects accordingly:
2868  int yOffset = mRect.top();
2869  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2870  {
2871  if (row > 0)
2872  yOffset += rowHeights.at(row-1)+mRowSpacing;
2873  int xOffset = mRect.left();
2874  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2875  {
2876  if (col > 0)
2877  xOffset += colWidths.at(col-1)+mColumnSpacing;
2878  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
2879  mElements.at(row).at(col)->setOuterRect(QRect(xOffset, yOffset, colWidths.at(col), rowHeights.at(row)));
2880  }
2881  }
2882 }
2883 
2884 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2885 int QCPLayoutGrid::elementCount() const
2886 {
2887  return rowCount()*columnCount();
2888 }
2889 
2890 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2891 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::elementAt(int index) const
2892 {
2893  if (index >= 0 && index < elementCount())
2894  return mElements.at(index / columnCount()).at(index % columnCount());
2895  else
2896  return 0;
2897 }
2898 
2899 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2900 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::takeAt(int index)
2901 {
2902  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index))
2903  {
2904  releaseElement(el);
2905  mElements[index / columnCount()][index % columnCount()] = 0;
2906  return el;
2907  } else
2908  {
2909  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
2910  return 0;
2911  }
2912 }
2913 
2914 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2915 bool QCPLayoutGrid::take(QCPLayoutElement *element)
2916 {
2917  if (element)
2918  {
2919  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
2920  {
2921  if (elementAt(i) == element)
2922  {
2923  takeAt(i);
2924  return true;
2925  }
2926  }
2927  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
2928  } else
2929  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
2930  return false;
2931 }
2932 
2933 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2934 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayoutGrid::elements(bool recursive) const
2935 {
2936  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
2937  int colC = columnCount();
2938  int rowC = rowCount();
2939 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
2940  result.reserve(colC*rowC);
2941 #endif
2942  for (int row=0; row<rowC; ++row)
2943  {
2944  for (int col=0; col<colC; ++col)
2945  {
2946  result.append(mElements.at(row).at(col));
2947  }
2948  }
2949  if (recursive)
2950  {
2951  int c = result.size();
2952  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2953  {
2954  if (result.at(i))
2955  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
2956  }
2957  }
2958  return result;
2959 }
2960 
2964 void QCPLayoutGrid::simplify()
2965 {
2966  // remove rows with only empty cells:
2967  for (int row=rowCount()-1; row>=0; --row)
2968  {
2969  bool hasElements = false;
2970  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2971  {
2972  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
2973  {
2974  hasElements = true;
2975  break;
2976  }
2977  }
2978  if (!hasElements)
2979  {
2980  mRowStretchFactors.removeAt(row);
2981  mElements.removeAt(row);
2982  if (mElements.isEmpty()) // removed last element, also remove stretch factor (wouldn't happen below because also columnCount changed to 0 now)
2983  mColumnStretchFactors.clear();
2984  }
2985  }
2986 
2987  // remove columns with only empty cells:
2988  for (int col=columnCount()-1; col>=0; --col)
2989  {
2990  bool hasElements = false;
2991  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2992  {
2993  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
2994  {
2995  hasElements = true;
2996  break;
2997  }
2998  }
2999  if (!hasElements)
3000  {
3001  mColumnStretchFactors.removeAt(col);
3002  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3003  mElements[row].removeAt(col);
3004  }
3005  }
3006 }
3007 
3008 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3009 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::minimumSizeHint() const
3010 {
3011  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights;
3012  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
3013  QSize result(0, 0);
3014  for (int i=0; i<minColWidths.size(); ++i)
3015  result.rwidth() += minColWidths.at(i);
3016  for (int i=0; i<minRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3017  result.rheight() += minRowHeights.at(i);
3018  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3019  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
3020  return result;
3021 }
3022 
3023 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3024 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::maximumSizeHint() const
3025 {
3026  QVector<int> maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
3027  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
3028 
3029  QSize result(0, 0);
3030  for (int i=0; i<maxColWidths.size(); ++i)
3031  result.setWidth(qMin(result.width()+maxColWidths.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3032  for (int i=0; i<maxRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3033  result.setHeight(qMin(result.height()+maxRowHeights.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3034  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3035  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
3036  return result;
3037 }
3038 
3051 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMinimumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *minColWidths, QVector<int> *minRowHeights) const
3052 {
3053  *minColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), 0);
3054  *minRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), 0);
3055  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3056  {
3057  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
3058  {
3059  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3060  {
3061  QSize minHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSizeHint();
3062  QSize min = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSize();
3063  QSize final(min.width() > 0 ? min.width() : minHint.width(), min.height() > 0 ? min.height() : minHint.height());
3064  if (minColWidths->at(col) < final.width())
3065  (*minColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3066  if (minRowHeights->at(row) < final.height())
3067  (*minRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3068  }
3069  }
3070  }
3071 }
3072 
3085 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMaximumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *maxColWidths, QVector<int> *maxRowHeights) const
3086 {
3087  *maxColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3088  *maxRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3089  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3090  {
3091  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
3092  {
3093  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3094  {
3095  QSize maxHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSizeHint();
3096  QSize max = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSize();
3097  QSize final(max.width() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.width() : maxHint.width(), max.height() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.height() : maxHint.height());
3098  if (maxColWidths->at(col) > final.width())
3099  (*maxColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3100  if (maxRowHeights->at(row) > final.height())
3101  (*maxRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3102  }
3103  }
3104  }
3105 }
3106 
3107 
3111 
3129 /* start documentation of inline functions */
3130 
3137 /* end documentation of inline functions */
3138 
3142 QCPLayoutInset::QCPLayoutInset()
3143 {
3144 }
3145 
3146 QCPLayoutInset::~QCPLayoutInset()
3147 {
3148  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the specific layouts know how
3149  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do that).
3150  clear();
3151 }
3152 
3156 QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement QCPLayoutInset::insetPlacement(int index) const
3157 {
3158  if (elementAt(index))
3159  return mInsetPlacement.at(index);
3160  else
3161  {
3162  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3163  return ipFree;
3164  }
3165 }
3166 
3171 Qt::Alignment QCPLayoutInset::insetAlignment(int index) const
3172 {
3173  if (elementAt(index))
3174  return mInsetAlignment.at(index);
3175  else
3176  {
3177  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3178  return 0;
3179  }
3180 }
3181 
3186 QRectF QCPLayoutInset::insetRect(int index) const
3187 {
3188  if (elementAt(index))
3189  return mInsetRect.at(index);
3190  else
3191  {
3192  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3193  return QRectF();
3194  }
3195 }
3196 
3202 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetPlacement(int index, QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement placement)
3203 {
3204  if (elementAt(index))
3205  mInsetPlacement[index] = placement;
3206  else
3207  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3208 }
3209 
3218 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetAlignment(int index, Qt::Alignment alignment)
3219 {
3220  if (elementAt(index))
3221  mInsetAlignment[index] = alignment;
3222  else
3223  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3224 }
3225 
3237 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetRect(int index, const QRectF &rect)
3238 {
3239  if (elementAt(index))
3240  mInsetRect[index] = rect;
3241  else
3242  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3243 }
3244 
3245 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3246 void QCPLayoutInset::updateLayout()
3247 {
3248  for (int i=0; i<mElements.size(); ++i)
3249  {
3250  QRect insetRect;
3251  QSize finalMinSize, finalMaxSize;
3252  QSize minSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->minimumSizeHint();
3253  QSize maxSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->maximumSizeHint();
3254  finalMinSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width() > 0 ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width() : minSizeHint.width());
3255  finalMinSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height() > 0 ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height() : minSizeHint.height());
3256  finalMaxSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width() : maxSizeHint.width());
3257  finalMaxSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height() : maxSizeHint.height());
3258  if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipFree)
3259  {
3260  insetRect = QRect(rect().x()+rect().width()*mInsetRect.at(i).x(),
3261  rect().y()+rect().height()*mInsetRect.at(i).y(),
3262  rect().width()*mInsetRect.at(i).width(),
3263  rect().height()*mInsetRect.at(i).height());
3264  if (insetRect.size().width() < finalMinSize.width())
3265  insetRect.setWidth(finalMinSize.width());
3266  if (insetRect.size().height() < finalMinSize.height())
3267  insetRect.setHeight(finalMinSize.height());
3268  if (insetRect.size().width() > finalMaxSize.width())
3269  insetRect.setWidth(finalMaxSize.width());
3270  if (insetRect.size().height() > finalMaxSize.height())
3271  insetRect.setHeight(finalMaxSize.height());
3272  } else if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipBorderAligned)
3273  {
3274  insetRect.setSize(finalMinSize);
3275  Qt::Alignment al = mInsetAlignment.at(i);
3276  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignLeft)) insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x());
3277  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight)) insetRect.moveRight(rect().x()+rect().width());
3278  else insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x()+rect().width()*0.5-finalMinSize.width()*0.5); // default to Qt::AlignHCenter
3279  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignTop)) insetRect.moveTop(rect().y());
3280  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom)) insetRect.moveBottom(rect().y()+rect().height());
3281  else insetRect.moveTop(rect().y()+rect().height()*0.5-finalMinSize.height()*0.5); // default to Qt::AlignVCenter
3282  }
3283  mElements.at(i)->setOuterRect(insetRect);
3284  }
3285 }
3286 
3287 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3288 int QCPLayoutInset::elementCount() const
3289 {
3290  return mElements.size();
3291 }
3292 
3293 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3294 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::elementAt(int index) const
3295 {
3296  if (index >= 0 && index < mElements.size())
3297  return mElements.at(index);
3298  else
3299  return 0;
3300 }
3301 
3302 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3303 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::takeAt(int index)
3304 {
3305  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index))
3306  {
3307  releaseElement(el);
3308  mElements.removeAt(index);
3309  mInsetPlacement.removeAt(index);
3310  mInsetAlignment.removeAt(index);
3311  mInsetRect.removeAt(index);
3312  return el;
3313  } else
3314  {
3315  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
3316  return 0;
3317  }
3318 }
3319 
3320 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3321 bool QCPLayoutInset::take(QCPLayoutElement *element)
3322 {
3323  if (element)
3324  {
3325  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
3326  {
3327  if (elementAt(i) == element)
3328  {
3329  takeAt(i);
3330  return true;
3331  }
3332  }
3333  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
3334  } else
3335  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
3336  return false;
3337 }
3338 
3348 double QCPLayoutInset::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
3349 {
3350  Q_UNUSED(details)
3351  if (onlySelectable)
3352  return -1;
3353 
3354  for (int i=0; i<mElements.size(); ++i)
3355  {
3356  // inset layout shall only return positive selectTest, if actually an inset object is at pos
3357  // else it would block the entire underlying QCPAxisRect with its surface.
3358  if (mElements.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable) >= 0)
3359  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
3360  }
3361  return -1;
3362 }
3363 
3375 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element, Qt::Alignment alignment)
3376 {
3377  if (element)
3378  {
3379  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3380  element->layout()->take(element);
3381  mElements.append(element);
3382  mInsetPlacement.append(ipBorderAligned);
3383  mInsetAlignment.append(alignment);
3384  mInsetRect.append(QRectF(0.6, 0.6, 0.4, 0.4));
3385  adoptElement(element);
3386  } else
3387  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3388 }
3389 
3401 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element, const QRectF &rect)
3402 {
3403  if (element)
3404  {
3405  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3406  element->layout()->take(element);
3407  mElements.append(element);
3408  mInsetPlacement.append(ipFree);
3409  mInsetAlignment.append(Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
3410  mInsetRect.append(rect);
3411  adoptElement(element);
3412  } else
3413  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3414 }
3415

3420 
3444 QCPLineEnding::QCPLineEnding() :
3445  mStyle(esNone),
3446  mWidth(8),
3447  mLength(10),
3448  mInverted(false)
3449 {
3450 }
3451 
3455 QCPLineEnding::QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::EndingStyle style, double width, double length, bool inverted) :
3456  mStyle(style),
3457  mWidth(width),
3458  mLength(length),
3459  mInverted(inverted)
3460 {
3461 }
3462 
3466 void QCPLineEnding::setStyle(QCPLineEnding::EndingStyle style)
3467 {
3468  mStyle = style;
3469 }
3470 
3477 void QCPLineEnding::setWidth(double width)
3478 {
3479  mWidth = width;
3480 }
3481 
3488 void QCPLineEnding::setLength(double length)
3489 {
3490  mLength = length;
3491 }
3492 
3501 void QCPLineEnding::setInverted(bool inverted)
3502 {
3503  mInverted = inverted;
3504 }
3505 
3515 double QCPLineEnding::boundingDistance() const
3516 {
3517  switch (mStyle)
3518  {
3519  case esNone:
3520  return 0;
3521 
3522  case esFlatArrow:
3523  case esSpikeArrow:
3524  case esLineArrow:
3525  case esSkewedBar:
3526  return qSqrt(mWidth*mWidth+mLength*mLength); // items that have width and length
3527 
3528  case esDisc:
3529  case esSquare:
3530  case esDiamond:
3531  case esBar:
3532  case esHalfBar:
3533  return mWidth*1.42; // items that only have a width -> width*sqrt(2)
3534 
3535  }
3536  return 0;
3537 }
3538 
3550 double QCPLineEnding::realLength() const
3551 {
3552  switch (mStyle)
3553  {
3554  case esNone:
3555  case esLineArrow:
3556  case esSkewedBar:
3557  case esBar:
3558  case esHalfBar:
3559  return 0;
3560 
3561  case esFlatArrow:
3562  return mLength;
3563 
3564  case esDisc:
3565  case esSquare:
3566  case esDiamond:
3567  return mWidth*0.5;
3568 
3569  case esSpikeArrow:
3570  return mLength*0.8;
3571  }
3572  return 0;
3573 }
3574 
3580 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos, const QVector2D &dir) const
3581 {
3582  if (mStyle == esNone)
3583  return;
3584 
3585  QVector2D lengthVec(dir.normalized());
3586  if (lengthVec.isNull())
3587  lengthVec = QVector2D(1, 0);
3588  QVector2D widthVec(-lengthVec.y(), lengthVec.x());
3589  lengthVec *= mLength*(mInverted ? -1 : 1);
3590  widthVec *= mWidth*0.5*(mInverted ? -1 : 1);
3591 
3592  QPen penBackup = painter->pen();
3593  QBrush brushBackup = painter->brush();
3594  QPen miterPen = penBackup;
3595  miterPen.setJoinStyle(Qt::MiterJoin); // to make arrow heads spikey
3596  QBrush brush(painter->pen().color(), Qt::SolidPattern);
3597  switch (mStyle)
3598  {
3599  case esNone: break;
3600  case esFlatArrow:
3601  {
3602  QPointF points[3] = {pos.toPointF(),
3603  (pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3604  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3605  };
3606  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3607  painter->setBrush(brush);
3608  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 3);
3609  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3610  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3611  break;
3612  }
3613  case esSpikeArrow:
3614  {
3615  QPointF points[4] = {pos.toPointF(),
3616  (pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3617  (pos-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(),
3618  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3619  };
3620  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3621  painter->setBrush(brush);
3622  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3623  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3624  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3625  break;
3626  }
3627  case esLineArrow:
3628  {
3629  QPointF points[3] = {(pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3630  pos.toPointF(),
3631  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3632  };
3633  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3634  painter->drawPolyline(points, 3);
3635  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3636  break;
3637  }
3638  case esDisc:
3639  {
3640  painter->setBrush(brush);
3641  painter->drawEllipse(pos.toPointF(), mWidth*0.5, mWidth*0.5);
3642  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3643  break;
3644  }
3645  case esSquare:
3646  {
3647  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3648  QPointF points[4] = {(pos-widthVecPerp+widthVec).toPointF(),
3649  (pos-widthVecPerp-widthVec).toPointF(),
3650  (pos+widthVecPerp-widthVec).toPointF(),
3651  (pos+widthVecPerp+widthVec).toPointF()
3652  };
3653  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3654  painter->setBrush(brush);
3655  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3656  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3657  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3658  break;
3659  }
3660  case esDiamond:
3661  {
3662  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3663  QPointF points[4] = {(pos-widthVecPerp).toPointF(),
3664  (pos-widthVec).toPointF(),
3665  (pos+widthVecPerp).toPointF(),
3666  (pos+widthVec).toPointF()
3667  };
3668  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3669  painter->setBrush(brush);
3670  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3671  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3672  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3673  break;
3674  }
3675  case esBar:
3676  {
3677  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec).toPointF(), (pos-widthVec).toPointF());
3678  break;
3679  }
3680  case esHalfBar:
3681  {
3682  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec).toPointF(), pos.toPointF());
3683  break;
3684  }
3685  case esSkewedBar:
3686  {
3687  if (qFuzzyIsNull(painter->pen().widthF()) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic))
3688  {
3689  // if drawing with cosmetic pen (perfectly thin stroke, happens only in vector exports), draw bar exactly on tip of line
3690  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec+lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)).toPointF(),
3691  (pos-widthVec-lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)).toPointF());
3692  } else
3693  {
3694  // if drawing with thick (non-cosmetic) pen, shift bar a little in line direction to prevent line from sticking through bar slightly
3695  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec+lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)+dir.normalized()*qMax(1.0, (double)painter->pen().widthF())*0.5).toPointF(),
3696  (pos-widthVec-lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)+dir.normalized()*qMax(1.0, (double)painter->pen().widthF())*0.5).toPointF());
3697  }
3698  break;
3699  }
3700  }
3701 }
3702 
3708 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos, double angle) const
3709 {
3710  draw(painter, pos, QVector2D(qCos(angle), qSin(angle)));
3711 }
3712 
3713 
3717 
3736 QCPGrid::QCPGrid(QCPAxis *parentAxis) :
3737  QCPLayerable(parentAxis->parentPlot(), "", parentAxis),
3738  mParentAxis(parentAxis)
3739 {
3740  // warning: this is called in QCPAxis constructor, so parentAxis members should not be accessed/called
3741  setParent(parentAxis);
3742  setPen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3743  setSubGridPen(QPen(QColor(220,220,220), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3744  setZeroLinePen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::SolidLine));
3745  setSubGridVisible(false);
3746  setAntialiased(false);
3747  setAntialiasedSubGrid(false);
3748  setAntialiasedZeroLine(false);
3749 }
3750 
3756 void QCPGrid::setSubGridVisible(bool visible)
3757 {
3758  mSubGridVisible = visible;
3759 }
3760 
3764 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedSubGrid(bool enabled)
3765 {
3766  mAntialiasedSubGrid = enabled;
3767 }
3768 
3772 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedZeroLine(bool enabled)
3773 {
3774  mAntialiasedZeroLine = enabled;
3775 }
3776 
3780 void QCPGrid::setPen(const QPen &pen)
3781 {
3782  mPen = pen;
3783 }
3784 
3788 void QCPGrid::setSubGridPen(const QPen &pen)
3789 {
3790  mSubGridPen = pen;
3791 }
3792 
3799 void QCPGrid::setZeroLinePen(const QPen &pen)
3800 {
3801  mZeroLinePen = pen;
3802 }
3803 
3817 void QCPGrid::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
3818 {
3819  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeGrid);
3820 }
3821 
3827 void QCPGrid::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
3828 {
3829  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3830 
3831  if (mSubGridVisible)
3832  drawSubGridLines(painter);
3833  drawGridLines(painter);
3834 }
3835 
3842 void QCPGrid::drawGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const
3843 {
3844  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3845 
3846  int lowTick = mParentAxis->mLowestVisibleTick;
3847  int highTick = mParentAxis->mHighestVisibleTick;
3848  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
3849  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
3850  {
3851  // draw zeroline:
3852  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
3853  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 && mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0)
3854  {
3855  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
3856  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
3857  double epsilon = mParentAxis->range().size()*1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
3858  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3859  {
3860  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon)
3861  {
3862  zeroLineIndex = i;
3863  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
3864  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3865  break;
3866  }
3867  }
3868  }
3869  // draw grid lines:
3870  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
3871  painter->setPen(mPen);
3872  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3873  {
3874  if (i == zeroLineIndex) continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
3875  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
3876  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3877  }
3878  } else
3879  {
3880  // draw zeroline:
3881  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
3882  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 && mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0)
3883  {
3884  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
3885  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
3886  double epsilon = mParentAxis->mRange.size()*1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
3887  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3888  {
3889  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon)
3890  {
3891  zeroLineIndex = i;
3892  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
3893  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3894  break;
3895  }
3896  }
3897  }
3898  // draw grid lines:
3899  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
3900  painter->setPen(mPen);
3901  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3902  {
3903  if (i == zeroLineIndex) continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
3904  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
3905  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3906  }
3907  }
3908 }
3909 
3916 void QCPGrid::drawSubGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const
3917 {
3918  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3919 
3920  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedSubGrid, QCP::aeSubGrid);
3921  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
3922  painter->setPen(mSubGridPen);
3923  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
3924  {
3925  for (int i=0; i<mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
3926  {
3927  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // x
3928  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3929  }
3930  } else
3931  {
3932  for (int i=0; i<mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
3933  {
3934  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // y
3935  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3936  }
3937  }
3938 }
3939 
3940 
3944 
3963 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
3964 
3977 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
3978 /* start of documentation of signals */
3979 
4008 /* end of documentation of signals */
4009 
4014 QCPAxis::QCPAxis(QCPAxisRect *parent, AxisType type) :
4015  QCPLayerable(parent->parentPlot(), "", parent),
4016  // axis base:
4017  mAxisType(type),
4018  mAxisRect(parent),
4019  mOffset(0),
4020  mPadding(5),
4021  mOrientation((type == atBottom || type == atTop) ? Qt::Horizontal : Qt::Vertical),
4022  mSelectableParts(spAxis | spTickLabels | spAxisLabel),
4023  mSelectedParts(spNone),
4024  mBasePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4025  mSelectedBasePen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4026  mLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
4027  mUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
4028  // axis label:
4029  mLabelPadding(0),
4030  mLabel(""),
4031  mLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4032  mSelectedLabelFont(QFont(mLabelFont.family(), mLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4033  mLabelColor(Qt::black),
4034  mSelectedLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4035  // tick labels:
4036  mTickLabelPadding(0),
4037  mTickLabels(true),
4038  mAutoTickLabels(true),
4039  mTickLabelRotation(0),
4040  mTickLabelType(ltNumber),
4041  mTickLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4042  mSelectedTickLabelFont(QFont(mTickLabelFont.family(), mTickLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4043  mTickLabelColor(Qt::black),
4044  mSelectedTickLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4045  mDateTimeFormat("hh:mm:ss\ndd.MM.yy"),
4046  mNumberPrecision(6),
4047  mNumberFormatChar('g'),
4048  mNumberBeautifulPowers(true),
4049  mNumberMultiplyCross(false),
4050  // ticks and subticks:
4051  mTicks(true),
4052  mTickStep(1),
4053  mSubTickCount(4),
4054  mAutoTickCount(6),
4055  mAutoTicks(true),
4056  mAutoTickStep(true),
4057  mAutoSubTicks(true),
4058  mTickLengthIn(5),
4059  mTickLengthOut(0),
4060  mSubTickLengthIn(2),
4061  mSubTickLengthOut(0),
4062  mTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4063  mSelectedTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4064  mSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4065  mSelectedSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4066  // scale and range:
4067  mRange(0, 5),
4068  mRangeReversed(false),
4069  mScaleType(stLinear),
4070  mScaleLogBase(10),
4071  mScaleLogBaseLogInv(1.0/qLn(mScaleLogBase)),
4072  // internal members:
4073  mGrid(new QCPGrid(this)),
4074  mLabelCache(16), // cache at most 16 (tick) labels
4075  mLowestVisibleTick(0),
4076  mHighestVisibleTick(-1),
4077  mExponentialChar('e'), // will be updated with locale sensitive values in setupTickVector
4078  mPositiveSignChar('+'), // will be updated with locale sensitive values in setupTickVector
4079  mCachedMarginValid(false),
4080  mCachedMargin(0)
4081 {
4082  mGrid->setVisible(false);
4083  setAntialiased(false);
4084  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer()); // it's actually on that layer already, but we want it in front of the grid, so we place it on there again
4085 
4086  if (type == atTop)
4087  {
4088  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4089  setLabelPadding(6);
4090  } else if (type == atRight)
4091  {
4092  setTickLabelPadding(7);
4093  setLabelPadding(12);
4094  } else if (type == atBottom)
4095  {
4096  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4097  setLabelPadding(3);
4098  } else if (type == atLeft)
4099  {
4100  setTickLabelPadding(5);
4101  setLabelPadding(10);
4102  }
4103 }
4104 
4105 /* No documentation as it is a property getter */
4106 QString QCPAxis::numberFormat() const
4107 {
4108  QString result;
4109  result.append(mNumberFormatChar);
4110  if (mNumberBeautifulPowers)
4111  {
4112  result.append("b");
4113  if (mNumberMultiplyCross)
4114  result.append("c");
4115  }
4116  return result;
4117 }
4118 
4132 void QCPAxis::setScaleType(ScaleType type)
4133 {
4134  if (mScaleType != type)
4135  {
4136  mScaleType = type;
4137  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4138  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4139  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4140  }
4141 }
4142 
4150 void QCPAxis::setScaleLogBase(double base)
4151 {
4152  if (base > 1)
4153  {
4154  mScaleLogBase = base;
4155  mScaleLogBaseLogInv = 1.0/qLn(mScaleLogBase); // buffer for faster baseLog() calculation
4156  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4157  } else
4158  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid logarithmic scale base (must be greater 1):" << base;
4159 }
4160 
4169 void QCPAxis::setRange(const QCPRange &range)
4170 {
4171  if (range.lower == mRange.lower && range.upper == mRange.upper)
4172  return;
4173 
4174  if (!QCPRange::validRange(range)) return;
4175  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4176  {
4177  mRange = range.sanitizedForLogScale();
4178  } else
4179  {
4180  mRange = range.sanitizedForLinScale();
4181  }
4182  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4183  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4184 }
4185 
4196 void QCPAxis::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
4197 {
4198  mSelectableParts = selectable;
4199 }
4200 
4216 void QCPAxis::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
4217 {
4218  if (mSelectedParts != selected)
4219  {
4220  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) != selected.testFlag(spTickLabels))
4221  mLabelCache.clear();
4222  mSelectedParts = selected;
4223  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
4224  }
4225 }
4226 
4236 void QCPAxis::setRange(double lower, double upper)
4237 {
4238  if (lower == mRange.lower && upper == mRange.upper)
4239  return;
4240 
4241  if (!QCPRange::validRange(lower, upper)) return;
4242  mRange.lower = lower;
4243  mRange.upper = upper;
4244  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4245  {
4246  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4247  } else
4248  {
4249  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4250  }
4251  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4252  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4253 }
4254 
4266 void QCPAxis::setRange(double position, double size, Qt::AlignmentFlag alignment)
4267 {
4268  if (alignment == Qt::AlignLeft)
4269  setRange(position, position+size);
4270  else if (alignment == Qt::AlignRight)
4271  setRange(position-size, position);
4272  else // alignment == Qt::AlignCenter
4273  setRange(position-size/2.0, position+size/2.0);
4274 }
4275 
4280 void QCPAxis::setRangeLower(double lower)
4281 {
4282  if (mRange.lower == lower)
4283  return;
4284 
4285  mRange.lower = lower;
4286  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4287  {
4288  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4289  } else
4290  {
4291  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4292  }
4293  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4294  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4295 }
4296 
4301 void QCPAxis::setRangeUpper(double upper)
4302 {
4303  if (mRange.upper == upper)
4304  return;
4305 
4306  mRange.upper = upper;
4307  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4308  {
4309  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4310  } else
4311  {
4312  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4313  }
4314  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4315  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4316 }
4317 
4327 void QCPAxis::setRangeReversed(bool reversed)
4328 {
4329  if (mRangeReversed != reversed)
4330  {
4331  mRangeReversed = reversed;
4332  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4333  }
4334 }

4352  {
4353  mAutoTicks = on;
4354  mCachedMarginValid = false;

4370  {
4371  if (approximateCount > 0)
4372  {
4373  mAutoTickCount = approximateCount;
4374  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4375  } else
4376  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "approximateCount must be greater than zero:" << approximateCount;
4377  }
4378 }

4502  mTickLabelType = type;

4504  }

4512 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelFont(const QFont &font)
4513 {
4514  if (font != mTickLabelFont)
4515  {
4516  mTickLabelFont = font;
4517  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4518  mLabelCache.clear();
4519  }
4520 }
4521 
4527 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelColor(const QColor &color)
4528 {
4529  if (color != mTickLabelColor)
4530  {
4531  mTickLabelColor = color;
4532  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4533  mLabelCache.clear();
4534  }
4535 }
4536 
4546 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelRotation(double degrees)
4547 {
4548  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(degrees-mTickLabelRotation))
4549  {
4550  mTickLabelRotation = qBound(-90.0, degrees, 90.0);
4551  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4552  mLabelCache.clear();
4553  }
4554 }
4555 
4562 void QCPAxis::setDateTimeFormat(const QString &format)
4563 {
4564  if (mDateTimeFormat != format)
4565  {
4566  mDateTimeFormat = format;
4567  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4568  mLabelCache.clear();
4569  }
4570 }
4571 
4608 void QCPAxis::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode)
4609 {
4610  if (formatCode.isEmpty())
4611  {
4612  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed formatCode is empty";
4613  return;
4614  }
4615  mLabelCache.clear();
4616  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4617 
4618  // interpret first char as number format char:
4619  QString allowedFormatChars = "eEfgG";
4620  if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0)))
4621  {
4622  mNumberFormatChar = formatCode.at(0).toLatin1();
4623  } else
4624  {
4625  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):" << formatCode;
4626  return;
4627  }
4628  if (formatCode.length() < 2)
4629  {
4630  mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
4631  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
4632  return;
4633  }
4634 
4635  // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
4636  if (formatCode.at(1) == 'b' && (mNumberFormatChar == 'e' || mNumberFormatChar == 'g'))
4637  {
4638  mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
4639  } else
4640  {
4641  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
4642  return;
4643  }
4644  if (formatCode.length() < 3)
4645  {
4646  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
4647  return;
4648  }
4649 
4650  // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
4651  if (formatCode.at(2) == 'c')
4652  {
4653  mNumberMultiplyCross = true;
4654  } else if (formatCode.at(2) == 'd')
4655  {
4656  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
4657  } else
4658  {
4659  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):" << formatCode;
4660  return;
4661  }
4662 }
4663 
4675 void QCPAxis::setNumberPrecision(int precision)
4676 {
4677  if (mNumberPrecision != precision)
4678  {
4679  mNumberPrecision = precision;
4680  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4681  }
4682 }
4683

4691  if (mTickStep != step)
4692  {
4693  mTickStep = step;
4694  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4695  }
4696 }
