5072 
5080 void QCPAxis::moveRange(double diff)
5081 {
5082  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5083  {
5084  mRange.lower += diff;
5085  mRange.upper += diff;
5086  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5087  {
5088  mRange.lower *= diff;
5089  mRange.upper *= diff;
5090  }
5091  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5092  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5093 }
5094 
5101 void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
5102 {
5103  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5104  {
5105  QCPRange newRange;
5106  newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
5107  newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
5108  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5109  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
5110  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5111  {
5112  if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) || (mRange.upper > 0 && center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
5113  {
5114  QCPRange newRange;
5115  newRange.lower = pow(mRange.lower/center, factor)*center;
5116  newRange.upper = pow(mRange.upper/center, factor)*center;
5117  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5118  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
5119  } else
5120  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic sign domain as range:" << center;
5121  }
5122  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5123  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5124 }
5125 
5139 void QCPAxis::setScaleRatio(const QCPAxis *otherAxis, double ratio)
5140 {
5141  int otherPixelSize, ownPixelSize;
5142 
5143  if (otherAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5144  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->width();
5145  else
5146  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->height();
5147 
5148  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5149  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->width();
5150  else
5151  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->height();
5152 
5153  double newRangeSize = ratio*otherAxis->range().size()*ownPixelSize/(double)otherPixelSize;
5154  setRange(range().center(), newRangeSize, Qt::AlignCenter);
5155 }
5156 
5160 double QCPAxis::pixelToCoord(double value) const
5161 {
5162  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5163  {
5164  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5165  {
5166  if (!mRangeReversed)
5167  return (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5168  else
5169  return -(value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5170  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5171  {
5172  if (!mRangeReversed)
5173  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.lower;
5174  else
5175  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->left()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.upper;
5176  }
5177  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5178  {
5179  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5180  {
5181  if (!mRangeReversed)
5182  return (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5183  else
5184  return -(mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5185  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5186  {
5187  if (!mRangeReversed)
5188  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.lower;
5189  else
5190  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->bottom())/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.upper;
5191  }
5192  }
5193 }
5194 
5198 double QCPAxis::coordToPixel(double value) const
5199 {
5200  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5201  {
5202  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5203  {
5204  if (!mRangeReversed)
5205  return (value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5206  else
5207  return (mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5208  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5209  {
5210  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5211  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->right()+200 : mAxisRect->left()-200;
5212  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5213  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->left()-200 : mAxisRect->right()+200;
5214  else
5215  {
5216  if (!mRangeReversed)
5217  return baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5218  else
5219  return baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5220  }
5221  }
5222  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5223  {
5224  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5225  {
5226  if (!mRangeReversed)
5227  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5228  else
5229  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5230  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5231  {
5232  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5233  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->top()-200 : mAxisRect->bottom()+200;
5234  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5235  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->bottom()+200 : mAxisRect->top()-200;
5236  else
5237  {
5238  if (!mRangeReversed)
5239  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5240  else
5241  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5242  }
5243  }
5244  }
5245 }
5246 
5256 QCPAxis::SelectablePart QCPAxis::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const
5257 {
5258  if (!mVisible)
5259  return spNone;
5260 
5261  if (mAxisSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
5262  return spAxis;
5263  else if (mTickLabelsSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
5264  return spTickLabels;
5265  else if (mLabelSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
5266  return spAxisLabel;
5267  else
5268  return spNone;
5269 }
5270 
5271 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5272 double QCPAxis::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
5273 {
5274  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
5275  SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
5276  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
5277  return -1;
5278 
5279  if (details)
5280  details->setValue(part);
5281  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
5282 }
5283 
5291 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxis::plottables() const
5292 {
5293  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
5294  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5295 
5296  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
5297  {
5298  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5299  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
5300  }
5301  return result;
5302 }
5303 
5309 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxis::graphs() const
5310 {
5311  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
5312  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5313 
5314  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
5315  {
5316  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5317  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
5318  }
5319  return result;
5320 }
5321 
5328 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCPAxis::items() const
5329 {
5330  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
5331  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5332 
5333  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
5334  {
5335  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
5336  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++itemId)
5337  {
5338  if (positions.at(posId)->keyAxis() == this || positions.at(posId)->valueAxis() == this)
5339  {
5340  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
5341  break;
5342  }
5343  }
5344  }
5345  return result;
5346 }
5347 
5352 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(QCP::MarginSide side)
5353 {
5354  switch (side)
5355  {
5356  case QCP::msLeft: return atLeft;
5357  case QCP::msRight: return atRight;
5358  case QCP::msTop: return atTop;
5359  case QCP::msBottom: return atBottom;
5360  default: break;
5361  }
5362  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid margin side passed:" << (int)side;
5363  return atLeft;
5364 }
5365 
5373 void QCPAxis::setupTickVectors()
5374 {
5375  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5376  if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
5377 
5378  // fill tick vectors, either by auto generating or by notifying user to fill the vectors himself
5379  if (mAutoTicks)
5380  {
5381  generateAutoTicks();
5382  } else
5383  {
5384  emit ticksRequest();
5385  }
5386 
5387  visibleTickBounds(mLowestVisibleTick, mHighestVisibleTick);
5388  if (mTickVector.isEmpty())
5389  {
5390  mSubTickVector.clear();
5391  return;
5392  }
5393 
5394  // generate subticks between ticks:
5395  mSubTickVector.resize((mTickVector.size()-1)*mSubTickCount);
5396  if (mSubTickCount > 0)
5397  {
5398  double subTickStep = 0;
5399  double subTickPosition = 0;
5400  int subTickIndex = 0;
5401  bool done = false;
5402  int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick > 0 ? mLowestVisibleTick-1 : mLowestVisibleTick;
5403  int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick < mTickVector.size()-1 ? mHighestVisibleTick+1 : mHighestVisibleTick;
5404  for (int i=lowTick+1; i<=highTick; ++i)
5405  {
5406  subTickStep = (mTickVector.at(i)-mTickVector.at(i-1))/(double)(mSubTickCount+1);
5407  for (int k=1; k<=mSubTickCount; ++k)
5408  {
5409  subTickPosition = mTickVector.at(i-1) + k*subTickStep;
5410  if (subTickPosition < mRange.lower)
5411  continue;
5412  if (subTickPosition > mRange.upper)
5413  {
5414  done = true;
5415  break;
5416  }
5417  mSubTickVector[subTickIndex] = subTickPosition;
5418  subTickIndex++;
5419  }
5420  if (done) break;
5421  }
5422  mSubTickVector.resize(subTickIndex);
5423  }
5424 
5425  // generate tick labels according to tick positions:
5426  mExponentialChar = mParentPlot->locale().exponential(); // will be needed when drawing the numbers generated here, in getTickLabelData()
5427  mPositiveSignChar = mParentPlot->locale().positiveSign(); // will be needed when drawing the numbers generated here, in getTickLabelData()
5428  if (mAutoTickLabels)
5429  {
5430  int vecsize = mTickVector.size();
5431  mTickVectorLabels.resize(vecsize);
5432  if (mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
5433  {
5434  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5435  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(mTickVector.at(i), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision);
5436  } else if (mTickLabelType == ltDateTime)
5437  {
5438  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5439  {
5440 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0) // use fromMSecsSinceEpoch function if available, to gain sub-second accuracy on tick labels (e.g. for format "hh:mm:ss:zzz")
5441  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromTime_t(mTickVector.at(i)), mDateTimeFormat);
5442 #else
5443  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromMSecsSinceEpoch(mTickVector.at(i)*1000), mDateTimeFormat);
5444 #endif
5445  }
5446  }
5447  } else // mAutoTickLabels == false
5448  {
5449  if (mAutoTicks) // ticks generated automatically, but not ticklabels, so emit ticksRequest here for labels
5450  {
5451  emit ticksRequest();
5452  }
5453  // make sure provided tick label vector has correct (minimal) length:
5454  if (mTickVectorLabels.size() < mTickVector.size())
5455  mTickVectorLabels.resize(mTickVector.size());
5456  }
5457 }
5458 
5468 void QCPAxis::generateAutoTicks()
5469 {
5470  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5471  {
5472  if (mAutoTickStep)
5473  {
5474  // Generate tick positions according to linear scaling:
5475  mTickStep = mRange.size()/(double)(mAutoTickCount+1e-10); // mAutoTickCount ticks on average, the small addition is to prevent jitter on exact integers
5476  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(mTickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5477  double tickStepMantissa = mTickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5478  if (tickStepMantissa < 5)
5479  {
5480  // round digit after decimal point to 0.5
5481  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa*2)/2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5482  } else
5483  {
5484  // round to first digit in multiples of 2
5485  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa/2.0)*2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5486  }
5487  }
5488  if (mAutoSubTicks)
5489  mSubTickCount = calculateAutoSubTickCount(mTickStep);
5490  // Generate tick positions according to mTickStep:
5491  qint64 firstStep = floor(mRange.lower/mTickStep);
5492  qint64 lastStep = ceil(mRange.upper/mTickStep);
5493  int tickcount = lastStep-firstStep+1;
5494  if (tickcount < 0) tickcount = 0;
5495  mTickVector.resize(tickcount);
5496  for (int i=0; i<tickcount; ++i)
5497  mTickVector[i] = (firstStep+i)*mTickStep;
5498  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5499  {
5500  // Generate tick positions according to logbase scaling:
5501  if (mRange.lower > 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // positive range
5502  {
5503  double lowerMag = basePow((int)floor(baseLog(mRange.lower)));
5504  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5505  mTickVector.clear();
5506  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5507  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag > 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5508  {
5509  currentMag *= mScaleLogBase;
5510  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5511  }
5512  } else if (mRange.lower < 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // negative range
5513  {
5514  double lowerMag = -basePow((int)ceil(baseLog(-mRange.lower)));
5515  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5516  mTickVector.clear();
5517  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5518  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag < 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5519  {
5520  currentMag /= mScaleLogBase;
5521  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5522  }
5523  } else // invalid range for logarithmic scale, because lower and upper have different sign
5524  {
5525  mTickVector.clear();
5526  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid range for logarithmic plot: " << mRange.lower << "-" << mRange.upper;
5527  }
5528  }
5529 }
5530 
5544 int QCPAxis::calculateAutoSubTickCount(double tickStep) const
5545 {
5546  int result = mSubTickCount; // default to current setting, if no proper value can be found
5547 
5548  // get mantissa of tickstep:
5549  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(tickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5550  double tickStepMantissa = tickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5551 
5552  // separate integer and fractional part of mantissa:
5553  double epsilon = 0.01;
5554  double intPartf;
5555  int intPart;
5556  double fracPart = modf(tickStepMantissa, &intPartf);
5557  intPart = intPartf;
5558 
5559  // handle cases with (almost) integer mantissa:
5560  if (fracPart < epsilon || 1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5561  {
5562  if (1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5563  ++intPart;
5564  switch (intPart)
5565  {
5566  case 1: result = 4; break; // 1.0 -> 0.2 substep
5567  case 2: result = 3; break; // 2.0 -> 0.5 substep
5568  case 3: result = 2; break; // 3.0 -> 1.0 substep
5569  case 4: result = 3; break; // 4.0 -> 1.0 substep
5570  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.0 -> 1.0 substep
5571  case 6: result = 2; break; // 6.0 -> 2.0 substep
5572  case 7: result = 6; break; // 7.0 -> 1.0 substep
5573  case 8: result = 3; break; // 8.0 -> 2.0 substep
5574  case 9: result = 2; break; // 9.0 -> 3.0 substep
5575  }
5576  } else
5577  {
5578  // handle cases with significantly fractional mantissa:
5579  if (qAbs(fracPart-0.5) < epsilon) // *.5 mantissa
5580  {
5581  switch (intPart)
5582  {
5583  case 1: result = 2; break; // 1.5 -> 0.5 substep
5584  case 2: result = 4; break; // 2.5 -> 0.5 substep
5585  case 3: result = 4; break; // 3.5 -> 0.7 substep
5586  case 4: result = 2; break; // 4.5 -> 1.5 substep
5587  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.5 -> 1.1 substep (won't occur with autoTickStep from here on)
5588  case 6: result = 4; break; // 6.5 -> 1.3 substep
5589  case 7: result = 2; break; // 7.5 -> 2.5 substep
5590  case 8: result = 4; break; // 8.5 -> 1.7 substep
5591  case 9: result = 4; break; // 9.5 -> 1.9 substep
5592  }
5593  }
5594  // if mantissa fraction isnt 0.0 or 0.5, don't bother finding good sub tick marks, leave default
5595  }
5596 
5597  return result;
5598 }
5599 
5607 void QCPAxis::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
5608 {
5609  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5610  QPoint origin;
5611  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
5612  origin = mAxisRect->bottomLeft()+QPoint(-mOffset, 0);
5613  else if (mAxisType == atRight)
5614  origin = mAxisRect->bottomRight()+QPoint(+mOffset, 0);
5615  else if (mAxisType == atTop)
5616  origin = mAxisRect->topLeft()+QPoint(0, -mOffset);
5617  else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
5618  origin = mAxisRect->bottomLeft()+QPoint(0, +mOffset);
5619 
5620  double xCor = 0, yCor = 0; // paint system correction, for pixel exact matches (affects baselines and ticks of top/right axes)
5621  switch (mAxisType)
5622  {
5623  case atTop: yCor = -1; break;
5624  case atRight: xCor = 1; break;
5625  default: break;
5626  }
5627 
5628  int margin = 0;
5629  int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick;
5630  int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick;
5631  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
5632 
5633  // draw baseline:
5634  QLineF baseLine;
5635  painter->setPen(getBasePen());
5636  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5637  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(mAxisRect->width()+xCor, yCor));
5638  else
5639  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(xCor, -mAxisRect->height()+yCor));
5640  if (mRangeReversed)
5641  baseLine = QLineF(baseLine.p2(), baseLine.p1()); // won't make a difference for line itself, but for line endings later
5642  painter->drawLine(baseLine);
5643 
5644  // draw ticks:
5645  if (mTicks)
5646  {
5647  painter->setPen(getTickPen());
5648  // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
5649  int tickDir = (mAxisType == atBottom || mAxisType == atRight) ? -1 : 1;
5650  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5651  {
5652  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
5653  {
5654  t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)); // x
5655  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t+xCor, origin.y()-mTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, t+xCor, origin.y()+mTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
5656  }
5657  } else
5658  {
5659  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
5660  {
5661  t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)); // y
5662  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-mTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor, origin.x()+mTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor));
5663  }
5664  }
5665  }
5666 
5667  // draw subticks:
5668  if (mTicks && mSubTickCount > 0)
5669  {
5670  painter->setPen(getSubTickPen());
5671  // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
5672  int tickDir = (mAxisType == atBottom || mAxisType == atRight) ? -1 : 1;
5673  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5674  {
5675  for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i) // no need to check bounds because subticks are always only created inside current mRange
5676  {
5677  t = coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i));
5678  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t+xCor, origin.y()-mSubTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, t+xCor, origin.y()+mSubTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
5679  }
5680  } else
5681  {
5682  for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
5683  {
5684  t = coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i));
5685  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-mSubTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor, origin.x()+mSubTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor));
5686  }
5687  }
5688  }
5689  margin += qMax(0, qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut));
5690 
5691  // draw axis base endings:
5692  bool antialiasingBackup = painter->antialiasing();
5693  painter->setAntialiasing(true); // always want endings to be antialiased, even if base and ticks themselves aren't
5694  painter->setBrush(QBrush(basePen().color()));
5695  QVector2D baseLineVector(baseLine.dx(), baseLine.dy());
5696  if (mLowerEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
5697  mLowerEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p1())-baseLineVector.normalized()*mLowerEnding.realLength()*(mLowerEnding.inverted()?-1:1), -baseLineVector);
5698  if (mUpperEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
5699  mUpperEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p2())+baseLineVector.normalized()*mUpperEnding.realLength()*(mUpperEnding.inverted()?-1:1), baseLineVector);
5700  painter->setAntialiasing(antialiasingBackup);
5701 
5702  // tick labels:
5703  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0); // size of largest tick label, for offset calculation of axis label
5704  if (mTickLabels)
5705  {
5706  margin += mTickLabelPadding;
5707  painter->setFont(getTickLabelFont());
5708  painter->setPen(QPen(getTickLabelColor()));
5709  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
5710  {
5711  t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i));
5712  placeTickLabel(painter, t, margin, mTickVectorLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
5713  }
5714  }
5715  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5716  margin += tickLabelsSize.height();
5717  else
5718  margin += tickLabelsSize.width();
5719 
5720  // axis label:
5721  QRect labelBounds;
5722  if (!mLabel.isEmpty())
5723  {
5724  margin += mLabelPadding;
5725  painter->setFont(getLabelFont());
5726  painter->setPen(QPen(getLabelColor()));
5727  labelBounds = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, mLabel);
5728  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
5729  {
5730  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
5731  painter->translate((origin.x()-margin-labelBounds.height()), origin.y());
5732  painter->rotate(-90);
5733  painter->drawText(0, 0, mAxisRect->height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5734  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
5735  }
5736  else if (mAxisType == atRight)
5737  {
5738  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
5739  painter->translate((origin.x()+margin+labelBounds.height()), origin.y()-mAxisRect->height());
5740  painter->rotate(90);
5741  painter->drawText(0, 0, mAxisRect->height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5742  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
5743  }
5744  else if (mAxisType == atTop)
5745  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()-margin-labelBounds.height(), mAxisRect->width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5746  else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
5747  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()+margin, mAxisRect->width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5748  }
5749 
5750  // set selection boxes:
5751  int selAxisOutSize = qMax(qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut), mParentPlot->selectionTolerance());
5752  int selAxisInSize = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance();
5753  int selTickLabelSize = (orientation()==Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
5754  int selTickLabelOffset = qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut)+mTickLabelPadding;
5755  int selLabelSize = labelBounds.height();
5756  int selLabelOffset = selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize+mLabelPadding;
5757  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
5758  {
5759  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selAxisInSize, mAxisRect->bottom());
5760  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5761  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()-selLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5762  } else if (mAxisType == atRight)
5763  {
5764  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisInSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect->bottom());
5765  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5766  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5767  } else if (mAxisType == atTop)
5768  {
5769  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selAxisInSize);
5770  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset);
5771  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset);
5772  } else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
5773  {
5774  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selAxisInSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selAxisOutSize);
5775  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset);
5776  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset);
5777  }
5778  // draw hitboxes for debug purposes:
5779  //painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
5780  //painter->drawRects(QVector<QRect>() << mAxisSelectionBox << mTickLabelsSelectionBox << mLabelSelectionBox);
5781 }
5782 
5802 void QCPAxis::placeTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double position, int distanceToAxis, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize)
5803 {
5804  // warning: if you change anything here, also adapt getMaxTickLabelSize() accordingly!
5805  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5806  if (text.isEmpty()) return;
5807  QSize finalSize;
5808  QPointF labelAnchor;
5809  switch (mAxisType)
5810  {
5811  case atLeft: labelAnchor = QPointF(mAxisRect->left()-distanceToAxis-mOffset, position); break;
5812  case atRight: labelAnchor = QPointF(mAxisRect->right()+distanceToAxis+mOffset, position); break;
5813  case atTop: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, mAxisRect->top()-distanceToAxis-mOffset); break;
5814  case atBottom: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, mAxisRect->bottom()+distanceToAxis+mOffset); break;
5815  }
5816  if (parentPlot()->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching)) // label caching enabled
5817  {
5818  if (!mLabelCache.contains(text)) // no cached label exists, create it
5819  {
5820  CachedLabel *newCachedLabel = new CachedLabel;
5821  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
5822  QPointF drawOffset = getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
5823  newCachedLabel->offset = drawOffset+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft();
5824  newCachedLabel->pixmap = QPixmap(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size());
5825  newCachedLabel->pixmap.fill(Qt::transparent);
5826  QCPPainter cachePainter(&newCachedLabel->pixmap);
5827  cachePainter.setPen(painter->pen());
5828  drawTickLabel(&cachePainter, -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().x(), -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().y(), labelData);
5829  mLabelCache.insert(text, newCachedLabel, 1);
5830  }
5831  // draw cached label:
5832  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
5833  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it:
5834  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5835  {
5836  if (labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x()+cachedLabel->pixmap.width() > mParentPlot->viewport().right() ||
5837  labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x() < mParentPlot->viewport().left())
5838  return;
5839  } else
5840  {
5841  if (labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y()+cachedLabel->pixmap.height() > mParentPlot->viewport().bottom() ||
5842  labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y() < mParentPlot->viewport().top())
5843  return;
5844  }
5845  painter->drawPixmap(labelAnchor+cachedLabel->offset, cachedLabel->pixmap);
5846  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
5847  } else // label caching disabled, draw text directly on surface:
5848  {
5849  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
5850  QPointF finalPosition = labelAnchor + getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
5851  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it:
5852  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5853  {
5854  if (finalPosition.x()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.width()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left()) > mParentPlot->viewport().right() ||
5855  finalPosition.x()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left() < mParentPlot->viewport().left())
5856  return;
5857  } else
5858  {
5859  if (finalPosition.y()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.height()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top()) > mParentPlot->viewport().bottom() ||
5860  finalPosition.y()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top() < mParentPlot->viewport().top())
5861  return;
5862  }
5863  drawTickLabel(painter, finalPosition.x(), finalPosition.y(), labelData);
5864  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
5865  }
5866 
5867  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
5868  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
5869  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
5870  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
5871  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
5872 }
5873 
5883 void QCPAxis::drawTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const QCPAxis::TickLabelData &labelData) const
5884 {
5885  // backup painter settings that we're about to change:
5886  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
5887  QFont oldFont = painter->font();
5888 
5889  // transform painter to position/rotation:
5890  painter->translate(x, y);
5891  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation))
5892  painter->rotate(mTickLabelRotation);
5893 
5894  // draw text:
5895  if (!labelData.expPart.isEmpty()) // indicator that beautiful powers must be used
5896  {
5897  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
5898  painter->drawText(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.basePart);
5899  painter->setFont(labelData.expFont);
5900  painter->drawText(labelData.baseBounds.width()+1, 0, labelData.expBounds.width(), labelData.expBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.expPart);
5901  } else
5902  {
5903  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
5904  painter->drawText(0, 0, labelData.totalBounds.width(), labelData.totalBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, labelData.basePart);
5905  }
5906 
5907  // reset painter settings to what it was before:
5908  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
5909  painter->setFont(oldFont);
5910 }
5911 
5920 QCPAxis::TickLabelData QCPAxis::getTickLabelData(const QFont &font, const QString &text) const
5921 {
5922  TickLabelData result;
5923 
5924  // determine whether beautiful decimal powers should be used
5925  bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
5926  int ePos = -1;
5927  if (mAutoTickLabels && mNumberBeautifulPowers && mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
5928  {
5929  ePos = text.indexOf('e');
5930  if (ePos > -1)
5931  useBeautifulPowers = true;
5932  }
5933 
5934  // calculate text bounding rects and do string preparation for beautiful decimal powers:
5935  result.baseFont = font;
5936  result.baseFont.setPointSizeF(result.baseFont.pointSizeF()+0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug for exact point sizes that make the results oscillate due to internal rounding
5937  if (useBeautifulPowers)
5938  {
5939  // split text into parts of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and part that will be drawn as exponent:
5940  result.basePart = text.left(ePos);
5941  // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add multiplication sign and decimal base:
5942  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic && result.basePart == "1")
5943  result.basePart = "10";
5944  else
5945  result.basePart += (mNumberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) + "10";
5946  result.expPart = text.mid(ePos+1);
5947  // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
5948  while (result.expPart.at(1) == '0' && result.expPart.length() > 2) // length > 2 so we leave one zero when numberFormatChar is 'e'
5949  result.expPart.remove(1, 1);
5950  if (result.expPart.at(0) == mPositiveSignChar)
5951  result.expPart.remove(0, 1);
5952  // prepare smaller font for exponent:
5953  result.expFont = font;
5954  result.expFont.setPointSize(result.expFont.pointSize()*0.75);
5955  // calculate bounding rects of base part, exponent part and total one:
5956  result.baseBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.basePart);
5957  result.expBounds = QFontMetrics(result.expFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.expPart);
5958  result.totalBounds = result.baseBounds.adjusted(0, 0, result.expBounds.width()+2, 0); // +2 consists of the 1 pixel spacing between base and exponent (see drawTickLabel) and an extra pixel to include AA
5959  } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
5960  {
5961  result.basePart = text;
5962  result.totalBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, result.basePart);
5963  }
5964  result.totalBounds.moveTopLeft(QPoint(0, 0)); // want bounding box aligned top left at origin, independent of how it was created, to make further processing simpler
5965 
5966  // calculate possibly different bounding rect after rotation:
5967  result.rotatedTotalBounds = result.totalBounds;
5968  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation))
5969  {
5970  QTransform transform;
5971  transform.rotate(mTickLabelRotation);
5972  result.rotatedTotalBounds = transform.mapRect(result.rotatedTotalBounds);
5973  }
5974 
5975  return result;
5976 }
5977 
5988 QPointF QCPAxis::getTickLabelDrawOffset(const QCPAxis::TickLabelData &labelData) const
5989 {
5990  /*
5991  calculate label offset from base point at tick (non-trivial, for best visual appearance): short
5992  explanation for bottom axis: The anchor, i.e. the point in the label that is placed
5993  horizontally under the corresponding tick is always on the label side that is closer to the
5994  axis (e.g. the left side of the text when we're rotating clockwise). On that side, the height
5995  is halved and the resulting point is defined the anchor. This way, a 90 degree rotated text
5996  will be centered under the tick (i.e. displaced horizontally by half its height). At the same
5997  time, a 45 degree rotated text will "point toward" its tick, as is typical for rotated tick
5998  labels.
5999  */
6000  bool doRotation = !qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation);
6001  bool flip = qFuzzyCompare(qAbs(mTickLabelRotation), 90.0); // perfect +/-90 degree flip. Indicates vertical label centering on vertical axes.
6002  double radians = mTickLabelRotation/180.0*M_PI;
6003  int x=0, y=0;
6004  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
6005  {
6006  if (doRotation)
6007  {
6008  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6009  {
6010  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6011  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6012  } else
6013  {
6014  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6015  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6016  }
6017  } else
6018  {
6019  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width();
6020  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6021  }
6022  } else if (mAxisType == atRight)
6023  {
6024  if (doRotation)
6025  {
6026  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6027  {
6028  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6029  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6030  } else
6031  {
6032  x = 0;
6033  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6034  }
6035  } else
6036  {
6037  x = 0;
6038  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6039  }
6040  } else if (mAxisType == atTop)
6041  {
6042  if (doRotation)
6043  {
6044  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6045  {
6046  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()+qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6047  y = -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6048  } else
6049  {
6050  x = -qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6051  y = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6052  }
6053  } else
6054  {
6055  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6056  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height();
6057  }
6058  } else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
6059  {
6060  if (doRotation)
6061  {
6062  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6063  {
6064  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6065  y = 0;
6066  } else
6067  {
6068  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6069  y = +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6070  }
6071  } else
6072  {
6073  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6074  y = 0;
6075  }
6076  }
6077 
6078  return QPointF(x, y);
6079 }
6080 
6088 void QCPAxis::getMaxTickLabelSize(const QFont &font, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize) const
6089 {
6090  // note: this function must return the same tick label sizes as the placeTickLabel function.
6091  QSize finalSize;
6092  if (parentPlot()->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && mLabelCache.contains(text)) // label caching enabled and have cached label
6093  {
6094  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
6095  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
6096  } else // label caching disabled or no label with this text cached:
6097  {
6098  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(font, text);
6099  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
6100  }
6101 
6102  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
6103  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
6104  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
6105  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
6106  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
6107 }
6108 
6109 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6110 void QCPAxis::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
6111 {
6112  Q_UNUSED(event)
6113  SelectablePart part = details.value<SelectablePart>();
6114  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(part))
6115  {
6116  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
6117  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^part : part);
6118  if (selectionStateChanged)
6119  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
6120  }
6121 }
6122 
6123 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6124 void QCPAxis::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
6125 {
6126  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
6127  setSelectedParts(mSelectedParts & ~mSelectableParts);
6128  if (selectionStateChanged)
6129  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
6130 }
6131 
6145 void QCPAxis::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
6146 {
6147  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
6148 }
6149 
6166 void QCPAxis::visibleTickBounds(int &lowIndex, int &highIndex) const
6167 {
6168  bool lowFound = false;
6169  bool highFound = false;
6170  lowIndex = 0;
6171  highIndex = -1;
6172 
6173  for (int i=0; i < mTickVector.size(); ++i)
6174  {
6175  if (mTickVector.at(i) >= mRange.lower)
6176  {
6177  lowFound = true;
6178  lowIndex = i;
6179  break;
6180  }
6181  }
6182  for (int i=mTickVector.size()-1; i >= 0; --i)
6183  {
6184  if (mTickVector.at(i) <= mRange.upper)
6185  {
6186  highFound = true;
6187  highIndex = i;
6188  break;
6189  }
6190  }
6191 
6192  if (!lowFound && highFound)
6193  lowIndex = highIndex+1;
6194  else if (lowFound && !highFound)
6195  highIndex = lowIndex-1;
6196 }
6197 
6206 double QCPAxis::baseLog(double value) const
6207 {
6208  return qLn(value)*mScaleLogBaseLogInv;
6209 }
6210 
6218 double QCPAxis::basePow(double value) const
6219 {
6220  return qPow(mScaleLogBase, value);
6221 }
6222 
6228 QPen QCPAxis::getBasePen() const
6229 {
6230  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
6231 }
6232 
6238 QPen QCPAxis::getTickPen() const
6239 {
6240  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
6241 }
6242 
6248 QPen QCPAxis::getSubTickPen() const
6249 {
6250  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
6251 }
6252 
6258 QFont QCPAxis::getTickLabelFont() const
6259 {
6260  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
6261 }
6262 
6268 QFont QCPAxis::getLabelFont() const
6269 {
6270  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
6271 }
6272 
6278 QColor QCPAxis::getTickLabelColor() const
6279 {
6280  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
6281 }
6282 
6288 QColor QCPAxis::getLabelColor() const
6289 {
6290  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
6291 }
6292 
6307 int QCPAxis::calculateMargin()
6308 {
6309  if (mCachedMarginValid)
6310  return mCachedMargin;
6311 
6312  // run through similar steps as QCPAxis::draw, and caluclate margin needed to fit axis and its labels
6313  int margin = 0;
6314 
6315  if (mVisible)
6316  {
6317  int lowTick, highTick;
6318  visibleTickBounds(lowTick, highTick);
6319  // get length of tick marks pointing outwards:
6320  if (mTicks)
6321  margin += qMax(0, qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut));
6322  // calculate size of tick labels:
6323  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0);
6324  if (mTickLabels)
6325  {
6326  for (int i=lowTick; i<=highTick; ++i)
6327  getMaxTickLabelSize(mTickLabelFont, mTickVectorLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize); // don't use getTickLabelFont() because we don't want margin to possibly change on selection
6328  margin += orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width();
6329  margin += mTickLabelPadding;
6330  }
6331  // calculate size of axis label (only height needed, because left/right labels are rotated by 90 degrees):
6332  if (!mLabel.isEmpty())
6333  {
6334  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mLabelFont); // don't use getLabelFont() because we don't want margin to possibly change on selection
6335  QRect bounds;
6336  bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter, mLabel);
6337  margin += bounds.height() + mLabelPadding;
6338  }
6339  }
6340  margin += mPadding;
6341 
6342  mCachedMargin = margin;
6343  mCachedMarginValid = true;
6344  return margin;
6345 }
6346 
6347 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6348 QCP::Interaction QCPAxis::selectionCategory() const
6349 {
6350  return QCP::iSelectAxes;
6351 }
6352 
6353 
6357 
6424 /* start of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6425 
6465 /* end of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6466 /* start of documentation of signals */
6467 
6474 /* end of documentation of signals */
6475 
6487 QCPAbstractPlottable::QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
6488  QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot(), "", keyAxis->axisRect()),
6489  mName(""),
6490  mAntialiasedFill(true),
6491  mAntialiasedScatters(true),
6492  mAntialiasedErrorBars(false),
6493  mPen(Qt::black),
6494  mSelectedPen(Qt::black),
6495  mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6496  mSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6497  mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
6498  mValueAxis(valueAxis),
6499  mSelectable(true),
6500  mSelected(false)
6501 {
6502  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
6503  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
6504  if (keyAxis->orientation() == valueAxis->orientation())
6505  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keyAxis and valueAxis must be orthogonal to each other.";
6506 }

6683 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const
6684 {
6685  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
6686  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
6687 }
6688 
6694 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
6695 {
6696  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6697  if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
6698 
6699  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
6700  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
6701  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
6702 
6703  bool validRange;
6704  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(validRange, signDomain);
6705  if (validRange)
6706  {
6707  if (onlyEnlarge)
6708  {
6709  if (keyAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
6710  newRange.lower = keyAxis->range().lower;
6711  if (keyAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
6712  newRange.upper = keyAxis->range().upper;
6713  }
6714  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
6715  }
6716 }
6717 
6723 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
6724 {
6725  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6726  if (!valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis"; return; }
6727 
6728  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
6729  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
6730  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
6731 
6732  bool validRange;
6733  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(validRange, signDomain);
6734 
6735  if (validRange)
6736  {
6737  if (onlyEnlarge)
6738  {
6739  if (valueAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
6740  newRange.lower = valueAxis->range().lower;
6741  if (valueAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
6742  newRange.upper = valueAxis->range().upper;
6743  }
6744  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
6745  }
6746 }
6747 
6760 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend()
6761 {
6762  if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
6763  return false;
6764 
6765  if (!mParentPlot->legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this))
6766  {
6767  mParentPlot->legend->addItem(new QCPPlottableLegendItem(mParentPlot->legend, this));
6768  return true;
6769  } else
6770  return false;
6771 }
6772 
6783 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend() const
6784 {
6785  if (!mParentPlot->legend)
6786  return false;
6787 
6788  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *lip = mParentPlot->legend->itemWithPlottable(this))
6789  return mParentPlot->legend->removeItem(lip);
6790  else
6791  return false;
6792 }
6793 
6794 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6795 QRect QCPAbstractPlottable::clipRect() const
6796 {
6797  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
6798  return mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect() & mValueAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect();
6799  else
6800  return QRect();
6801 }

6807 }
6808 
6819 void QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const
6820 {
6821  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6822  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6823  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
6824 
6825  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
6826  {
6827  x = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
6828  y = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
6829  } else
6830  {
6831  y = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
6832  x = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
6833  }
6834 }
6835 
6841 const QPointF QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const
6842 {
6843  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6844  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6845  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
6846 
6847  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
6848  return QPointF(keyAxis->coordToPixel(key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(value));
6849  else
6850  return QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(key));
6851 }
6852 
6863 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key, double &value) const
6864 {
6865  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6866  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6867  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
6868 
6869  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
6870  {
6871  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
6872  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
6873  } else
6874  {
6875  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
6876  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
6877  }
6878 }
6879 
6885 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key, double &value) const
6886 {
6887  pixelsToCoords(pixelPos.x(), pixelPos.y(), key, value);
6888 }

6975 
6986 double QCPAbstractPlottable::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
6987 {
6988  QVector2D a(start);
6989  QVector2D b(end);
6990  QVector2D p(point);
6991  QVector2D v(b-a);
6992 
6993  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
6994  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
6995  {
6996  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
6997  if (mu < 0)
6998  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
6999  else if (mu > 1)
7000  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
7001  else
7002  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
7003  } else
7004  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7005 }
7006 
7007 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7008 void QCPAbstractPlottable::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
7009 {
7010  Q_UNUSED(event)
7011  Q_UNUSED(details)
7012  if (mSelectable)
7013  {
7014  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7015  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
7016  if (selectionStateChanged)
7017  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7018  }
7019 }
7020 
7021 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7022 void QCPAbstractPlottable::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
7023 {
7024  if (mSelectable)
7025  {
7026  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7027  setSelected(false);
7028  if (selectionStateChanged)
7029  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7030  }
7031 }

7033 
7037 
7064 QCPItemAnchor::QCPItemAnchor(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name, int anchorId) :
7065  mName(name),
7066  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
7067  mParentItem(parentItem),
7068  mAnchorId(anchorId)
7069 {
7070 }
7071 
7072 QCPItemAnchor::~QCPItemAnchor()
7073 {
7074  // unregister as parent at children:
7075  QList<QCPItemPosition*> currentChildren(mChildren.toList());
7076  for (int i=0; i<currentChildren.size(); ++i)
7077  currentChildren.at(i)->setParentAnchor(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildren
7078 }
7079 
7086 QPointF QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint() const
7087 {
7088  if (mParentItem)
7089  {
7090  if (mAnchorId > -1)
7091  {
7092  return mParentItem->anchorPixelPoint(mAnchorId);
7093  } else
7094  {
7095  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no valid anchor id set:" << mAnchorId;
7096  return QPointF();
7097  }
7098  } else
7099  {
7100  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent item set";
7101  return QPointF();
7102  }
7103 }
7104 
7112 void QCPItemAnchor::addChild(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7113 {
7114  if (!mChildren.contains(pos))
7115  mChildren.insert(pos);
7116  else
7117  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7118 }
7119 
7126 void QCPItemAnchor::removeChild(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7127 {
7128  if (!mChildren.remove(pos))
7129  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7130 }
7131 
7132 
7136 
7168 QCPItemPosition::QCPItemPosition(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name) :
7169  QCPItemAnchor(parentPlot, parentItem, name),
7170  mPositionType(ptAbsolute),
7171  mKey(0),
7172  mValue(0),
7173  mParentAnchor(0)
7174 {
7175 }
7176 
7177 QCPItemPosition::~QCPItemPosition()
7178 {
7179  // unregister as parent at children:
7180  // Note: this is done in ~QCPItemAnchor again, but it's important QCPItemPosition does it itself, because only then
7181  // the setParentAnchor(0) call the correct QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint function instead of QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint
7182  QList<QCPItemPosition*> currentChildren(mChildren.toList());
7183  for (int i=0; i<currentChildren.size(); ++i)
7184  currentChildren.at(i)->setParentAnchor(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildren
7185  // unregister as child in parent:
7186  if (mParentAnchor)
7187  mParentAnchor->removeChild(this);
7188 }
7189 
7212 void QCPItemPosition::setType(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
7213 {
7214  if (mPositionType != type)
7215  {
7216  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
7217  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPoint() because it would output a qDebug warning.
7218  bool recoverPixelPosition = true;
7219  if ((mPositionType == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
7220  recoverPixelPosition = false;
7221  if ((mPositionType == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
7222  recoverPixelPosition = false;
7223 
7224  QPointF pixelP;
7225  if (recoverPixelPosition)
7226  pixelP = pixelPoint();
7227 
7228  mPositionType = type;
7229 
7230  if (recoverPixelPosition)
7231  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
7232  }
7233 }
7234 
7250 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchor(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
7251 {
7252  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
7253  if (parentAnchor == this)
7254  {
7255  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7256  return false;
7257  }
7258  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
7259  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
7260  while (currentParent)
7261  {
7262  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
7263  {
7264  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
7265  if (currentParentPos == this)
7266  {
7267  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7268  return false;
7269  }
7270  currentParent = currentParentPos->mParentAnchor;
7271  } else
7272  {
7273  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
7274  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
7275  // because they're both on the same item:
7276  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
7277  {
7278  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7279  return false;
7280  }
7281  break;
7282  }
7283  }
7284 
7285  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
7286  if (!mParentAnchor && mPositionType == ptPlotCoords)
7287  setType(ptAbsolute);
7288 
7289  // save pixel position:
7290  QPointF pixelP;
7291  if (keepPixelPosition)
7292  pixelP = pixelPoint();
7293  // unregister at current parent anchor:
7294  if (mParentAnchor)
7295  mParentAnchor->removeChild(this);
7296  // register at new parent anchor:
7297  if (parentAnchor)
7298  parentAnchor->addChild(this);
7299  mParentAnchor = parentAnchor;
7300  // restore pixel position under new parent:
7301  if (keepPixelPosition)
7302  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
7303  else
7304  setCoords(0, 0);
7305  return true;
7306 }
7307 
7321 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(double key, double value)
7322 {
7323  mKey = key;
7324  mValue = value;
7325 }
7326 
7332 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(const QPointF &pos)
7333 {
7334  setCoords(pos.x(), pos.y());
7335 }
7336 
7343 QPointF QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint() const
7344 {
7345  switch (mPositionType)
7346  {
7347  case ptAbsolute:
7348  {
7349  if (mParentAnchor)
7350  return QPointF(mKey, mValue) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7351  else
7352  return QPointF(mKey, mValue);
7353  }
7354 
7355  case ptViewportRatio:
7356  {
7357  if (mParentAnchor)
7358  {
7359  return QPointF(mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width(),
7360  mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height()) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7361  } else
7362  {
7363  return QPointF(mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width(),
7364  mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height()) + mParentPlot->viewport().topLeft();
7365  }
7366  }
7367 
7368  case ptAxisRectRatio:
7369  {
7370  if (mAxisRect)
7371  {
7372  if (mParentAnchor)
7373  {
7374  return QPointF(mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width(),
7375  mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height()) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7376  } else
7377  {
7378  return QPointF(mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width(),
7379  mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height()) + mAxisRect.data()->topLeft();
7380  }
7381  } else
7382  {
7383  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axis rect defined";
7384  return QPointF(mKey, mValue);
7385  }
7386  }
7387 
7388  case ptPlotCoords:
7389  {
7390  double x, y;
7391  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7392  {
7393  // both key and value axis are given, translate key/value to x/y coordinates:
7394  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7395  {
7396  x = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7397  y = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7398  } else
7399  {
7400  y = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7401  x = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7402  }
7403  } else if (mKeyAxis)
7404  {
7405  // only key axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to key coordinate, other stays pixel:
7406  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7407  {
7408  x = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7409  y = mValue;
7410  } else
7411  {
7412  y = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7413  x = mValue;
7414  }
7415  } else if (mValueAxis)
7416  {
7417  // only value axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to value coordinate, other stays pixel:
7418  if (mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7419  {
7420  x = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7421  y = mKey;
7422  } else
7423  {
7424  y = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7425  x = mKey;
7426  }
7427  } else
7428  {
7429  // no axis given, basically the same as if mPositionType were ptAbsolute
7430  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axes defined";
7431  x = mKey;
7432  y = mValue;
7433  }
7434  return QPointF(x, y);
7435  }
7436  }
7437  return QPointF();
7438 }
7439 
7445 void QCPItemPosition::setAxes(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
7446 {
7447  mKeyAxis = keyAxis;
7448  mValueAxis = valueAxis;
7449 }
7450 
7456 void QCPItemPosition::setAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *axisRect)
7457 {
7458  mAxisRect = axisRect;
7459 }
7460 
7471 void QCPItemPosition::setPixelPoint(const QPointF &pixelPoint)
7472 {
7473  switch (mPositionType)
7474  {
7475  case ptAbsolute:
7476  {
7477  if (mParentAnchor)
7478  setCoords(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7479  else
7480  setCoords(pixelPoint);
7481  break;
7482  }
7483 
7484  case ptViewportRatio:
7485  {
7486  if (mParentAnchor)
7487  {
7488  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7489  p.rx() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
7490  p.ry() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
7491  setCoords(p);
7492  } else
7493  {
7494  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentPlot->viewport().topLeft());
7495  p.rx() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
7496  p.ry() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
7497  setCoords(p);
7498  }
7499  break;
7500  }
7501 
7502  case ptAxisRectRatio:
7503  {
7504  if (mAxisRect)
7505  {
7506  if (mParentAnchor)
7507  {
7508  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7509  p.rx() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
7510  p.ry() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
7511  setCoords(p);
7512  } else
7513  {
7514  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mAxisRect.data()->topLeft());
7515  p.rx() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
7516  p.ry() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
7517  setCoords(p);
7518  }
7519  } else
7520  {
7521  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axis rect defined";
7522  setCoords(pixelPoint);
7523  }
7524  break;
7525  }
7526 
7527  case ptPlotCoords:
7528  {
7529  double newKey, newValue;
7530  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7531  {
7532  // both key and value axis are given, translate point to key/value coordinates:
7533  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7534  {
7535  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7536  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7537  } else
7538  {
7539  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7540  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7541  }
7542  } else if (mKeyAxis)
7543  {
7544  // only key axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to key coordinate, other stays pixel:
7545  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7546  {
7547  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7548  newValue = pixelPoint.y();
7549  } else
7550  {
7551  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7552  newValue = pixelPoint.x();
7553  }
7554  } else if (mValueAxis)
7555  {
7556  // only value axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to value coordinate, other stays pixel:
7557  if (mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7558  {
7559  newKey = pixelPoint.y();
7560  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7561  } else
7562  {
7563  newKey = pixelPoint.x();
7564  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7565  }
7566  } else
7567  {
7568  // no axis given, basically the same as if mPositionType were ptAbsolute
7569  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axes defined";
7570  newKey = pixelPoint.x();
7571  newValue = pixelPoint.y();
7572  }
7573  setCoords(newKey, newValue);
7574  break;
7575  }
7576  }
7577 }
7578 
7579 
7583 
7706 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
7707 
7723 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
7724 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
7725 
7736 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
7737 /* start documentation of signals */
7738 
7744 /* end documentation of signals */
7745 
7749 QCPAbstractItem::QCPAbstractItem(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
7750  QCPLayerable(parentPlot),
7751  mClipToAxisRect(false),
7752  mSelectable(true),
7753  mSelected(false)
7754 {
7755  QList<QCPAxisRect*> rects = parentPlot->axisRects();
7756  if (rects.size() > 0)
7757  {
7758  setClipToAxisRect(true);
7759  setClipAxisRect(rects.first());
7760  }
7761 }
7762 
7763 QCPAbstractItem::~QCPAbstractItem()
7764 {
7765  // don't delete mPositions because every position is also an anchor and thus in mAnchors
7766  qDeleteAll(mAnchors);
7767 }
7768 
7775 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipToAxisRect(bool clip)
7776 {
7777  mClipToAxisRect = clip;
7778  if (mClipToAxisRect)
7779  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
7780 }
7781 
7788 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *rect)
7789 {
7790  mClipAxisRect = rect;
7791  if (mClipToAxisRect)
7792  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
7793 }
7794 
7804 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
7805 {
7806  mSelectable = selectable;
7807 }
7808 
7823 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelected(bool selected)
7824 {
7825  if (mSelected != selected)
7826  {
7827  mSelected = selected;
7828  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
7829  }
7830 }
7831 
7842 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::position(const QString &name) const
7843 {
7844  for (int i=0; i<mPositions.size(); ++i)
7845  {
7846  if (mPositions.at(i)->name() == name)
7847  return mPositions.at(i);
7848  }
7849  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "position with name not found:" << name;
7850  return 0;
7851 }
7852 
7863 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::anchor(const QString &name) const
7864 {
7865  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
7866  {
7867  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
7868  return mAnchors.at(i);
7869  }
7870  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor with name not found:" << name;
7871  return 0;
7872 }
7873 
7882 bool QCPAbstractItem::hasAnchor(const QString &name) const
7883 {
7884  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
7885  {
7886  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
7887  return true;
7888  }
7889  return false;
7890 }
7891 
7901 QRect QCPAbstractItem::clipRect() const
7902 {
7903  if (mClipToAxisRect && mClipAxisRect)
7904  return mClipAxisRect.data()->rect();
7905  else
7906  return mParentPlot->viewport();
7907 }
7908 
7922 void QCPAbstractItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7923 {
7924  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeItems);
7925 }
7926 
7939 double QCPAbstractItem::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
7940 {
7941  QVector2D a(start);
7942  QVector2D b(end);
7943  QVector2D p(point);
7944  QVector2D v(b-a);
7945 
7946  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
7947  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
7948  {
7949  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
7950  if (mu < 0)
7951  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7952  else if (mu > 1)
7953  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
7954  else
7955  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
7956  } else
7957  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7958 }
7959 
7977 double QCPAbstractItem::rectSelectTest(const QRectF &rect, const QPointF &pos, bool filledRect) const
7978 {
7979  double result = -1;
7980 
7981  // distance to border:
7982  QList<QLineF> lines;
7983  lines << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.topRight()) << QLineF(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.bottomRight())
7984  << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.bottomLeft()) << QLineF(rect.topRight(), rect.bottomRight());
7985  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
7986  for (int i=0; i<lines.size(); ++i)
7987  {
7988  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(lines.at(i).p1(), lines.at(i).p2(), pos);
7989  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
7990  minDistSqr = distSqr;
7991  }
7992  result = qSqrt(minDistSqr);
7993 
7994  // filled rect, allow click inside to count as hit:
7995  if (filledRect && result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99)
7996  {
7997  if (rect.contains(pos))
7998  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
7999  }
8000  return result;
8001 }
8002 
8013 QPointF QCPAbstractItem::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
8014 {
8015  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called on item which shouldn't have any anchors (this method not reimplemented). anchorId" << anchorId;
8016  return QPointF();
8017 }
8018 
8033 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::createPosition(const QString &name)
8034 {
8035  if (hasAnchor(name))
8036  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8037  QCPItemPosition *newPosition = new QCPItemPosition(mParentPlot, this, name);
8038  mPositions.append(newPosition);
8039  mAnchors.append(newPosition); // every position is also an anchor
8040  newPosition->setAxes(mParentPlot->xAxis, mParentPlot->yAxis);
8041  newPosition->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
8042  if (mParentPlot->axisRect())
8043  newPosition->setAxisRect(mParentPlot->axisRect());
8044  newPosition->setCoords(0, 0);
8045  return newPosition;
8046 }
8047 
8067 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::createAnchor(const QString &name, int anchorId)
8068 {
8069  if (hasAnchor(name))
8070  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8071  QCPItemAnchor *newAnchor = new QCPItemAnchor(mParentPlot, this, name, anchorId);
8072  mAnchors.append(newAnchor);
8073  return newAnchor;
8074 }
8075 
8076 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8077 void QCPAbstractItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
8078 {
8079  Q_UNUSED(event)
8080  Q_UNUSED(details)
8081  if (mSelectable)
8082  {
8083  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8084  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
8085  if (selectionStateChanged)
8086  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8087  }
8088 }
8089 
8090 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8091 void QCPAbstractItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
8092 {
8093  if (mSelectable)
8094  {
8095  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8096  setSelected(false);
8097  if (selectionStateChanged)
8098  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8099  }
8100 }
8101 
8102 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8103 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractItem::selectionCategory() const
8104 {
8105  return QCP::iSelectItems;
8106 }

8300 
8313 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
8314 
8336 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
8337 /* start of documentation of signals */
8338 
8526 /* end of documentation of signals */
8527 
8531 QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent) :
8532  QWidget(parent),
8533  xAxis(0),
8534  yAxis(0),
8535  xAxis2(0),
8536  yAxis2(0),
8537  legend(0),
8538  mPlotLayout(0),
8539  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true),
8540  mAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
8541  mNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
8542  mInteractions(0),
8543  mSelectionTolerance(8),
8544  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false),
8545  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::white, Qt::SolidPattern),
8546  mBackgroundScaled(true),
8547  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
8548  mCurrentLayer(0),
8549  mPlottingHints(QCP::phCacheLabels),
8550  mMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier),
8551  mPaintBuffer(size()),
8552  mMouseEventElement(0),
8553  mReplotting(false)
8554 {
8555  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
8556  setAttribute(Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent);
8557  setMouseTracking(true);
8558  QLocale currentLocale = locale();
8559  currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
8560  setLocale(currentLocale);
8561 
8562  // create initial layers:
8563  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "background"));
8564  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "grid"));
8565  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "main"));
8566  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "axes"));
8567  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "legend"));
8568  updateLayerIndices();
8569  setCurrentLayer("main");
8570 
8571  // create initial layout, axis rect and legend:
8572  mPlotLayout = new QCPLayoutGrid;
8573  mPlotLayout->initializeParentPlot(this);
8574  mPlotLayout->setParent(this); // important because if parent is QWidget, QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged will call QWidget::updateGeometry
8575  QCPAxisRect *defaultAxisRect = new QCPAxisRect(this, true);
8576  mPlotLayout->addElement(0, 0, defaultAxisRect);
8577  xAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
8578  yAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
8579  xAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
8580  yAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
8581  legend = new QCPLegend;
8582  legend->setVisible(false);
8583  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->addElement(legend, Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
8584  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->setMargins(QMargins(12, 12, 12, 12));
8585 
8586  defaultAxisRect->setLayer("background");
8587  xAxis->setLayer("axes");
8588  yAxis->setLayer("axes");
8589  xAxis2->setLayer("axes");
8590  yAxis2->setLayer("axes");
8591  xAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8592  yAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8593  xAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8594  yAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8595  legend->setLayer("legend");
8596 
8597  setViewport(rect()); // needs to be called after mPlotLayout has been created
8598 
8599 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
8600  setPlottingHint(QCP::phForceRepaint);
8601 #endif
8602 
8603  replot();
8604 }
8605 
8606 QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot()
8607 {
8608  clearPlottables();
8609  clearItems();
8610 
8611  if (mPlotLayout)
8612  {
8613  delete mPlotLayout;
8614  mPlotLayout = 0;
8615  }
8616 
8617  mCurrentLayer = 0;
8618  qDeleteAll(mLayers); // don't use removeLayer, because it would prevent the last layer to be removed
8619  mLayers.clear();
8620 }
8621 
8639 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements)
8640 {
8641  mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
8642 
8643  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8644  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8645  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
8646 }
8647 
8655 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled)
8656 {
8657  if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
8658  mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
8659  else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
8660  mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
8661 
8662  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8663  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8664  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
8665 }
8666 
8685 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements)
8686 {
8687  mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
8688 
8689  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8690  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8691  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
8692 }
8693 
8701 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled)
8702 {
8703  if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
8704  mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
8705  else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
8706  mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
8707 
8708  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8709  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8710  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
8711 }
8712 
8719 void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on)
8720 {
8721  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
8722 }
8723 
8778 void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const QCP::Interactions &interactions)
8779 {
8780  mInteractions = interactions;
8781 }
8782 
8790 void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCP::Interaction &interaction, bool enabled)
8791 {
8792  if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
8793  mInteractions &= ~interaction;
8794  else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
8795  mInteractions |= interaction;
8796 }
8797 
8811 void QCustomPlot::setSelectionTolerance(int pixels)
8812 {
8813  mSelectionTolerance = pixels;
8814 }
8815 
8825 void QCustomPlot::setNoAntialiasingOnDrag(bool enabled)
8826 {
8827  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
8828 }
8829 
8835 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints)
8836 {
8837  mPlottingHints = hints;
8838 }
8839 
8845 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled)
8846 {
8847  QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
8848  if (!enabled)
8849  newHints &= ~hint;
8850  else
8851  newHints |= hint;
8852 
8853  if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
8854  setPlottingHints(newHints);
8855 }
8856 
8867 void QCustomPlot::setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::KeyboardModifier modifier)
8868 {
8869  mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
8870 }
8871 
8879 void QCustomPlot::setViewport(const QRect &rect)
8880 {
8881  mViewport = rect;
8882  if (mPlotLayout)
8883  mPlotLayout->setOuterRect(mViewport);
8884 }
8885 
8901 void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
8902 {
8903  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
8904  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
8905 }
8906 
8920 void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QBrush &brush)
8921 {
8922  mBackgroundBrush = brush;
8923 }
8924 
8932 void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
8933 {
8934  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
8935  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
8936  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
8937  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
8938 }
8939 
8950 void QCustomPlot::setBackgroundScaled(bool scaled)
8951 {
8952  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
8953 }
8954 
8961 void QCustomPlot::setBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
8962 {
8963  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
8964 }
8965 
8974 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable(int index)
8975 {
8976  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
8977  {
8978  return mPlottables.at(index);
8979  } else
8980  {
8981  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
8982  return 0;
8983  }
8984 }
8985 
8993 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable()
8994 {
8995  if (!mPlottables.isEmpty())
8996  {
8997  return mPlottables.last();
8998  } else
8999  return 0;
9000 }
9001 
9012 bool QCustomPlot::addPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
9013 {
9014  if (mPlottables.contains(plottable))
9015  {
9016  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9017  return false;
9018  }
9019  if (plottable->parentPlot() != this)
9020  {
9021  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9022  return false;
9023  }
9024 
9025  mPlottables.append(plottable);
9026  // possibly add plottable to legend:
9027  if (mAutoAddPlottableToLegend)
9028  plottable->addToLegend();
9029  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
9030  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
9031  mGraphs.append(graph);
9032  if (!plottable->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable constructor)
9033  plottable->setLayer(currentLayer());
9034  return true;
9035 }
9036 
9044 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
9045 {
9046  if (!mPlottables.contains(plottable))
9047  {
9048  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9049  return false;
9050  }
9051 
9052  // remove plottable from legend:
9053  plottable->removeFromLegend();
9054  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
9055  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
9056  mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
9057  // remove plottable:
9058  delete plottable;
9059  mPlottables.removeOne(plottable);
9060  return true;
9061 }
9062 
9067 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(int index)
9068 {
9069  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
9070  return removePlottable(mPlottables[index]);
9071  else
9072  {
9073  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9074  return false;
9075  }
9076 }
9077 
9085 int QCustomPlot::clearPlottables()
9086 {
9087  int c = mPlottables.size();
9088  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
9089  removePlottable(mPlottables[i]);
9090  return c;
9091 }
9092 
9098 int QCustomPlot::plottableCount() const
9099 {
9100  return mPlottables.size();
9101 }
9102 
9110 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCustomPlot::selectedPlottables() const
9111 {
9112  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
9113  for (int i=0; i<mPlottables.size(); ++i)
9114  {
9115  if (mPlottables.at(i)->selected())
9116  result.append(mPlottables.at(i));
9117  }
9118  return result;
9119 }
9120 
9133 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
9134 {
9135  QCPAbstractPlottable *resultPlottable = 0;
9136  double resultDistance = mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize with that value
9137 
9138  for (int i=0; i<mPlottables.size(); ++i)
9139  {
9140  QCPAbstractPlottable *currentPlottable = mPlottables.at(i);
9141  if (onlySelectable && !currentPlottable->selectable()) // we could have also passed onlySelectable to the selectTest function, but checking here is faster, because we have access to QCPabstractPlottable::selectable
9142  continue;
9143  if ((currentPlottable->keyAxis()->axisRect()->rect() & currentPlottable->valueAxis()->axisRect()->rect()).contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside the rect that is spanned by the plottable's key/value axes
9144  {
9145  double currentDistance = currentPlottable->selectTest(pos, false);
9146  if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance)
9147  {
9148  resultPlottable = currentPlottable;
9149  resultDistance = currentDistance;
9150  }
9151  }
9152  }
9153
