12486  for (int i=0; i<data->size(); ++i)
12487  {
12488  if (data->at(i).y() < y)
12489  {
12490  if (i>0)
12491  return i-1;
12492  else
12493  return 0;
12494  }
12495  }
12496  return -1;
12497 }
12498 
12509 double QCPGraph::pointDistance(const QPointF &pixelPoint) const
12510 {
12511  if (mData->isEmpty())
12512  {
12513  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "requested point distance on graph" << mName << "without data";
12514  return 500;
12515  }
12516  if (mData->size() == 1)
12517  {
12518  QPointF dataPoint = coordsToPixels(mData->constBegin().key(), mData->constBegin().value().value);
12519  return QVector2D(dataPoint-pixelPoint).length();
12520  }
12521 
12522  if (mLineStyle == lsNone && mScatterStyle.isNone())
12523  return 500;
12524 
12525  // calculate minimum distances to graph representation:
12526  if (mLineStyle == lsNone)
12527  {
12528  // no line displayed, only calculate distance to scatter points:
12529  QVector<QCPData> *pointData = new QVector<QCPData>;
12530  getScatterPlotData(pointData);
12531  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
12532  QPointF ptA;
12533  QPointF ptB = coordsToPixels(pointData->at(0).key, pointData->at(0).value); // getScatterPlotData returns in plot coordinates, so transform to pixels
12534  for (int i=1; i<pointData->size(); ++i)
12535  {
12536  ptA = ptB;
12537  ptB = coordsToPixels(pointData->at(i).key, pointData->at(i).value);
12538  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(ptA, ptB, pixelPoint);
12539  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
12540  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
12541  }
12542  delete pointData;
12543  return sqrt(minDistSqr);
12544  } else
12545  {
12546  // line displayed calculate distance to line segments:
12547  QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
12548  getPlotData(lineData, 0); // unlike with getScatterPlotData we get pixel coordinates here
12549  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
12550  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse)
12551  {
12552  // impulse plot differs from other line styles in that the lineData points are only pairwise connected:
12553  for (int i=0; i<lineData->size()-1; i+=2) // iterate pairs
12554  {
12555  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(lineData->at(i), lineData->at(i+1), pixelPoint);
12556  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
12557  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
12558  }
12559  } else
12560  {
12561  // all other line plots (line and step) connect points directly:
12562  for (int i=0; i<lineData->size()-1; ++i)
12563  {
12564  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(lineData->at(i), lineData->at(i+1), pixelPoint);
12565  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
12566  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
12567  }
12568  }
12569  delete lineData;
12570  return sqrt(minDistSqr);
12571  }
12572 }
12573 
12582 int QCPGraph::findIndexBelowY(const QVector<QPointF> *data, double y) const
12583 {
12584  for (int i=data->size()-1; i>=0; --i)
12585  {
12586  if (data->at(i).y() > y)
12587  {
12588  if (i<data->size()-1)
12589  return i+1;
12590  else
12591  return data->size()-1;
12592  }
12593  }
12594  return -1;
12595 }
12596 
12597 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12598 QCPRange QCPGraph::getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
12599 {
12600  // just call the specialized version which takes an additional argument whether error bars
12601  // should also be taken into consideration for range calculation. We set this to true here.
12602  return getKeyRange(validRange, inSignDomain, true);
12603 }
12604 
12605 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12606 QCPRange QCPGraph::getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
12607 {
12608  // just call the specialized version which takes an additional argument whether error bars
12609  // should also be taken into consideration for range calculation. We set this to true here.
12610  return getValueRange(validRange, inSignDomain, true);
12611 }
12612 
12619 QCPRange QCPGraph::getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain, bool includeErrors) const
12620 {
12621  QCPRange range;
12622  bool haveLower = false;
12623  bool haveUpper = false;
12624 
12625  double current, currentErrorMinus, currentErrorPlus;
12626 
12627  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth) // range may be anywhere
12628  {
12629  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
12630  while (it != mData->constEnd())
12631  {
12632  current = it.value().key;
12633  currentErrorMinus = (includeErrors ? it.value().keyErrorMinus : 0);
12634  currentErrorPlus = (includeErrors ? it.value().keyErrorPlus : 0);
12635  if (current-currentErrorMinus < range.lower || !haveLower)
12636  {
12637  range.lower = current-currentErrorMinus;
12638  haveLower = true;
12639  }
12640  if (current+currentErrorPlus > range.upper || !haveUpper)
12641  {
12642  range.upper = current+currentErrorPlus;
12643  haveUpper = true;
12644  }
12645  ++it;
12646  }
12647  } else if (inSignDomain == sdNegative) // range may only be in the negative sign domain
12648  {
12649  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
12650  while (it != mData->constEnd())
12651  {
12652  current = it.value().key;
12653  currentErrorMinus = (includeErrors ? it.value().keyErrorMinus : 0);
12654  currentErrorPlus = (includeErrors ? it.value().keyErrorPlus : 0);
12655  if ((current-currentErrorMinus < range.lower || !haveLower) && current-currentErrorMinus < 0)
12656  {
12657  range.lower = current-currentErrorMinus;
12658  haveLower = true;
12659  }
12660  if ((current+currentErrorPlus > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current+currentErrorPlus < 0)
12661  {
12662  range.upper = current+currentErrorPlus;
12663  haveUpper = true;
12664  }
12665  if (includeErrors) // in case point is in valid sign domain but errobars stretch beyond it, we still want to geht that point.
12666  {
12667  if ((current < range.lower || !haveLower) && current < 0)
12668  {
12669  range.lower = current;
12670  haveLower = true;
12671  }
12672  if ((current > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current < 0)
12673  {
12674  range.upper = current;
12675  haveUpper = true;
12676  }
12677  }
12678  ++it;
12679  }
12680  } else if (inSignDomain == sdPositive) // range may only be in the positive sign domain
12681  {
12682  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
12683  while (it != mData->constEnd())
12684  {
12685  current = it.value().key;
12686  currentErrorMinus = (includeErrors ? it.value().keyErrorMinus : 0);
12687  currentErrorPlus = (includeErrors ? it.value().keyErrorPlus : 0);
12688  if ((current-currentErrorMinus < range.lower || !haveLower) && current-currentErrorMinus > 0)
12689  {
12690  range.lower = current-currentErrorMinus;
12691  haveLower = true;
12692  }
12693  if ((current+currentErrorPlus > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current+currentErrorPlus > 0)
12694  {
12695  range.upper = current+currentErrorPlus;
12696  haveUpper = true;
12697  }
12698  if (includeErrors) // in case point is in valid sign domain but errobars stretch beyond it, we still want to get that point.
12699  {
12700  if ((current < range.lower || !haveLower) && current > 0)
12701  {
12702  range.lower = current;
12703  haveLower = true;
12704  }
12705  if ((current > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current > 0)
12706  {
12707  range.upper = current;
12708  haveUpper = true;
12709  }
12710  }
12711  ++it;
12712  }
12713  }
12714 
12715  validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
12716  return range;
12717 }
12718 
12725 QCPRange QCPGraph::getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain, bool includeErrors) const
12726 {
12727  QCPRange range;
12728  bool haveLower = false;
12729  bool haveUpper = false;
12730 
12731  double current, currentErrorMinus, currentErrorPlus;
12732 
12733  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth) // range may be anywhere
12734  {
12735  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
12736  while (it != mData->constEnd())
12737  {
12738  current = it.value().value;
12739  currentErrorMinus = (includeErrors ? it.value().valueErrorMinus : 0);
12740  currentErrorPlus = (includeErrors ? it.value().valueErrorPlus : 0);
12741  if (current-currentErrorMinus < range.lower || !haveLower)
12742  {
12743  range.lower = current-currentErrorMinus;
12744  haveLower = true;
12745  }
12746  if (current+currentErrorPlus > range.upper || !haveUpper)
12747  {
12748  range.upper = current+currentErrorPlus;
12749  haveUpper = true;
12750  }
12751  ++it;
12752  }
12753  } else if (inSignDomain == sdNegative) // range may only be in the negative sign domain
12754  {
12755  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
12756  while (it != mData->constEnd())
12757  {
12758  current = it.value().value;
12759  currentErrorMinus = (includeErrors ? it.value().valueErrorMinus : 0);
12760  currentErrorPlus = (includeErrors ? it.value().valueErrorPlus : 0);
12761  if ((current-currentErrorMinus < range.lower || !haveLower) && current-currentErrorMinus < 0)
12762  {
12763  range.lower = current-currentErrorMinus;
12764  haveLower = true;
12765  }
12766  if ((current+currentErrorPlus > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current+currentErrorPlus < 0)
12767  {
12768  range.upper = current+currentErrorPlus;
12769  haveUpper = true;
12770  }
12771  if (includeErrors) // in case point is in valid sign domain but errobars stretch beyond it, we still want to get that point.
12772  {
12773  if ((current < range.lower || !haveLower) && current < 0)
12774  {
12775  range.lower = current;
12776  haveLower = true;
12777  }
12778  if ((current > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current < 0)
12779  {
12780  range.upper = current;
12781  haveUpper = true;
12782  }
12783  }
12784  ++it;
12785  }
12786  } else if (inSignDomain == sdPositive) // range may only be in the positive sign domain
12787  {
12788  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
12789  while (it != mData->constEnd())
12790  {
12791  current = it.value().value;
12792  currentErrorMinus = (includeErrors ? it.value().valueErrorMinus : 0);
12793  currentErrorPlus = (includeErrors ? it.value().valueErrorPlus : 0);
12794  if ((current-currentErrorMinus < range.lower || !haveLower) && current-currentErrorMinus > 0)
12795  {
12796  range.lower = current-currentErrorMinus;
12797  haveLower = true;
12798  }
12799  if ((current+currentErrorPlus > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current+currentErrorPlus > 0)
12800  {
12801  range.upper = current+currentErrorPlus;
12802  haveUpper = true;
12803  }
12804  if (includeErrors) // in case point is in valid sign domain but errobars stretch beyond it, we still want to geht that point.
12805  {
12806  if ((current < range.lower || !haveLower) && current > 0)
12807  {
12808  range.lower = current;
12809  haveLower = true;
12810  }
12811  if ((current > range.upper || !haveUpper) && current > 0)
12812  {
12813  range.upper = current;
12814  haveUpper = true;
12815  }
12816  }
12817  ++it;
12818  }
12819  }
12820 
12821  validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
12822  return range;
12823 }
12824 
12825 
12829 
12846 QCPCurveData::QCPCurveData() :
12847  t(0),
12848  key(0),
12849  value(0)
12850 {
12851 }
12852 
12856 QCPCurveData::QCPCurveData(double t, double key, double value) :
12857  t(t),
12858  key(key),
12859  value(value)
12860 {
12861 }
12862

12867 
12909 QCPCurve::QCPCurve(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
12910  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis)
12911 {
12912  mData = new QCPCurveDataMap;
12913  mPen.setColor(Qt::blue);
12914  mPen.setStyle(Qt::SolidLine);
12915  mBrush.setColor(Qt::blue);
12916  mBrush.setStyle(Qt::NoBrush);
12917  mSelectedPen = mPen;
12918  mSelectedPen.setWidthF(2.5);
12919  mSelectedPen.setColor(QColor(80, 80, 255)); // lighter than Qt::blue of mPen
12920  mSelectedBrush = mBrush;
12921 
12922  setScatterStyle(QCPScatterStyle());
12923  setLineStyle(lsLine);
12924 }
12925 
12926 QCPCurve::~QCPCurve()
12927 {
12928  delete mData;
12929 }
12930 
12938 void QCPCurve::setData(QCPCurveDataMap *data, bool copy)
12939 {
12940  if (copy)
12941  {
12942  *mData = *data;
12943  } else
12944  {
12945  delete mData;
12946  mData = data;
12947  }
12948 }
12949 
12956 void QCPCurve::setData(const QVector<double> &t, const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
12957 {
12958  mData->clear();
12959  int n = t.size();
12960  n = qMin(n, key.size());
12961  n = qMin(n, value.size());
12962  QCPCurveData newData;
12963  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
12964  {
12965  newData.t = t[i];
12966  newData.key = key[i];
12967  newData.value = value[i];
12968  mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
12969  }
12970 }
12971 
12977 void QCPCurve::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
12978 {
12979  mData->clear();
12980  int n = key.size();
12981  n = qMin(n, value.size());
12982  QCPCurveData newData;
12983  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
12984  {
12985  newData.t = i; // no t vector given, so we assign t the index of the key/value pair
12986  newData.key = key[i];
12987  newData.value = value[i];
12988  mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
12989  }
12990 }
12991 
12999 void QCPCurve::setScatterStyle(const QCPScatterStyle &style)
13000 {
13001  mScatterStyle = style;
13002 }
13003 
13011 void QCPCurve::setLineStyle(QCPCurve::LineStyle style)
13012 {
13013  mLineStyle = style;
13014 }
13015 
13020 void QCPCurve::addData(const QCPCurveDataMap &dataMap)
13021 {
13022  mData->unite(dataMap);
13023 }
13024 
13029 void QCPCurve::addData(const QCPCurveData &data)
13030 {
13031  mData->insertMulti(data.t, data);
13032 }
13033 
13038 void QCPCurve::addData(double t, double key, double value)
13039 {
13040  QCPCurveData newData;
13041  newData.t = t;
13042  newData.key = key;
13043  newData.value = value;
13044  mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
13045 }
13046 
13055 void QCPCurve::addData(double key, double value)
13056 {
13057  QCPCurveData newData;
13058  if (!mData->isEmpty())
13059  newData.t = (mData->constEnd()-1).key()+1;
13060  else
13061  newData.t = 0;
13062  newData.key = key;
13063  newData.value = value;
13064  mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
13065 }
13066 
13071 void QCPCurve::addData(const QVector<double> &ts, const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values)
13072 {
13073  int n = ts.size();
13074  n = qMin(n, keys.size());
13075  n = qMin(n, values.size());
13076  QCPCurveData newData;
13077  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
13078  {
13079  newData.t = ts[i];
13080  newData.key = keys[i];
13081  newData.value = values[i];
13082  mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
13083  }
13084 }
13085 
13090 void QCPCurve::removeDataBefore(double t)
13091 {
13092  QCPCurveDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
13093  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < t)
13094  it = mData->erase(it);
13095 }
13096 
13101 void QCPCurve::removeDataAfter(double t)
13102 {
13103  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
13104  QCPCurveDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(t);
13105  while (it != mData->end())
13106  it = mData->erase(it);
13107 }
13108 
13116 void QCPCurve::removeData(double fromt, double tot)
13117 {
13118  if (fromt >= tot || mData->isEmpty()) return;
13119  QCPCurveDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromt);
13120  QCPCurveDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(tot);
13121  while (it != itEnd)
13122  it = mData->erase(it);
13123 }
13124 
13134 void QCPCurve::removeData(double t)
13135 {
13136  mData->remove(t);
13137 }
13138 
13143 void QCPCurve::clearData()
13144 {
13145  mData->clear();
13146 }
13147 
13148 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13149 double QCPCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13150 {
13151  Q_UNUSED(details)
13152  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectable) || mData->isEmpty())
13153  return -1;
13154 
13155  return pointDistance(pos);
13156 }
13157 
13158 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13159 void QCPCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13160 {
13161  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
13162 
13163  // allocate line vector:
13164  QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
13165 
13166  // fill with curve data:
13167  getCurveData(lineData);
13168 
13169  // check data validity if flag set:
13170 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
13171  QCPCurveDataMap::const_iterator it;
13172  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
13173  {
13174  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().t) ||
13175  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().key, it.value().value))
13176  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it.key() << "invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
13177  }
13178 #endif
13179 
13180  // draw curve fill:
13181  if (mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0)
13182  {
13183  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
13184  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
13185  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
13186  painter->drawPolygon(QPolygonF(*lineData));
13187  }
13188 
13189  // draw curve line:
13190  if (mLineStyle != lsNone && mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
13191  {
13192  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
13193  painter->setPen(mainPen());
13194  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
13195  // if drawing solid line and not in PDF, use much faster line drawing instead of polyline:
13196  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phFastPolylines) &&
13197  painter->pen().style() == Qt::SolidLine &&
13198  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized) &&
13199  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching))
13200  {
13201  for (int i=1; i<lineData->size(); ++i)
13202  painter->drawLine(lineData->at(i-1), lineData->at(i));
13203  } else
13204  {
13205  painter->drawPolyline(QPolygonF(*lineData));
13206  }
13207  }
13208 
13209  // draw scatters:
13210  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
13211  drawScatterPlot(painter, lineData);
13212 
13213  // free allocated line data:
13214  delete lineData;
13215 }
13216 
13217 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13218 void QCPCurve::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
13219 {
13220  // draw fill:
13221  if (mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
13222  {
13223  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
13224  painter->fillRect(QRectF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.width(), rect.height()/3.0), mBrush);
13225  }
13226  // draw line vertically centered:
13227  if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
13228  {
13229  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
13230  painter->setPen(mPen);
13231  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.right()+5, rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0)); // +5 on x2 else last segment is missing from dashed/dotted pens
13232  }
13233  // draw scatter symbol:
13234  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
13235  {
13236  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
13237  // scale scatter pixmap if it's too large to fit in legend icon rect:
13238  if (mScatterStyle.shape() == QCPScatterStyle::ssPixmap && (mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().width() > rect.width() || mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().height() > rect.height()))
13239  {
13240  QCPScatterStyle scaledStyle(mScatterStyle);
13241  scaledStyle.setPixmap(scaledStyle.pixmap().scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation));
13242  scaledStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
13243  scaledStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
13244  } else
13245  {
13246  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
13247  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
13248  }
13249  }
13250 }
13251 
13257 void QCPCurve::drawScatterPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector<QPointF> *pointData) const
13258 {
13259  // draw scatter point symbols:
13260  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
13261  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
13262  for (int i=0; i<pointData->size(); ++i)
13263  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, pointData->at(i));
13264 }
13265 
13272 void QCPCurve::getCurveData(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
13273 {
13274  /* Extended sides of axis rect R divide space into 9 regions:
13275  1__|_4_|__7
13276  2__|_R_|__8
13277  3 | 6 | 9
13278  General idea: If the two points of a line segment are in the same region (that is not R), the line segment corner is removed.
13279  Curves outside R become straight lines closely outside of R which greatly reduces drawing time, yet keeps the look of lines and
13280  fills inside R consistent.
13281  The region R has index 5.
13282  */
13283  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
13284  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
13285  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
13286 
13287  QRect axisRect = mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect() & mValueAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect();
13288  lineData->reserve(mData->size());
13289  QCPCurveDataMap::const_iterator it;
13290  int lastRegion = 5;
13291  int currentRegion = 5;
13292  double RLeft = keyAxis->range().lower;
13293  double RRight = keyAxis->range().upper;
13294  double RBottom = valueAxis->range().lower;
13295  double RTop = valueAxis->range().upper;
13296  double x, y; // current key/value
13297  bool addedLastAlready = true;
13298  bool firstPoint = true; // first point must always be drawn, to make sure fill works correctly
13299  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
13300  {
13301  x = it.value().key;
13302  y = it.value().value;
13303  // determine current region:
13304  if (x < RLeft) // region 123
13305  {
13306  if (y > RTop)
13307  currentRegion = 1;
13308  else if (y < RBottom)
13309  currentRegion = 3;
13310  else
13311  currentRegion = 2;
13312  } else if (x > RRight) // region 789
13313  {
13314  if (y > RTop)
13315  currentRegion = 7;
13316  else if (y < RBottom)
13317  currentRegion = 9;
13318  else
13319  currentRegion = 8;
13320  } else // region 456
13321  {
13322  if (y > RTop)
13323  currentRegion = 4;
13324  else if (y < RBottom)
13325  currentRegion = 6;
13326  else
13327  currentRegion = 5;
13328  }
13329 
13330  /*
13331  Watch out, the next part is very tricky. It modifies the curve such that it seems like the
13332  whole thing is still drawn, but actually the points outside the axisRect are simplified
13333  ("optimized") greatly. There are some subtle special cases when line segments are large and
13334  thereby each subsequent point may be in a different region or even skip some.
13335  */
13336  // determine whether to keep current point:
13337  if (currentRegion == 5 || (firstPoint && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)) // current is in R, add current and last if it wasn't added already
13338  {
13339  if (!addedLastAlready) // in case curve just entered R, make sure the last point outside R is also drawn correctly
13340  lineData->append(coordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value)); // add last point to vector
13341  else if (lastRegion != 5) // added last already. If that's the case, we probably added it at optimized position. So go back and make sure it's at original position (else the angle changes under which this segment enters R)
13342  {
13343  if (!firstPoint) // because on firstPoint, currentRegion is 5 and addedLastAlready is true, although there is no last point
13344  lineData->replace(lineData->size()-1, coordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value));
13345  }
13346  lineData->append(coordsToPixels(it.value().key, it.value().value)); // add current point to vector
13347  addedLastAlready = true; // so in next iteration, we don't add this point twice
13348  } else if (currentRegion != lastRegion) // changed region, add current and last if not added already
13349  {
13350  // using outsideCoordsToPixels instead of coorsToPixels for optimized point placement (places points just outside axisRect instead of potentially far away)
13351 
13352  // if we're coming from R or we skip diagonally over the corner regions (so line might still be visible in R), we can't place points optimized
13353  if (lastRegion == 5 || // coming from R
13354  ((lastRegion==2 && currentRegion==4) || (lastRegion==4 && currentRegion==2)) || // skip top left diagonal
13355  ((lastRegion==4 && currentRegion==8) || (lastRegion==8 && currentRegion==4)) || // skip top right diagonal
13356  ((lastRegion==8 && currentRegion==6) || (lastRegion==6 && currentRegion==8)) || // skip bottom right diagonal
13357  ((lastRegion==6 && currentRegion==2) || (lastRegion==2 && currentRegion==6)) // skip bottom left diagonal
13358  )
13359  {
13360  // always add last point if not added already, original:
13361  if (!addedLastAlready)
13362  lineData->append(coordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value));
13363  // add current point, original:
13364  lineData->append(coordsToPixels(it.value().key, it.value().value));
13365  } else // no special case that forbids optimized point placement, so do it:
13366  {
13367  // always add last point if not added already, optimized:
13368  if (!addedLastAlready)
13369  lineData->append(outsideCoordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value, currentRegion, axisRect));
13370  // add current point, optimized:
13371  lineData->append(outsideCoordsToPixels(it.value().key, it.value().value, currentRegion, axisRect));
13372  }
13373  addedLastAlready = true; // so that if next point enters 5, or crosses another region boundary, we don't add this point twice
13374  } else // neither in R, nor crossed a region boundary, skip current point
13375  {
13376  addedLastAlready = false;
13377  }
13378  lastRegion = currentRegion;
13379  firstPoint = false;
13380  }
13381  // If curve ends outside R, we want to add very last point so the fill looks like it should when the curve started inside R:
13382  if (lastRegion != 5 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && !mData->isEmpty())
13383  lineData->append(coordsToPixels((mData->constEnd()-1).value().key, (mData->constEnd()-1).value().value));
13384 }
13385 
13392 double QCPCurve::pointDistance(const QPointF &pixelPoint) const
13393 {
13394  if (mData->isEmpty())
13395  {
13396  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "requested point distance on curve" << mName << "without data";
13397  return 500;
13398  }
13399  if (mData->size() == 1)
13400  {
13401  QPointF dataPoint = coordsToPixels(mData->constBegin().key(), mData->constBegin().value().value);
13402  return QVector2D(dataPoint-pixelPoint).length();
13403  }
13404 
13405  // calculate minimum distance to line segments:
13406  QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
13407  getCurveData(lineData);
13408  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
13409  for (int i=0; i<lineData->size()-1; ++i)
13410  {
13411  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(lineData->at(i), lineData->at(i+1), pixelPoint);
13412  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
13413  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
13414  }
13415  delete lineData;
13416  return sqrt(minDistSqr);
13417 }
13418 
13430 QPointF QCPCurve::outsideCoordsToPixels(double key, double value, int region, QRect axisRect) const
13431 {
13432  int margin = qCeil(qMax(mScatterStyle.size(), (double)mPen.widthF())) + 2;
13433  QPointF result = coordsToPixels(key, value);
13434  switch (region)
13435  {
13436  case 2: result.setX(axisRect.left()-margin); break; // left
13437  case 8: result.setX(axisRect.right()+margin); break; // right
13438  case 4: result.setY(axisRect.top()-margin); break; // top
13439  case 6: result.setY(axisRect.bottom()+margin); break; // bottom
13440  case 1: result.setX(axisRect.left()-margin);
13441  result.setY(axisRect.top()-margin); break; // top left
13442  case 7: result.setX(axisRect.right()+margin);
13443  result.setY(axisRect.top()-margin); break; // top right
13444  case 9: result.setX(axisRect.right()+margin);
13445  result.setY(axisRect.bottom()+margin); break; // bottom right
13446  case 3: result.setX(axisRect.left()-margin);
13447  result.setY(axisRect.bottom()+margin); break; // bottom left
13448  }
13449  return result;
13450 }
13451 
13452 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13453 QCPRange QCPCurve::getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
13454 {
13455  QCPRange range;
13456  bool haveLower = false;
13457  bool haveUpper = false;
13458 
13459  double current;
13460 
13461  QCPCurveDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
13462  while (it != mData->constEnd())
13463  {
13464  current = it.value().key;
13465  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
13466  {
13467  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
13468  {
13469  range.lower = current;
13470  haveLower = true;
13471  }
13472  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
13473  {
13474  range.upper = current;
13475  haveUpper = true;
13476  }
13477  }
13478  ++it;
13479  }
13480 
13481  validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
13482  return range;
13483 }
13484 
13485 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13486 QCPRange QCPCurve::getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
13487 {
13488  QCPRange range;
13489  bool haveLower = false;
13490  bool haveUpper = false;
13491 
13492  double current;
13493 
13494  QCPCurveDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
13495  while (it != mData->constEnd())
13496  {
13497  current = it.value().value;
13498  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
13499  {
13500  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
13501  {
13502  range.lower = current;
13503  haveLower = true;
13504  }
13505  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
13506  {
13507  range.upper = current;
13508  haveUpper = true;
13509  }
13510  }
13511  ++it;
13512  }
13513 
13514  validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
13515  return range;
13516 }
13517 
13518 
13522 
13538 QCPBarData::QCPBarData() :
13539  key(0),
13540  value(0)
13541 {
13542 }
13543 
13547 QCPBarData::QCPBarData(double key, double value) :
13548  key(key),
13549  value(value)
13550 {
13551 }
13552 
13553 
13557 
13614 QCPBars::QCPBars(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
13615  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis)
13616 {
13617  mData = new QCPBarDataMap;
13618  mPen.setColor(Qt::blue);
13619  mPen.setStyle(Qt::SolidLine);
13620  mBrush.setColor(QColor(40, 50, 255, 30));
13621  mBrush.setStyle(Qt::SolidPattern);
13622  mSelectedPen = mPen;
13623  mSelectedPen.setWidthF(2.5);
13624  mSelectedPen.setColor(QColor(80, 80, 255)); // lighter than Qt::blue of mPen
13625  mSelectedBrush = mBrush;
13626 
13627  mWidth = 0.75;
13628 }
13629 
13630 QCPBars::~QCPBars()
13631 {
13632  if (mBarBelow || mBarAbove)
13633  connectBars(mBarBelow.data(), mBarAbove.data()); // take this bar out of any stacking
13634  delete mData;
13635 }
13636 
13640 void QCPBars::setWidth(double width)
13641 {
13642  mWidth = width;
13643 }
13644 
13652 void QCPBars::setData(QCPBarDataMap *data, bool copy)
13653 {
13654  if (copy)
13655  {
13656  *mData = *data;
13657  } else
13658  {
13659  delete mData;
13660  mData = data;
13661  }
13662 }
13663 
13670 void QCPBars::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
13671 {
13672  mData->clear();
13673  int n = key.size();
13674  n = qMin(n, value.size());
13675  QCPBarData newData;
13676  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
13677  {
13678  newData.key = key[i];
13679  newData.value = value[i];
13680  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
13681  }
13682 }
13683 
13698 void QCPBars::moveBelow(QCPBars *bars)
13699 {
13700  if (bars == this) return;
13701  if (bars && (bars->keyAxis() != mKeyAxis.data() || bars->valueAxis() != mValueAxis.data()))
13702  {
13703  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed QCPBars* doesn't have same key and value axis as this QCPBars";
13704  return;
13705  }
13706  // remove from stacking:
13707  connectBars(mBarBelow.data(), mBarAbove.data()); // Note: also works if one (or both) of them is 0
13708  // if new bar given, insert this bar below it:
13709  if (bars)
13710  {
13711  if (bars->mBarBelow)
13712  connectBars(bars->mBarBelow.data(), this);
13713  connectBars(this, bars);
13714  }
13715 }
13716 
13731 void QCPBars::moveAbove(QCPBars *bars)
13732 {
13733  if (bars == this) return;
13734  if (bars && (bars->keyAxis() != mKeyAxis.data() || bars->valueAxis() != mValueAxis.data()))
13735  {
13736  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed QCPBars* doesn't have same key and value axis as this QCPBars";
13737  return;
13738  }
13739  // remove from stacking:
13740  connectBars(mBarBelow.data(), mBarAbove.data()); // Note: also works if one (or both) of them is 0
13741  // if new bar given, insert this bar above it:
13742  if (bars)
13743  {
13744  if (bars->mBarAbove)
13745  connectBars(this, bars->mBarAbove.data());
13746  connectBars(bars, this);
13747  }
13748 }
13749 
13754 void QCPBars::addData(const QCPBarDataMap &dataMap)
13755 {
13756  mData->unite(dataMap);
13757 }
13758 
13763 void QCPBars::addData(const QCPBarData &data)
13764 {
13765  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
13766 }
13767 
13772 void QCPBars::addData(double key, double value)
13773 {
13774  QCPBarData newData;
13775  newData.key = key;
13776  newData.value = value;
13777  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
13778 }
13779 
13784 void QCPBars::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values)
13785 {
13786  int n = keys.size();
13787  n = qMin(n, values.size());
13788  QCPBarData newData;
13789  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
13790  {
13791  newData.key = keys[i];
13792  newData.value = values[i];
13793  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
13794  }
13795 }
13796 
13801 void QCPBars::removeDataBefore(double key)
13802 {
13803  QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
13804  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
13805  it = mData->erase(it);
13806 }
13807 
13812 void QCPBars::removeDataAfter(double key)
13813 {
13814  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
13815  QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
13816  while (it != mData->end())
13817  it = mData->erase(it);
13818 }
13819 
13827 void QCPBars::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey)
13828 {
13829  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty()) return;
13830  QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
13831  QCPBarDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
13832  while (it != itEnd)
13833  it = mData->erase(it);
13834 }
13835 
13844 void QCPBars::removeData(double key)
13845 {
13846  mData->remove(key);
13847 }
13848 
13853 void QCPBars::clearData()
13854 {
13855  mData->clear();
13856 }
13857 
13858 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13859 double QCPBars::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13860 {
13861  Q_UNUSED(details)
13862  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
13863  return -1;
13864 
13865  QCPBarDataMap::ConstIterator it;
13866  double posKey, posValue;
13867  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
13868  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
13869  {
13870  double baseValue = getBaseValue(it.key(), it.value().value >=0);
13871  QCPRange keyRange(it.key()-mWidth*0.5, it.key()+mWidth*0.5);
13872  QCPRange valueRange(baseValue, baseValue+it.value().value);
13873  if (keyRange.contains(posKey) && valueRange.contains(posValue))
13874  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13875  }
13876  return -1;
13877 }
13878 
13879 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13880 void QCPBars::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13881 {
13882  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
13883  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
13884 
13885  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it;
13886  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
13887  {
13888  // skip bar if not visible in key axis range:
13889  if (it.key()+mWidth*0.5 < mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower || it.key()-mWidth*0.5 > mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper)
13890  continue;
13891  // check data validity if flag set:
13892 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
13893  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().key, it.value().value))
13894  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it.key() << "of drawn range invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
13895 #endif
13896  QPolygonF barPolygon = getBarPolygon(it.key(), it.value().value);
13897  // draw bar fill:
13898  if (mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0)
13899  {
13900  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
13901  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
13902  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
13903  painter->drawPolygon(barPolygon);
13904  }
13905  // draw bar line:
13906  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
13907  {
13908  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
13909  painter->setPen(mainPen());
13910  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
13911  painter->drawPolyline(barPolygon);
13912  }
13913  }
13914 }
13915 
13916 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13917 void QCPBars::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
13918 {
13919  // draw filled rect:
13920  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
13921  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
13922  painter->setPen(mPen);
13923  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width()*0.67, rect.height()*0.67);
13924  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
13925  painter->drawRect(r);
13926 }
13927 
13933 QPolygonF QCPBars::getBarPolygon(double key, double value) const
13934 {
13935  QPolygonF result;
13936  double baseValue = getBaseValue(key, value >= 0);
13937  result << coordsToPixels(key-mWidth*0.5, baseValue);
13938  result << coordsToPixels(key-mWidth*0.5, baseValue+value);
13939  result << coordsToPixels(key+mWidth*0.5, baseValue+value);
13940  result << coordsToPixels(key+mWidth*0.5, baseValue);
13941  return result;
13942 }
13943 
13953 double QCPBars::getBaseValue(double key, bool positive) const
13954 {
13955  if (mBarBelow)
13956  {
13957  double max = 0;
13958  // find bars of mBarBelow that are approximately at key and find largest one:
13959  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mBarBelow.data()->mData->lowerBound(key-mWidth*0.1);
13960  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator itEnd = mBarBelow.data()->mData->upperBound(key+mWidth*0.1);
13961  while (it != itEnd)
13962  {
13963  if ((positive && it.value().value > max) ||
13964  (!positive && it.value().value < max))
13965  max = it.value().value;
13966  ++it;
13967  }
13968  // recurse down the bar-stack to find the total height:
13969  return max + mBarBelow.data()->getBaseValue(key, positive);
13970  } else
13971  return 0;
13972 }
13973 
13982 void QCPBars::connectBars(QCPBars *lower, QCPBars *upper)
13983 {
13984  if (!lower && !upper) return;
13985 
13986  if (!lower) // disconnect upper at bottom
13987  {
13988  // disconnect old bar below upper:
13989  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
13990  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.clear();
13991  upper->mBarBelow.clear();
13992  } else if (!upper) // disconnect lower at top
13993  {
13994  // disconnect old bar above lower:
13995  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
13996  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.clear();
13997  lower->mBarAbove.clear();
13998  } else // connect lower and upper
13999  {
14000  // disconnect old bar above lower:
14001  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
14002  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.clear();
14003  // disconnect old bar below upper:
14004  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
14005  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.clear();
14006  lower->mBarAbove = upper;
14007  upper->mBarBelow = lower;
14008  }
14009 }
14010 
14011 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14012 QCPRange QCPBars::getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
14013 {
14014  QCPRange range;
14015  bool haveLower = false;
14016  bool haveUpper = false;
14017 
14018  double current;
14019  double barWidthHalf = mWidth*0.5;
14020  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
14021  while (it != mData->constEnd())
14022  {
14023  current = it.value().key;
14024  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current+barWidthHalf < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current-barWidthHalf > 0))
14025  {
14026  if (current-barWidthHalf < range.lower || !haveLower)
14027  {
14028  range.lower = current-barWidthHalf;
14029  haveLower = true;
14030  }
14031  if (current+barWidthHalf > range.upper || !haveUpper)
14032  {
14033  range.upper = current+barWidthHalf;
14034  haveUpper = true;
14035  }
14036  }
14037  ++it;
14038  }
14039 
14040  validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
14041  return range;
14042 }
14043 
14044 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14045 QCPRange QCPBars::getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
14046 {
14047  QCPRange range;
14048  bool haveLower = true; // set to true, because 0 should always be visible in bar charts
14049  bool haveUpper = true; // set to true, because 0 should always be visible in bar charts
14050 
14051  double current;
14052 
14053  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
14054  while (it != mData->constEnd())
14055  {
14056  current = it.value().value + getBaseValue(it.value().key, it.value().value >= 0);
14057  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
14058  {
14059  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
14060  {
14061  range.lower = current;
14062  haveLower = true;
14063  }
14064  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
14065  {
14066  range.upper = current;
14067  haveUpper = true;
14068  }
14069  }
14070  ++it;
14071  }
14072 
14073  validRange = range.lower < range.upper;
14074  return range;
14075 }
14076 
14077 
14081 
14144 QCPStatisticalBox::QCPStatisticalBox(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
14145  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
14146  mKey(0),
14147  mMinimum(0),
14148  mLowerQuartile(0),
14149  mMedian(0),
14150  mUpperQuartile(0),
14151  mMaximum(0)
14152 {
14153  setOutlierStyle(QCPScatterStyle(QCPScatterStyle::ssCircle, Qt::blue, 6));
14154  setWhiskerWidth(0.2);
14155  setWidth(0.5);
14156 
14157  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14158  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2.5));
14159  setMedianPen(QPen(Qt::black, 3, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::FlatCap));
14160  setWhiskerPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::DashLine, Qt::FlatCap));
14161  setWhiskerBarPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14162  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14163  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14164 }
14165 
14169 void QCPStatisticalBox::setKey(double key)

14172 }

14205 {
14206  mMedian = value;
14207 }

14218  mUpperQuartile = value;
14219 }

14229  mMaximum = value;

14242 }

14250 {

14253  setLowerQuartile(lowerQuartile);
14254  setMedian(median);
14255  setUpperQuartile(upperQuartile);
14256  setMaximum(maximum);
14257 }

14277 }

14289  mWhiskerPen = pen;

14299 {
14300  mWhiskerBarPen = pen;

14320 
14321 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14322 void QCPStatisticalBox::clearData()
14323 {
14324  setOutliers(QVector<double>());
14325  setKey(0);
14326  setMinimum(0);
14327  setLowerQuartile(0);
14328  setMedian(0);
14329  setUpperQuartile(0);
14330  setMaximum(0);
14331 }
14332 
14333 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14334 double QCPStatisticalBox::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
14335 {
14336  Q_UNUSED(details)
14337  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
14338  return -1;
14339  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
14340 
14341  double posKey, posValue;
14342  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
14343  // quartile box:
14344  QCPRange keyRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
14345  QCPRange valueRange(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile);
14346  if (keyRange.contains(posKey) && valueRange.contains(posValue))
14347  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
14348 
14349  // min/max whiskers:
14350  if (QCPRange(mMinimum, mMaximum).contains(posValue))
14351  return qAbs(mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey)-mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(posKey));
14352 
14353  return -1;
14354 }
14355 
14356 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14357 void QCPStatisticalBox::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
14358 {
14359  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
14360 
14361  // check data validity if flag set:
14362 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
14363  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mKey, mMedian) ||
14364  QCP::isInvalidData(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile) ||
14365  QCP::isInvalidData(mMinimum, mMaximum))
14366  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << mKey << "of drawn range has invalid data." << "Plottable name:" << name();
14367  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
14368  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mOutliers.at(i)))
14369  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point outlier at" << mKey << "of drawn range invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
14370 #endif
14371 
14372  QRectF quartileBox;
14373  drawQuartileBox(painter, &quartileBox);
14374 
14375  painter->save();
14376  painter->setClipRect(quartileBox, Qt::IntersectClip);
14377  drawMedian(painter);
14378  painter->restore();
14379 
14380  drawWhiskers(painter);
14381  drawOutliers(painter);
14382 }
14383 
14384 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14385 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
14386 {
14387  // draw filled rect:
14388  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
14389  painter->setPen(mPen);
14390  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
14391  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width()*0.67, rect.height()*0.67);
14392  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
14393  painter->drawRect(r);
14394 }
14395 
14402 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawQuartileBox(QCPPainter *painter, QRectF *quartileBox) const
14403 {
14404  QRectF box;
14405  box.setTopLeft(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mUpperQuartile));
14406  box.setBottomRight(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mLowerQuartile));
14407  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
14408  painter->setPen(mainPen());
14409  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
14410  painter->drawRect(box);
14411  if (quartileBox)
14412  *quartileBox = box;
14413 }
14414 
14419 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawMedian(QCPPainter *painter) const
14420 {
14421  QLineF medianLine;
14422  medianLine.setP1(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
14423  medianLine.setP2(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
14424  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
14425  painter->setPen(mMedianPen);
14426  painter->drawLine(medianLine);
14427 }
14428 
14433 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawWhiskers(QCPPainter *painter) const
14434 {
14435  QLineF backboneMin, backboneMax, barMin, barMax;
14436  backboneMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mUpperQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMaximum));
14437  backboneMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mLowerQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMinimum));
14438  barMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum));
14439  barMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum));
14440  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
14441  painter->setPen(mWhiskerPen);
14442  painter->drawLine(backboneMin);
14443  painter->drawLine(backboneMax);
14444  painter->setPen(mWhiskerBarPen);
14445  painter->drawLine(barMin);
14446  painter->drawLine(barMax);
14447 }
14448 
14453 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawOutliers(QCPPainter *painter) const
14454 {
14455  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
14456  mOutlierStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
14457  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
14458  mOutlierStyle.drawShape(painter, coordsToPixels(mKey, mOutliers.at(i)));
14459 }
14460 
14461 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14462 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
14463 {
14464  validRange = mWidth > 0;
14465  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth)
14466  {
14467  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
14468  } else if (inSignDomain == sdNegative)
14469  {
14470  if (mKey+mWidth*0.5 < 0)
14471  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
14472  else if (mKey < 0)
14473  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey);
14474  else
14475  {
14476  validRange = false;
14477  return QCPRange();
14478  }
14479  } else if (inSignDomain == sdPositive)
14480  {
14481  if (mKey-mWidth*0.5 > 0)
14482  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
14483  else if (mKey > 0)
14484  return QCPRange(mKey, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
14485  else
14486  {
14487  validRange = false;
14488  return QCPRange();
14489  }
14490  }
14491  validRange = false;
14492  return QCPRange();
14493 }
14494 
14495 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14496 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
14497 {
14498  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth)
14499  {
14500  double lower = qMin(mMinimum, qMin(mMedian, mLowerQuartile));
14501  double upper = qMax(mMaximum, qMax(mMedian, mUpperQuartile));
14502  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
14503  {
14504  if (mOutliers.at(i) < lower)
14505  lower = mOutliers.at(i);
14506  if (mOutliers.at(i) > upper)
14507  upper = mOutliers.at(i);
14508  }
14509  validRange = upper > lower;
14510  return QCPRange(lower, upper);
14511  } else
14512  {
14513  QVector<double> values; // values that must be considered (i.e. all outliers and the five box-parameters)
14514  values.reserve(mOutliers.size() + 5);
14515  values << mMaximum << mUpperQuartile << mMedian << mLowerQuartile << mMinimum;
14516  values << mOutliers;
14517  // go through values and find the ones in legal range:
14518  bool haveUpper = false;
14519  bool haveLower = false;
14520  double upper = 0;
14521  double lower = 0;
14522  for (int i=0; i<values.size(); ++i)
14523  {
14524  if ((inSignDomain == sdNegative && values.at(i) < 0) ||
14525  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && values.at(i) > 0))
14526  {
14527  if (values.at(i) > upper || !haveUpper)
14528  {
14529  upper = values.at(i);
14530  haveUpper = true;
14531  }
14532  if (values.at(i) < lower || !haveLower)
14533  {
14534  lower = values.at(i);
14535  haveLower = true;
14536  }
14537  }
14538  }
14539  // return the bounds if we found some sensible values:
14540  if (haveLower && haveUpper && lower < upper)
14541  {
14542  validRange = true;
14543  return QCPRange(lower, upper);
14544  } else
14545  {
14546  validRange = false;
14547  return QCPRange();
14548  }
14549  }
14550 }
14551 
14552 
14556 
14570 QCPItemStraightLine::QCPItemStraightLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
14571  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
14572  point1(createPosition("point1")),
14573  point2(createPosition("point2"))
14574 {
14575  point1->setCoords(0, 0);
14576  point2->setCoords(1, 1);
14577 
14578  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14579  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
14580 }
14581 
14582 QCPItemStraightLine::~QCPItemStraightLine()
14583 {
14584 }
14585 
14591 void QCPItemStraightLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
14592 {
14593  mPen = pen;
14594 }
14595 
14601 void QCPItemStraightLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
14602 {
14603  mSelectedPen = pen;
14604 }
14605 
14606 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14607 double QCPItemStraightLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
14608 {
14609  Q_UNUSED(details)
14610  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
14611  return -1;
14612 
14613  return distToStraightLine(QVector2D(point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(point2->pixelPoint()-point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(pos));
14614 }
14615 
14616 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14617 void QCPItemStraightLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
14618 {
14619  QVector2D start(point1->pixelPoint());
14620  QVector2D end(point2->pixelPoint());
14621  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
14622  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
14623  QLineF line = getRectClippedStraightLine(start, end-start, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
14624  // paint visible segment, if existent:
14625  if (!line.isNull())
14626  {
14627  painter->setPen(mainPen());
14628  painter->drawLine(line);
14629  }
14630 }
14631 
14639 double QCPItemStraightLine::distToStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QVector2D &point) const
14640 {
14641  return qAbs((base.y()-point.y())*vec.x()-(base.x()-point.x())*vec.y())/vec.length();
14642 }
14643 
14651 QLineF QCPItemStraightLine::getRectClippedStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QRect &rect) const
14652 {
14653  double bx, by;
14654  double gamma;
14655  QLineF result;
14656  if (vec.x() == 0 && vec.y() == 0)
14657  return result;
14658  if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is vertical
14659  {
14660  // check top of rect:
14661  bx = rect.left();
14662  by = rect.top();
14663  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
14664  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
14665  result.setLine(bx+gamma, rect.top(), bx+gamma, rect.bottom()); // no need to check bottom because we know line is vertical
14666  } else if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is horizontal
14667  {
14668  // check left of rect:
14669  bx = rect.left();
14670  by = rect.top();
14671  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
14672  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
14673  result.setLine(rect.left(), by+gamma, rect.right(), by+gamma); // no need to check right because we know line is horizontal
14674  } else // line is skewed
14675  {
14676  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
14677  // check top of rect:
14678  bx = rect.left();
14679  by = rect.top();
14680  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
14681  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
14682  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
14683  // check bottom of rect:
14684  bx = rect.left();
14685  by = rect.bottom();
14686  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
14687  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
14688  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
14689  // check left of rect:
14690  bx = rect.left();
14691  by = rect.top();
14692  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
14693  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
14694  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
14695  // check right of rect:
14696  bx = rect.right();
14697  by = rect.top();
14698  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
14699  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
14700  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
14701 
14702  // evaluate points:
14703  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
14704  {
14705  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
14706  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
14707  {
14708  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
14709  double distSqrMax = 0;
14710  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
14711  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
14712  {
14713  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
14714  {
14715  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
14716  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
14717  {
14718  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
14719  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
14720  distSqrMax = distSqr;
14721  }
14722  }
14723  }
14724  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
14725  }
14726  }
14727  return result;
14728 }
14729 
14735 QPen QCPItemStraightLine::mainPen() const
14736 {
14737  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
14738 }
14739 
14740 
14744 
14760 QCPItemLine::QCPItemLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
14761  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
14762  start(createPosition("start")),
14763  end(createPosition("end"))
14764 {
14765  start->setCoords(0, 0);
14766  end->setCoords(1, 1);
14767 
14768  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14769  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
14770 }
14771 
14772 QCPItemLine::~QCPItemLine()
14773 {
14774 }
14775 
14781 void QCPItemLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
14782 {
14783  mPen = pen;
14784 }
14785 
14791 void QCPItemLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
14792 {
14793  mSelectedPen = pen;
14794 }
14795 
14804 void QCPItemLine::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
14805 {
14806  mHead = head;
14807 }
14808 
14817 void QCPItemLine::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
14818 {
14819  mTail = tail;
14820 }
14821 
14822 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14823 double QCPItemLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
14824 {
14825  Q_UNUSED(details)
14826  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
14827  return -1;
14828 
14829  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine(start->pixelPoint(), end->pixelPoint(), pos));
14830 }
14831 
14832 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14833 void QCPItemLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
14834 {
14835  QVector2D startVec(start->pixelPoint());
14836  QVector2D endVec(end->pixelPoint());
14837  if (startVec.toPoint() == endVec.toPoint())
14838  return;
14839  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
14840  double clipPad = qMax(mHead.boundingDistance(), mTail.boundingDistance());
14841  clipPad = qMax(clipPad, (double)mainPen().widthF());
14842  QLineF line = getRectClippedLine(startVec, endVec, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
14843  // paint visible segment, if existent:
14844  if (!line.isNull())
14845  {
14846  painter->setPen(mainPen());
14847  painter->drawLine(line);
14848  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
14849  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
14850  mTail.draw(painter, startVec, startVec-endVec);
14851  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
14852  mHead.draw(painter, endVec, endVec-startVec);
14853  }
14854 }
14855 
14863 QLineF QCPItemLine::getRectClippedLine(const QVector2D &start, const QVector2D &end, const QRect &rect) const
14864 {
14865  bool containsStart = rect.contains(start.x(), start.y());
14866  bool containsEnd = rect.contains(end.x(), end.y());
14867  if (containsStart && containsEnd)
14868  return QLineF(start.toPointF(), end.toPointF());
14869 
14870  QVector2D base = start;
14871  QVector2D vec = end-start;
14872  double bx, by;
14873  double gamma, mu;
14874  QLineF result;
14875  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
14876 
14877  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is not horizontal
14878  {
14879  // check top of rect:
14880  bx = rect.left();
14881  by = rect.top();
14882  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
14883  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
14884  {
14885  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
14886  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
14887  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
14888  }
14889  // check bottom of rect:
14890  bx = rect.left();
14891  by = rect.bottom();
14892  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
14893  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
14894  {
14895  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
14896  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
14897  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
14898  }
14899  }
14900  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is not vertical
14901  {
14902  // check left of rect:
14903  bx = rect.left();
14904  by = rect.top();
14905  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
14906  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
14907  {
14908  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
14909  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
14910  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
14911  }
14912  // check right of rect:
14913  bx = rect.right();
14914  by = rect.top();
14915  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
14916  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
14917  {
14918  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
14919  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
14920  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
14921  }
14922  }
14923 
14924  if (containsStart)
14925  pointVectors.append(start);
14926  if (containsEnd)
14927  pointVectors.append(end);
14928 
14929  // evaluate points:
14930  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
14931  {
14932  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
14933  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
14934  {
14935  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
14936  double distSqrMax = 0;
14937  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
14938  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
14939  {
14940  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
14941  {
14942  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
14943  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
14944  {
14945  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
14946  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
14947  distSqrMax = distSqr;
14948  }
14949  }
14950  }
14951  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
14952  }
14953  return result;
14954 }
14955 
14961 QPen QCPItemLine::mainPen() const
14962 {
14963  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
14964 }
14965 
14966 
14970 
14993 QCPItemCurve::QCPItemCurve(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
14994  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
14995  start(createPosition("start")),
14996  startDir(createPosition("startDir")),
14997  endDir(createPosition("endDir")),
14998  end(createPosition("end"))
14999 {
15000  start->setCoords(0, 0);
15001  startDir->setCoords(0.5, 0);
15002  endDir->setCoords(0, 0.5);
15003  end->setCoords(1, 1);
15004 
15005  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
15006  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
15007 }
15008 
15009 QCPItemCurve::~QCPItemCurve()
15010 {
15011 }
15012 
15018 void QCPItemCurve::setPen(const QPen &pen)
15019 {
15020  mPen = pen;
15021 }
15022 
15028 void QCPItemCurve::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
15029 {
15030  mSelectedPen = pen;
15031 }
15032 
15041 void QCPItemCurve::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
15042 {
15043  mHead = head;
15044 }
15045 
15054 void QCPItemCurve::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
15055 {
15056  mTail = tail;
15057 }
15058 
15059 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15060 double QCPItemCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15061 {
15062  Q_UNUSED(details)
15063  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15064  return -1;
15065 
15066  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
15067  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
15068  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
15069  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
15070 
15071  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
15072  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
15073 
15074  QPolygonF polygon = cubicPath.toSubpathPolygons().first();
15075  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
15076  for (int i=1; i<polygon.size(); ++i)
15077  {
15078  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(polygon.at(i-1), polygon.at(i), pos);
15079  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
15080  minDistSqr = distSqr;
15081  }
15082  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
15083 }
15084 
15085 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15086 void QCPItemCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15087 {
15088  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
15089  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
15090  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
15091  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
15092  if (QVector2D(endVec-startVec).length() > 1e10) // too large curves cause crash
15093  return;
15094 
15095  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
15096  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
15097 
15098  // paint visible segment, if existent:
15099  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
15100  QRect cubicRect = cubicPath.controlPointRect().toRect();
15101  if (cubicRect.isEmpty()) // may happen when start and end exactly on same x or y position
15102  cubicRect.adjust(0, 0, 1, 1);
15103  if (clip.intersects(cubicRect))
15104  {
15105  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15106  painter->drawPath(cubicPath);
15107  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
15108  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
15109  mTail.draw(painter, QVector2D(startVec), M_PI-cubicPath.angleAtPercent(0)/180.0*M_PI);
15110  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
15111  mHead.draw(painter, QVector2D(endVec), -cubicPath.angleAtPercent(1)/180.0*M_PI);
15112  }
15113 }
15114 
15120 QPen QCPItemCurve::mainPen() const
15121 {
15122  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
15123 }
15124 
15125 
15129 
15143 QCPItemRect::QCPItemRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
15144  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
15145  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
15146  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
15147  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
15148  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
15149  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
15150  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
15151  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
15152  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
15153 {
15154  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
15155  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
15156 
15157  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
15158  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
15159  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15160  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15161 }

15185 }

15194 {
15195  mBrush = brush;
15196 }

15205 {
15206  mSelectedBrush = brush;
15207 }
15208 
15209 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15210 double QCPItemRect::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15211 {
15212  Q_UNUSED(details)
15213  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15214  return -1;
15215 
15216  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint()).normalized();
15217  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
15218  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
15219 }
15220 
15221 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15222 void QCPItemRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15223 {
15224  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
15225  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
15226  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
15227  return;
15228  QRectF rect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
15229  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
15230  QRectF boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
15231  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect())) // only draw if bounding rect of rect item is visible in cliprect
15232  {
15233  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15234  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15235  painter->drawRect(rect);
15236  }
15237 }
15238 
15239 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15240 QPointF QCPItemRect::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
15241 {
15242  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
15243  switch (anchorId)
15244  {
15245  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
15246  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
15247  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15248  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15249  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
15250  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
15251  }
15252 
15253  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
15254  return QPointF();
15255 }
15256 
15262 QPen QCPItemRect::mainPen() const
15263 {
15264  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
15265 }
15266 
15272 QBrush QCPItemRect::mainBrush() const
15273 {
15274  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
15275 }

15301 QCPItemText::QCPItemText(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
15302  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
15303  position(createPosition("position")),
15304  topLeft(createAnchor("topLeft", aiTopLeft)),
15305  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
15306  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
15307  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
15308  bottomRight(createAnchor("bottomRight", aiBottomRight)),
15309  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
15310  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
15311  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
15312 {
15313  position->setCoords(0, 0);
15314 
15315  setRotation(0);
15316  setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignTop|Qt::AlignHCenter);
15317  setPositionAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
15318  setText("text");
15319 
15320  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15321  setSelectedPen(Qt::NoPen);
15322  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15323  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15324  setColor(Qt::black);
15325  setSelectedColor(Qt::blue);
15326 }
