15461 void QCPItemText::setPadding(const QMargins &padding)
15462 {
15463  mPadding = padding;
15464 }
15465 
15466 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15467 double QCPItemText::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15468 {
15469  Q_UNUSED(details)
15470  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15471  return -1;
15472 
15473  // The rect may be rotated, so we transform the actual clicked pos to the rotated
15474  // coordinate system, so we can use the normal rectSelectTest function for non-rotated rects:
15475  QPointF positionPixels(position->pixelPoint());
15476  QTransform inputTransform;
15477  inputTransform.translate(positionPixels.x(), positionPixels.y());
15478  inputTransform.rotate(-mRotation);
15479  inputTransform.translate(-positionPixels.x(), -positionPixels.y());
15480  QPointF rotatedPos = inputTransform.map(pos);
15481  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mFont);
15482  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15483  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
15484  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(positionPixels, textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment);
15485  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
15486 
15487  return rectSelectTest(textBoxRect, rotatedPos, true);
15488 }
15489 
15490 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15491 void QCPItemText::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15492 {
15493  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
15494  QTransform transform = painter->transform();
15495  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
15496  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
15497  transform.rotate(mRotation);
15498  painter->setFont(mainFont());
15499  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15500  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
15501  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
15502  textRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint()+QPoint(mPadding.left(), mPadding.top()));
15503  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
15504  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
15505  QRect boundingRect = textBoxRect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
15506  if (transform.mapRect(boundingRect).intersects(painter->transform().mapRect(clipRect())))
15507  {
15508  painter->setTransform(transform);
15509  if ((mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) ||
15510  (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0))
15511  {
15512  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15513  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15514  painter->drawRect(textBoxRect);
15515  }
15516  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15517  painter->setPen(QPen(mainColor()));
15518  painter->drawText(textRect, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15519  }
15520 }
15521 
15522 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15523 QPointF QCPItemText::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
15524 {
15525  // get actual rect points (pretty much copied from draw function):
15526  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
15527  QTransform transform;
15528  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
15529  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
15530  transform.rotate(mRotation);
15531  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mainFont());
15532  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15533  QRectF textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
15534  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
15535  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
15536  QPolygonF rectPoly = transform.map(QPolygonF(textBoxRect));
15537 
15538  switch (anchorId)
15539  {
15540  case aiTopLeft: return rectPoly.at(0);
15541  case aiTop: return (rectPoly.at(0)+rectPoly.at(1))*0.5;
15542  case aiTopRight: return rectPoly.at(1);
15543  case aiRight: return (rectPoly.at(1)+rectPoly.at(2))*0.5;
15544  case aiBottomRight: return rectPoly.at(2);
15545  case aiBottom: return (rectPoly.at(2)+rectPoly.at(3))*0.5;
15546  case aiBottomLeft: return rectPoly.at(3);
15547  case aiLeft: return (rectPoly.at(3)+rectPoly.at(0))*0.5;
15548  }
15549 
15550  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
15551  return QPointF();
15552 }
15553 
15564 QPointF QCPItemText::getTextDrawPoint(const QPointF &pos, const QRectF &rect, Qt::Alignment positionAlignment) const
15565 {
15566  if (positionAlignment == 0 || positionAlignment == (Qt::AlignLeft|Qt::AlignTop))
15567  return pos;
15568 
15569  QPointF result = pos; // start at top left
15570  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignHCenter))
15571  result.rx() -= rect.width()/2.0;
15572  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
15573  result.rx() -= rect.width();
15574  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignVCenter))
15575  result.ry() -= rect.height()/2.0;
15576  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
15577  result.ry() -= rect.height();
15578  return result;
15579 }
15580 
15586 QFont QCPItemText::mainFont() const
15587 {
15588  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
15589 }
15590 
15596 QColor QCPItemText::mainColor() const
15597 {
15598  return mSelected ? mSelectedColor : mColor;
15599 }
15600 
15606 QPen QCPItemText::mainPen() const
15607 {
15608  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
15609 }
15610 
15616 QBrush QCPItemText::mainBrush() const
15617 {
15618  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
15619 }
15620 
15621 
15625 
15639 QCPItemEllipse::QCPItemEllipse(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
15640  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
15641  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
15642  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
15643  topLeftRim(createAnchor("topLeftRim", aiTopLeftRim)),
15644  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
15645  topRightRim(createAnchor("topRightRim", aiTopRightRim)),
15646  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
15647  bottomRightRim(createAnchor("bottomRightRim", aiBottomRightRim)),
15648  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
15649  bottomLeftRim(createAnchor("bottomLeftRim", aiBottomLeftRim)),
15650  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft)),
15651  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
15652 {
15653  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
15654  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
15655 
15656  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
15657  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
15658  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15659  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15660 }
15661 
15662 QCPItemEllipse::~QCPItemEllipse()
15663 {
15664 }
15665 
15671 void QCPItemEllipse::setPen(const QPen &pen)
15672 {
15673  mPen = pen;
15674 }
15675 
15681 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
15682 {
15683  mSelectedPen = pen;
15684 }
15685 
15692 void QCPItemEllipse::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
15693 {
15694  mBrush = brush;
15695 }
15696 
15703 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
15704 {
15705  mSelectedBrush = brush;
15706 }
15707 
15708 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15709 double QCPItemEllipse::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15710 {
15711  Q_UNUSED(details)
15712  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15713  return -1;
15714 
15715  double result = -1;
15716  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
15717  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
15718  QPointF center((p1+p2)/2.0);
15719  double a = qAbs(p1.x()-p2.x())/2.0;
15720  double b = qAbs(p1.y()-p2.y())/2.0;
15721  double x = pos.x()-center.x();
15722  double y = pos.y()-center.y();
15723 
15724  // distance to border:
15725  double c = 1.0/qSqrt(x*x/(a*a)+y*y/(b*b));
15726  result = qAbs(c-1)*qSqrt(x*x+y*y);
15727  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
15728  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
15729  {
15730  if (x*x/(a*a) + y*y/(b*b) <= 1)
15731  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
15732  }
15733  return result;
15734 }
15735 
15736 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15737 void QCPItemEllipse::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15738 {
15739  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
15740  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
15741  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
15742  return;
15743  QRectF ellipseRect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
15744  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
15745  if (ellipseRect.intersects(clip)) // only draw if bounding rect of ellipse is visible in cliprect
15746  {
15747  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15748  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15749 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
15750  try // drawEllipse sometimes throws exceptions if ellipse is too big
15751  {
15752 #endif
15753  painter->drawEllipse(ellipseRect);
15754 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
15755  } catch (...)
15756  {
15757  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item too large for memory, setting invisible";
15758  setVisible(false);
15759  }
15760 #endif
15761  }
15762 }
15763 
15764 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15765 QPointF QCPItemEllipse::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
15766 {
15767  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
15768  switch (anchorId)
15769  {
15770  case aiTopLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15771  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
15772  case aiTopRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15773  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15774  case aiBottomRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15775  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15776  case aiBottomLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15777  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
15778  case aiCenter: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15779  }
15780 
15781  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
15782  return QPointF();
15783 }
15784 
15790 QPen QCPItemEllipse::mainPen() const
15791 {
15792  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
15793 }
15794 
15800 QBrush QCPItemEllipse::mainBrush() const
15801 {
15802  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
15803 }
15804 
15805 
15809 
15829 QCPItemPixmap::QCPItemPixmap(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
15830  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
15831  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
15832  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
15833  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
15834  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
15835  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
15836  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
15837  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
15838  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
15839 {
15840  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
15841  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
15842 
15843  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15844  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue));
15845  setScaled(false, Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
15846 }
15847 
15848 QCPItemPixmap::~QCPItemPixmap()
15849 {
15850 }
15851 
15855 void QCPItemPixmap::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
15856 {
15857  mPixmap = pixmap;
15858  if (mPixmap.isNull())
15859  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "pixmap is null";
15860 }
15861 
15866 void QCPItemPixmap::setScaled(bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode aspectRatioMode)
15867 {
15868  mScaled = scaled;
15869  mAspectRatioMode = aspectRatioMode;
15870  updateScaledPixmap();
15871 }
15872 
15878 void QCPItemPixmap::setPen(const QPen &pen)
15879 {
15880  mPen = pen;
15881 }
15882 
15888 void QCPItemPixmap::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
15889 {
15890  mSelectedPen = pen;
15891 }
15892 
15893 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15894 double QCPItemPixmap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15895 {
15896  Q_UNUSED(details)
15897  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15898  return -1;
15899 
15900  return rectSelectTest(getFinalRect(), pos, true);
15901 }
15902 
15903 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15904 void QCPItemPixmap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15905 {
15906  bool flipHorz = false;
15907  bool flipVert = false;
15908  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
15909  double clipPad = mainPen().style() == Qt::NoPen ? 0 : mainPen().widthF();
15910  QRect boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
15911  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect()))
15912  {
15913  updateScaledPixmap(rect, flipHorz, flipVert);
15914  painter->drawPixmap(rect.topLeft(), mScaled ? mScaledPixmap : mPixmap);
15915  QPen pen = mainPen();
15916  if (pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)
15917  {
15918  painter->setPen(pen);
15919  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15920  painter->drawRect(rect);
15921  }
15922  }
15923 }
15924 
15925 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15926 QPointF QCPItemPixmap::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
15927 {
15928  bool flipHorz;
15929  bool flipVert;
15930  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
15931  // we actually want denormal rects (negative width/height) here, so restore
15932  // the flipped state:
15933  if (flipHorz)
15934  rect.adjust(rect.width(), 0, -rect.width(), 0);
15935  if (flipVert)
15936  rect.adjust(0, rect.height(), 0, -rect.height());
15937 
15938  switch (anchorId)
15939  {
15940  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
15941  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
15942  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15943  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15944  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
15945  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;;
15946  }
15947 
15948  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
15949  return QPointF();
15950 }
15951 
15965 void QCPItemPixmap::updateScaledPixmap(QRect finalRect, bool flipHorz, bool flipVert)
15966 {
15967  if (mPixmap.isNull())
15968  return;
15969 
15970  if (mScaled)
15971  {
15972  if (finalRect.isNull())
15973  finalRect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
15974  if (finalRect.size() != mScaledPixmap.size())
15975  {
15976  mScaledPixmap = mPixmap.scaled(finalRect.size(), mAspectRatioMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
15977  if (flipHorz || flipVert)
15978  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap::fromImage(mScaledPixmap.toImage().mirrored(flipHorz, flipVert));
15979  }
15980  } else if (!mScaledPixmap.isNull())
15981  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap();
15982 }
15983 
15998 QRect QCPItemPixmap::getFinalRect(bool *flippedHorz, bool *flippedVert) const
15999 {
16000  QRect result;
16001  bool flipHorz = false;
16002  bool flipVert = false;
16003  QPoint p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint().toPoint();
16004  QPoint p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint().toPoint();
16005  if (p1 == p2)
16006  return QRect(p1, QSize(0, 0));
16007  if (mScaled)
16008  {
16009  QSize newSize = QSize(p2.x()-p1.x(), p2.y()-p1.y());
16010  QPoint topLeft = p1;
16011  if (newSize.width() < 0)
16012  {
16013  flipHorz = true;
16014  newSize.rwidth() *= -1;
16015  topLeft.setX(p2.x());
16016  }
16017  if (newSize.height() < 0)
16018  {
16019  flipVert = true;
16020  newSize.rheight() *= -1;
16021  topLeft.setY(p2.y());
16022  }
16023  QSize scaledSize = mPixmap.size();
16024  scaledSize.scale(newSize, mAspectRatioMode);
16025  result = QRect(topLeft, scaledSize);
16026  } else
16027  {
16028  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size());
16029  }
16030  if (flippedHorz)
16031  *flippedHorz = flipHorz;
16032  if (flippedVert)
16033  *flippedVert = flipVert;
16034  return result;
16035 }
16036 
16042 QPen QCPItemPixmap::mainPen() const
16043 {
16044  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
16045 }
16046 
16047 
16051 
16087 QCPItemTracer::QCPItemTracer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
16088  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
16089  position(createPosition("position")),
16090  mGraph(0)
16091 {
16092  position->setCoords(0, 0);
16093 
16094  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16095  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16096  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
16097  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
16098  setStyle(tsCrosshair);
16099  setSize(6);
16100  setInterpolating(false);
16101  setGraphKey(0);
16102 }
16103 
16104 QCPItemTracer::~QCPItemTracer()
16105 {
16106 }
16107 
16113 void QCPItemTracer::setPen(const QPen &pen)
16114 {
16115  mPen = pen;
16116 }
16117 
16123 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
16124 {
16125  mSelectedPen = pen;
16126 }
16127 
16133 void QCPItemTracer::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
16134 {
16135  mBrush = brush;
16136 }
16137 
16143 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
16144 {
16145  mSelectedBrush = brush;
16146 }
16147 
16152 void QCPItemTracer::setSize(double size)
16153 {
16154  mSize = size;
16155 }
16156 
16163 void QCPItemTracer::setStyle(QCPItemTracer::TracerStyle style)
16164 {
16165  mStyle = style;
16166 }
16167 
16178 void QCPItemTracer::setGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
16179 {
16180  if (graph)
16181  {
16182  if (graph->parentPlot() == mParentPlot)
16183  {
16184  position->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
16185  position->setAxes(graph->keyAxis(), graph->valueAxis());
16186  mGraph = graph;
16187  updatePosition();
16188  } else
16189  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph isn't in same QCustomPlot instance as this item";
16190  } else
16191  {
16192  mGraph = 0;
16193  }
16194 }
16195 
16205 void QCPItemTracer::setGraphKey(double key)
16206 {
16207  mGraphKey = key;
16208 }
16209 
16221 void QCPItemTracer::setInterpolating(bool enabled)
16222 {
16223  mInterpolating = enabled;
16224 }
16225 
16226 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16227 double QCPItemTracer::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
16228 {
16229  Q_UNUSED(details)
16230  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
16231  return -1;
16232 
16233  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
16234  double w = mSize/2.0;
16235  QRect clip = clipRect();
16236  switch (mStyle)
16237  {
16238  case tsNone: return -1;
16239  case tsPlus:
16240  {
16241  if (clipRect().intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16242  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0), pos),
16243  distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w), pos)));
16244  break;
16245  }
16246  case tsCrosshair:
16247  {
16248  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(QPointF(clip.left(), center.y()), QPointF(clip.right(), center.y()), pos),
16249  distSqrToLine(QPointF(center.x(), clip.top()), QPointF(center.x(), clip.bottom()), pos)));
16250  }
16251  case tsCircle:
16252  {
16253  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16254  {
16255  // distance to border:
16256  double centerDist = QVector2D(center-pos).length();
16257  double circleLine = w;
16258  double result = qAbs(centerDist-circleLine);
16259  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
16260  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
16261  {
16262  if (centerDist <= circleLine)
16263  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
16264  }
16265  return result;
16266  }
16267  break;
16268  }
16269  case tsSquare:
16270  {
16271  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16272  {
16273  QRectF rect = QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w));
16274  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
16275  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
16276  }
16277  break;
16278  }
16279  }
16280  return -1;
16281 }
16282 
16283 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16284 void QCPItemTracer::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
16285 {
16286  updatePosition();
16287  if (mStyle == tsNone)
16288  return;
16289 
16290  painter->setPen(mainPen());
16291  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
16292  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
16293  double w = mSize/2.0;
16294  QRect clip = clipRect();
16295  switch (mStyle)
16296  {
16297  case tsNone: return;
16298  case tsPlus:
16299  {
16300  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16301  {
16302  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0)));
16303  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w)));
16304  }
16305  break;
16306  }
16307  case tsCrosshair:
16308  {
16309  if (center.y() > clip.top() && center.y() < clip.bottom())
16310  painter->drawLine(QLineF(clip.left(), center.y(), clip.right(), center.y()));
16311  if (center.x() > clip.left() && center.x() < clip.right())
16312  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center.x(), clip.top(), center.x(), clip.bottom()));
16313  break;
16314  }
16315  case tsCircle:
16316  {
16317  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16318  painter->drawEllipse(center, w, w);
16319  break;
16320  }
16321  case tsSquare:
16322  {
16323  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16324  painter->drawRect(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)));
16325  break;
16326  }
16327  }
16328 }
16329 
16342 void QCPItemTracer::updatePosition()
16343 {
16344  if (mGraph)
16345  {
16346  if (mParentPlot->hasPlottable(mGraph))
16347  {
16348  if (mGraph->data()->size() > 1)
16349  {
16350  QCPDataMap::const_iterator first = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
16351  QCPDataMap::const_iterator last = mGraph->data()->constEnd()-1;
16352  if (mGraphKey < first.key())
16353  position->setCoords(first.key(), first.value().value);
16354  else if (mGraphKey > last.key())
16355  position->setCoords(last.key(), last.value().value);
16356  else
16357  {
16358  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = first;
16359  it = mGraph->data()->lowerBound(mGraphKey);
16360  if (it != first) // mGraphKey is somewhere between iterators
16361  {
16362  QCPDataMap::const_iterator prevIt = it-1;
16363  if (mInterpolating)
16364  {
16365  // interpolate between iterators around mGraphKey:
16366  double slope = (it.value().value-prevIt.value().value)/(it.key()-prevIt.key());
16367  position->setCoords(mGraphKey, (mGraphKey-prevIt.key())*slope+prevIt.value().value);
16368  } else
16369  {
16370  // find iterator with key closest to mGraphKey:
16371  if (mGraphKey < (prevIt.key()+it.key())*0.5)
16372  it = prevIt;
16373  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
16374  }
16375  } else // mGraphKey is exactly on first iterator
16376  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
16377  }
16378  } else if (mGraph->data()->size() == 1)
16379  {
16380  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
16381  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
16382  } else
16383  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph has no data";
16384  } else
16385  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph not contained in QCustomPlot instance (anymore)";
16386  }
16387 }
16388 
16394 QPen QCPItemTracer::mainPen() const
16395 {
16396  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
16397 }
16398 
16404 QBrush QCPItemTracer::mainBrush() const
16405 {
16406  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
16407 }
16408 
16409 
16413 
16439 QCPItemBracket::QCPItemBracket(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
16440  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
16441  left(createPosition("left")),
16442  right(createPosition("right")),
16443  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
16444 {
16445  left->setCoords(0, 0);
16446  right->setCoords(1, 1);
16447 
16448  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
16449  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
16450  setLength(8);
16451  setStyle(bsCalligraphic);
16452 }
16453 
16454 QCPItemBracket::~QCPItemBracket()
16455 {
16456 }
16457 
16467 void QCPItemBracket::setPen(const QPen &pen)
16468 {
16469  mPen = pen;
16470 }
16471 
16477 void QCPItemBracket::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
16478 {
16479  mSelectedPen = pen;
16480 }
16481 
16490 void QCPItemBracket::setLength(double length)
16491 {
16492  mLength = length;
16493 }
16494 
16500 void QCPItemBracket::setStyle(QCPItemBracket::BracketStyle style)
16501 {
16502  mStyle = style;
16503 }
16504 
16505 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16506 double QCPItemBracket::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
16507 {
16508  Q_UNUSED(details)
16509  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
16510  return -1;
16511 
16512  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
16513  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
16514  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
16515  return -1;
16516 
16517  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
16518  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
16519  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
16520  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
16521 
16522  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), pos));
16523 }
16524 
16525 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16526 void QCPItemBracket::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
16527 {
16528  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
16529  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
16530  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
16531  return;
16532 
16533  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
16534  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
16535  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
16536  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
16537 
16538  QPolygon boundingPoly;
16539  boundingPoly << leftVec.toPoint() << rightVec.toPoint()
16540  << (rightVec-lengthVec).toPoint() << (leftVec-lengthVec).toPoint();
16541  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
16542  if (clip.intersects(boundingPoly.boundingRect()))
16543  {
16544  painter->setPen(mainPen());
16545  switch (mStyle)
16546  {
16547  case bsSquare:
16548  {
16549  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF());
16550  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16551  painter->drawLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16552  break;
16553  }
16554  case bsRound:
16555  {
16556  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16557  QPainterPath path;
16558  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16559  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
16560  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16561  painter->drawPath(path);
16562  break;
16563  }
16564  case bsCurly:
16565  {
16566  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16567  QPainterPath path;
16568  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16569  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4*widthVec+1*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
16570  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4*widthVec+1*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16571  painter->drawPath(path);
16572  break;
16573  }
16574  case bsCalligraphic:
16575  {
16576  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
16577  painter->setBrush(QBrush(mainPen().color()));
16578  QPainterPath path;
16579  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16580 
16581  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4*widthVec+0.8*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
16582  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4*widthVec+0.8*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16583 
16584  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.5).toPointF(), (centerVec-0.2*widthVec+1.2*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+lengthVec*0.2).toPointF());
16585  path.cubicTo((centerVec+0.2*widthVec+1.2*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.5).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16586 
16587  painter->drawPath(path);
16588  break;
16589  }
16590  }
16591  }
16592 }
16593 
16594 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16595 QPointF QCPItemBracket::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
16596 {
16597  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
16598  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
16599  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
16600  return leftVec.toPointF();
16601 
16602  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
16603  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
16604  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
16605  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
16606 
16607  switch (anchorId)
16608  {
16609  case aiCenter:
16610  return centerVec.toPointF();
16611  }
16612  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
16613  return QPointF();
16614 }
16615 
16621 QPen QCPItemBracket::mainPen() const
16622 {
16623  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
16624 }
16625 
16626 
16630 
16668 /* start documentation of inline functions */
16669 
16750 /* end documentation of inline functions */
16751 
16756 QCPAxisRect::QCPAxisRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, bool setupDefaultAxes) :
16757  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
16758  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
16759  mBackgroundScaled(true),
16760  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
16761  mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
16762  mRangeDrag(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
16763  mRangeZoom(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
16764  mRangeZoomFactorHorz(0.85),
16765  mRangeZoomFactorVert(0.85),
16766  mDragging(false)
16767 {
16768  mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
16769  mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
16770  mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
16771 
16772  setMinimumSize(50, 50);
16773  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(15, 15, 15, 15));
16774  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atLeft, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16775  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atRight, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16776  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atTop, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16777  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atBottom, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16778 
16779  if (setupDefaultAxes)
16780  {
16781  QCPAxis *xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16782  QCPAxis *yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16783  QCPAxis *xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16784  QCPAxis *yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16785  setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
16786  setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
16787  xAxis2->setVisible(false);
16788  yAxis2->setVisible(false);
16789  xAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
16790  yAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
16791  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16792  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16793  xAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
16794  yAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
16795  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16796  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16797  }
16798 }
16799 
16800 QCPAxisRect::~QCPAxisRect()
16801 {
16802  delete mInsetLayout;
16803  mInsetLayout = 0;
16804 
16805  QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = axes();
16806  for (int i=0; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
16807  removeAxis(axesList.at(i));
16808 }
16809 
16815 int QCPAxisRect::axisCount(QCPAxis::AxisType type) const
16816 {
16817  return mAxes.value(type).size();
16818 }
16819 
16825 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::axis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, int index) const
16826 {
16827  QList<QCPAxis*> ax(mAxes.value(type));
16828  if (index >= 0 && index < ax.size())
16829  {
16830  return ax.at(index);
16831  } else
16832  {
16833  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
16834  return 0;
16835  }
16836 }
16837 
16846 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) const
16847 {
16848  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
16849  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
16850  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16851  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
16852  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atRight);
16853  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
16854  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atTop);
16855  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
16856  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16857  return result;
16858 }
16859 
16864 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes() const
16865 {
16866  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
16867  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
16868  while (it.hasNext())
16869  {
16870  it.next();
16871  result << it.value();
16872  }
16873  return result;
16874 }
16875 
16885 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::addAxis(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
16886 {
16887  QCPAxis *newAxis = new QCPAxis(this, type);
16888  if (mAxes[type].size() > 0) // multiple axes on one side, add half-bar axis ending to additional axes with offset
16889  {
16890  bool invert = (type == QCPAxis::atRight) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom);
16891  newAxis->setLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, !invert));
16892  newAxis->setUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, invert));
16893  }
16894  mAxes[type].append(newAxis);
16895  return newAxis;
16896 }
16897 
16906 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::addAxes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types)
16907 {
16908  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
16909  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
16910  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16911  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
16912  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16913  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
16914  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16915  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
16916  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16917  return result;
16918 }
16919 
16927 bool QCPAxisRect::removeAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
16928 {
16929  // don't access axis->axisType() to provide safety when axis is an invalid pointer, rather go through all axis containers:
16930  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
16931  while (it.hasNext())
16932  {
16933  it.next();
16934  if (it.value().contains(axis))
16935  {
16936  mAxes[it.key()].removeOne(axis);
16937  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(parentPlot())) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the axis rect is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
16938  parentPlot()->axisRemoved(axis);
16939  delete axis;
16940  return true;
16941  }
16942  }
16943  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis isn't in axis rect:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(axis);
16944  return false;
16945 }
16946 
16968 void QCPAxisRect::setupFullAxesBox(bool connectRanges)
16969 {
16970  QCPAxis *xAxis, *yAxis, *xAxis2, *yAxis2;
16971  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) == 0)
16972  xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16973  else
16974  xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16975 
16976  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) == 0)
16977  yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16978  else
16979  yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16980 
16981  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) == 0)
16982  xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16983  else
16984  xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16985 
16986  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) == 0)
16987  yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16988  else
16989  yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16990 
16991  xAxis2->setVisible(true);
16992  xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
16993  if (xAxis)
16994  {
16995  xAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(xAxis->autoSubTicks());
16996  xAxis2->setAutoTickCount(xAxis->autoTickCount());
16997  xAxis2->setAutoTickStep(xAxis->autoTickStep());
16998  xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
16999  xAxis2->setScaleLogBase(xAxis->scaleLogBase());
17000  xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
17001  xAxis2->setSubTickCount(xAxis->subTickCount());
17002  xAxis2->setTickStep(xAxis->tickStep());
17003  xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
17004  xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
17005  }
17006 
17007  yAxis2->setVisible(true);
17008  yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
17009  if (yAxis)
17010  {
17011  yAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(yAxis->autoSubTicks());
17012  yAxis2->setAutoTickCount(yAxis->autoTickCount());
17013  yAxis2->setAutoTickStep(yAxis->autoTickStep());
17014  yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
17015  yAxis2->setScaleLogBase(yAxis->scaleLogBase());
17016  yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
17017  yAxis2->setSubTickCount(yAxis->subTickCount());
17018  yAxis2->setTickStep(yAxis->tickStep());
17019  yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
17020  yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
17021  }
17022 
17023  if (connectRanges)
17024  {
17025  connect(xAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), xAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17026  connect(yAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), yAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17027  }
17028 }
17029 
17038 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxisRect::plottables() const
17039 {
17040  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::plottables() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17041  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
17042  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
17043  {
17044  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17045  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
17046  }
17047  return result;
17048 }
17049 
17058 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxisRect::graphs() const
17059 {
17060  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::graphs() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17061  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
17062  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
17063  {
17064  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17065  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
17066  }
17067  return result;
17068 }
17069 
17080 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxisRect::items() const
17081 {
17082  // Note: don't just append all QCPAxis::items() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17083  // and miss those items that have this axis rect as clipAxisRect.
17084  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
17085  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
17086  {
17087  if (mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->clipAxisRect() == this)
17088  {
17089  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
17090  continue;
17091  }
17092  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
17093  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++itemId)
17094  {
17095  if (positions.at(posId)->axisRect() == this ||
17096  positions.at(posId)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
17097  positions.at(posId)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17098  {
17099  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
17100  break;
17101  }
17102  }
17103  }
17104  return result;
17105 }
17106 
17115 void QCPAxisRect::update()
17116 {
17117  QCPLayoutElement::update();
17118 
17119  // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because QCPAxisRect doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
17120  mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
17121  mInsetLayout->update();
17122 }
17123 
17124 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17125 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPAxisRect::elements(bool recursive) const
17126 {
17127  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
17128  if (mInsetLayout)
17129  {
17130  result << mInsetLayout;
17131  if (recursive)
17132  result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
17133  }
17134  return result;
17135 }
17136 
17137 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17138 void QCPAxisRect::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
17139 {
17140  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
17141 }
17142 
17143 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17144 void QCPAxisRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
17145 {
17146  drawBackground(painter);
17147 }
17148 
17164 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)

17166  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
17167  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
17168 }

17185  mBackgroundBrush = brush;
17186 }

17195 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)

17198  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
17199  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
17200  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
17201 }

17214 {
17215  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
17216 }

17223 void QCPAxisRect::setBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
17224 {
17225  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
17226 }
17227 
17233 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
17234 {
17235  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeDragHorzAxis.data() : mRangeDragVertAxis.data());
17236 }
17237 
17243 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
17244 {
17245  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data() : mRangeZoomVertAxis.data());
17246 }
17247 
17253 double QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomFactor(Qt::Orientation orientation)
17254 {
17255  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
17256 }

17274 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDrag(Qt::Orientations orientations)
17275 {
17276  mRangeDrag = orientations;
17277 }

17294 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoom(Qt::Orientations orientations)
17295 {
17296  mRangeZoom = orientations;
17297 }
17298 
17305 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
17306 {
17307  mRangeDragHorzAxis = horizontal;
17308  mRangeDragVertAxis = vertical;
17309 }
17310 
17318 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
17319 {
17320  mRangeZoomHorzAxis = horizontal;
17321  mRangeZoomVertAxis = vertical;
17322 }
17323 
17334 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double horizontalFactor, double verticalFactor)
17335 {
17336  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = horizontalFactor;
17337  mRangeZoomFactorVert = verticalFactor;
17338 }
17339 
17344 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double factor)
17345 {
17346  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
17347  mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
17348 }
17349 
17368 void QCPAxisRect::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
17369 {
17370  // draw background fill:
17371  if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
17372  painter->fillRect(mRect, mBackgroundBrush);
17373 
17374  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
17375  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
17376  {
17377  if (mBackgroundScaled)
17378  {
17379  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
17380  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
17381  scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
17382  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
17383  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
17384  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
17385  } else
17386  {
17387  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
17388  }
17389  }
17390 }
17391 
17402 void QCPAxisRect::updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
17403 {
17404  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(type);
17405  for (int i=1; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
17406  axesList.at(i)->setOffset(axesList.at(i-1)->offset() + axesList.at(i-1)->calculateMargin() + axesList.at(i)->tickLengthIn());
17407 }
17408 
17409 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17410 int QCPAxisRect::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
17411 {
17412  if (!mAutoMargins.testFlag(side))
17413  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Called with side that isn't specified as auto margin";
17414 
17415  updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
17416 
17417  // note: only need to look at the last (outer most) axis to determine the total margin, due to updateAxisOffset call
17418  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
17419  if (axesList.size() > 0)
17420  return axesList.last()->offset() + axesList.last()->calculateMargin();
17421  else
17422  return 0;
17423 }
17424 
17436 void QCPAxisRect::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
17437 {
17438  mDragStart = event->pos(); // need this even when not LeftButton is pressed, to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a full click (no position change between press and release)
17439  if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
17440  {
17441  mDragging = true;
17442  // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
17443  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
17444  {
17445  mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
17446  mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
17447  }
17448  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
17449  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
17450  {
17451  if (mRangeDragHorzAxis)
17452  mDragStartHorzRange = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data()->range();
17453  if (mRangeDragVertAxis)
17454  mDragStartVertRange = mRangeDragVertAxis.data()->range();
17455  }
17456  }
17457 }
17458 
17466 void QCPAxisRect::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
17467 {
17468  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
17469  if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
17470  {
17471  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
17472  {
17473  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragHorzAxis = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data())
17474  {
17475  if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
17476  {
17477  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) - rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
17478  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower+diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper+diff);
17479  } else if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
17480  {
17481  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) / rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
17482  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower*diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper*diff);
17483  }
17484  }
17485  }
17486  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
17487  {
17488  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragVertAxis = mRangeDragVertAxis.data())
17489  {
17490  if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
17491  {
17492  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) - rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
17493  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower+diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper+diff);
17494  } else if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
17495  {
17496  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) / rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
17497  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower*diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper*diff);
17498  }
17499  }
17500  }
17501  if (mRangeDrag != 0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
17502  {
17503  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
17504  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
17505  mParentPlot->replot();
17506  }
17507  }
17508 }
17509 
17510 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17511 void QCPAxisRect::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
17512 {
17513  Q_UNUSED(event)
17514  mDragging = false;
17515  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
17516  {
17517  mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
17518  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
17519  }
17520 }
17521 
17536 void QCPAxisRect::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
17537 {
17538  // Mouse range zooming interaction:
17539  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
17540  {
17541  if (mRangeZoom != 0)
17542  {
17543  double factor;
17544  double wheelSteps = event->delta()/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
17545  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
17546  {
17547  factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
17548  if (mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data())
17549  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x()));
17550  }
17551  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
17552  {
17553  factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
17554  if (mRangeZoomVertAxis.data())
17555  mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y()));
17556  }
17557  mParentPlot->replot();
17558  }
17559  }
17560 }
17561 
17562 
17566 
17591 /* start of documentation of signals */
17592 
17599 /* end of documentation of signals */
17600 
17605 QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent) :
17606  QCPLayoutElement(parent->parentPlot()),
17607  mParentLegend(parent),
17608  mFont(parent->font()),
17609  mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
17610  mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
17611  mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()),
17612  mSelectable(true),
17613  mSelected(false)
17614 {
17615  setLayer("legend");
17616  setMargins(QMargins(8, 2, 8, 2));
17617 }
17618

17626  mFont = font;

17679 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelected(bool selected)
17680 {
17681  if (mSelected != selected)
17682  {
17683  mSelected = selected;
17684  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
17685  }
17686 }
17687 
17688 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17689 double QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
17690 {
17691  Q_UNUSED(details)
17692  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
17693  if (onlySelectable && (!mSelectable || !mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)))
17694  return -1;
17695 
17696  if (mRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
17697  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
17698  else
17699  return -1;
17700 }
17701 
17702 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17703 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
17704 {
17705  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegendItems);
17706 }
17707 
17708 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17709 QRect QCPAbstractLegendItem::clipRect() const
17710 {
17711  return mOuterRect;
17712 }
17713 
17714 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17715 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
17716 {
17717  Q_UNUSED(event)
17718  Q_UNUSED(details)
17719  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
17720  {
17721  bool selBefore = mSelected;
17722  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
17723  if (selectionStateChanged)
17724  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
17725  }
17726 }
17727 
17728 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17729 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
17730 {
17731  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
17732  {
17733  bool selBefore = mSelected;
17734  setSelected(false);
17735  if (selectionStateChanged)
17736  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
17737  }
17738 }
17739 
17743 
17777 QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) :
17778  QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent),
17779  mPlottable(plottable)
17780 {
17781 }
17782 
17788 QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
17789 {
17790  return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
17791 }
17792 
17798 QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const
17799 {
17800  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
17801 }
17802 
17808 QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const
17809 {
17810  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
17811 }
17812 
17819 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
17820 {
17821  if (!mPlottable) return;
17822  painter->setFont(getFont());
17823  painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
17824  QSizeF iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
17825  QRectF textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
17826  QRectF iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
17827  int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than icon, center text vertically in icon height, else align tops
17828  painter->drawText(mRect.x()+iconSize.width()+mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(), mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
17829  // draw icon:
17830  painter->save();
17831  painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
17832  mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
17833  painter->restore();
17834  // draw icon border:
17835  if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
17836  {
17837  painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
17838  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
17839  painter->drawRect(iconRect);
17840  }
17841 }
17842 
17848 QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::minimumSizeHint() const
17849 {
17850  if (!mPlottable) return QSize();
17851  QSize result(0, 0);
17852  QRect textRect;
17853  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
17854  QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
17855  textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
17856  result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width() + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right());
17857  result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()) + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom());
17858  return result;
17859 }

17907 QCPLegend::QCPLegend()
17908 {
17909  setRowSpacing(0);
17910  setColumnSpacing(10);
17911  setMargins(QMargins(2, 3, 2, 2));
17912  setAntialiased(false);
17913  setIconSize(32, 18);
17914 
17915  setIconTextPadding(7);
17916 
17917  setSelectableParts(spLegendBox | spItems);
17918  setSelectedParts(spNone);
17919 
17920  setBorderPen(QPen(Qt::black));
17921  setSelectedBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
17922  setIconBorderPen(Qt::NoPen);
17923  setSelectedIconBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
17924  setBrush(Qt::white);
17925  setSelectedBrush(Qt::white);
17926  setTextColor(Qt::black);
17927  setSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue);
17928 }
17929 
17930 QCPLegend::~QCPLegend()
17931 {
17932  clearItems();
17933  if (mParentPlot)
17934  mParentPlot->legendRemoved(this);
17935 }
17936 
17937 /* no doc for getter, see setSelectedParts */
17938 QCPLegend::SelectableParts QCPLegend::selectedParts() const
17939 {
17940  // check whether any legend elements selected, if yes, add spItems to return value
17941  bool hasSelectedItems = false;
17942  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
17943  {
17944  if (item(i) && item(i)->selected())
17945  {
17946  hasSelectedItems = true;
17947  break;
17948  }
17949  }
17950  if (hasSelectedItems)
17951  return mSelectedParts | spItems;
17952  else
17953  return mSelectedParts & ~spItems;
17954 }
17955

17960 {
17961  mBorderPen = pen;
17962 }

17967 void QCPLegend::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
17968 {
17969  mBrush = brush;
17970 }
17971 
17981 void QCPLegend::setFont(const QFont &font)
17982 {
17983  mFont = font;
17984  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
17985  {
17986  if (item(i))
17987  item(i)->setFont(mFont);
17988  }
17989 }

18003  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18004  {
18005  if (item(i))
18006  item(i)->setTextColor(color);
18007  }
18008 }

18047 
18058 void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
18059 {
18060  mSelectableParts = selectable;
18061 }
18062 
18084 void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
18085 {
18086  SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
18087  mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item selection changed
18088 
18089  if (mSelectedParts != newSelected)
18090  {
18091  if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
18092  {
18093  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be unset with this function";
18094  newSelected &= ~spItems;
18095  }
18096  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && !newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
18097  {
18098  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18099  {
18100  if (item(i))
18101  item(i)->setSelected(false);
18102  }
18103  }
18104  mSelectedParts = newSelected;
18105  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
18106  }
18107 }
18108 
18115 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
18116 {
18117  mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
18118 }
18119 
18125 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
18126 {
18127  mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
18128 }
18129 
18136 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
18137 {
18138  mSelectedBrush = brush;
18139 }
18140 
18148 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
18149 {
18150  mSelectedFont = font;
18151  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18152  {
18153  if (item(i))
18154  item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
18155  }
18156 }
18157 
18165 void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
18166 {
18167  mSelectedTextColor = color;
18168  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18169  {
18170  if (item(i))
18171  item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
18172  }
18173 }

18180 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const
18181 {
18182  return qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(elementAt(index));
18183 }
18184 
18191 QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
18192 {
18193  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18194  {
18195  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(item(i)))
18196  {
18197  if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
18198  return pli;
18199  }
18200  }
18201  return 0;
18202 }
18203 
18208 int QCPLegend::itemCount() const
18209 {
18210  return elementCount();
18211 }
18212 
18216 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
18217 {
18218  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18219  {
18220  if (item == this->item(i))
18221  return true;
18222  }
18223  return false;
18224 }
18225 
18232 bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
18233 {
18234  return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
18235 }
18236 
18244 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
18245 {
18246  if (!hasItem(item))
18247  {
18248  return addElement(rowCount(), 0, item);
18249  } else
18250  return false;
18251 }
18252 
18260 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
18261 {
18262  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index))
18263  {
18264  bool success = remove(ali);
18265  simplify();
18266  return success;
18267  } else
18268  return false;
18269 }
18270 
18279 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
18280 {
18281  bool success = remove(item);
18282  simplify();
18283  return success;
18284 }
18285 
18289 void QCPLegend::clearItems()
18290 {
18291  for (int i=itemCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
18292  removeItem(i);
18293 }
18294 
18301 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
18302 {
18303  QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
18304  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18305  {
18306  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i))
18307  {
18308  if (ali->selected())
18309  result.append(ali);
18310  }
18311  }
18312  return result;
18313 }
18314

18329 {
18330  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
18331 }

18338 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
18339 {
18340  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
18341 }

18348 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
18349 {
18350  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
18351 }
18352 
18358 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18359 {
18360  // draw background rect:
18361  painter->setBrush(getBrush());
18362  painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
18363  painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
18364 }
18365 
18366 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18367 double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
18368 {
18369  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
18370  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
18371  return -1;
18372 
18373  if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
18374  {
18375  if (details) details->setValue(spLegendBox);
18376  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
18377  }
18378  return -1;
18379 }
18380 
18381 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18382 void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
18383 {
18384  Q_UNUSED(event)
18385  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
18386  if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox && mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
18387  {
18388  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
18389  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^spLegendBox : mSelectedParts|spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in !additive case, because they will be deselected by QCustomPlot (they're normal QCPLayerables with own deselectEvent)
18390  if (selectionStateChanged)
18391  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
18392  }
18393 }
18394 
18395 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18396 void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
18397 {
18398  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
18399  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
18400  {
18401  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
18402  setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
18403  if (selectionStateChanged)
18404  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
18405  }
18406 }
18407 
18408 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18409 QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const
18410 {
18411  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
18412 }
18413 
18414 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18415 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const
18416 {
18417  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
18418 }

18421 void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
18422 {
18423  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
18424 }

18466 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
18467  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
18468  mFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
18469  mTextColor(Qt::black),
18470  mSelectedFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
18471  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
18472  mSelectable(false),
18473  mSelected(false)
18474 {
18475  if (parentPlot)
18476  {
18477  setLayer(parentPlot->currentLayer());
18478  mFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold);
18479  mSelectedFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold);
18480  }
18481  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
18482 }
18483 
18488 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text) :
18489  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
18490  mText(text),
18491  mFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
18492  mTextColor(Qt::black),
18493  mSelectedFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
18494  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
18495  mSelectable(false),
18496  mSelected(false)
18497 {
18498  setLayer("axes");
18499  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
18500 }

18589  painter->setPen(QPen(mainTextColor()));

18591 }

18593 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18594 QSize QCPPlotTitle::minimumSizeHint() const
18595 {
18596  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
18597  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
18598  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
18599  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
18600  return result;
18601 }
18602 
18603 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18604 QSize QCPPlotTitle::maximumSizeHint() const
18605 {
18606  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
18607  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
18608  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
18609  result.setWidth(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
18610  return result;
18611 }

18613 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18614 void QCPPlotTitle::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
18615 {
18616  Q_UNUSED(event)
18617  Q_UNUSED(details)
18618  if (mSelectable)
18619  {
18620  bool selBefore = mSelected;
18621  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
18622  if (selectionStateChanged)
18623  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18624  }
18625 }

18627 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18628 void QCPPlotTitle::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
18629 {
18630  if (mSelectable)
18631  {
18632  bool selBefore = mSelected;
18633  setSelected(false);
18634  if (selectionStateChanged)
18635  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18636  }
18637 }
18638 
18639 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18640 double QCPPlotTitle::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
18641 {
18642  Q_UNUSED(details)
18643  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
18644  return -1;
18645 
18646  if (mTextBoundingRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
18647  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
18648  else
18649  return -1;
18650 }
18651 
18657 QFont QCPPlotTitle::mainFont() const
18658 {
18659  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
18660 }
18661 
18667 QColor QCPPlotTitle::mainTextColor() const
18668 {
18669  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
18670 }
